[03] 126^b^.^eb^ ^b^taṇhakkhaya^eb^nti ^a^M1.0218^ea^ kā uppatti? aññataro kira bārāṇasirājā mahaccarājānubhāvena nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ karoti. tassa sarīrasobhāya āvajjitahadayā sattā purato gacchantāpi nivattitvā tameva ullokenti, pacchato gacchantāpi, ubhohi passehi gacchantāpi. pakatiyā eva hi buddhadassane puṇṇacandasamuddarājadassane ca atitto loko. atha aññatarā kuṭumbiyabhariyāpi uparipāsādagatā sīhapañjaraṃ vivaritvā olokayamānā aṭṭhāsi. rājā taṃ disvā paṭibaddhacitto hutvā amaccaṃ āṇāpesi -- ``jānāhi tāva, bhaṇe, `ayaṃ itthī sasāmikā vā asāmikā vā'''ti? so ñatvā ``sasāmikā, devā''ti ārocesi. atha rājā cintesi -- ``imā vīsatisahassanāṭakitthiyo devaccharāyo viya maṃ eva ekaṃ abhiramāpenti, so dānāhaṃ etāpi atussitvā parassa itthiyā taṇhaṃ uppādesiṃ. sā uppannā apāyameva ākaḍḍhatī''ti taṇhāya ādīnavaṃ disvā ``handa, naṃ niggaṇhāmī''ti rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā vipassanto paccekabodhiṃ sacchikatvā imaṃ udānagāthaṃ abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^b^taṇhakkhaya^eb^nti nibbānaṃ, evaṃ diṭṭhādīnavāya vā taṇhāya appavattiṃ. ^b^appamatto^eb^ti sātaccakārī, sakkaccakārī. ^b^aneḷamūgo^eb^ti alālāmukho. atha vā aneḷo ca amūgo ca, paṇḍito byattoti vuttaṃ hoti. hitasukhasampāpakaṃ sutamassa atthīti ^b^sutavā,^eb^ āgamasampannoti vuttaṃ ^a^V1.0202^ea^ hoti. ^b^satīmā^eb^ti cirakatādīnaṃ anussaritā. ^b^saṅkhātadhammo^eb^ti dhammūpaparikkhāya pariññātadhammo. ^b^niyato^eb^ti ariyamaggena niyatabhāvappatto. ^b^padhānavā^eb^ti sammappadhānavīriyasampanno. uppaṭipāṭiyā esa pāṭho yojetabbo. evameva tehi appamādādīhi samannāgato niyāmasampāpakena padhānena padhānavā, tena padhānena sampattaniyāmato niyato, tato arahattappattiyā saṅkhātadhammo. arahā hi puna saṅkhātabbābhāvato ``saṅkhātadhammo''ti vuccati. yathāha -- ``ye ^a^P0.0198^ea^ ca saṅkhātadhammāse, ye ca sekhā puthū idhā''ti (su0 ni0 1044; cūḷani0 ajitamāṇavapucchāniddesa 7). sesaṃ vuttanayamevāti.
[06] taṇhakkhayagāthāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 127^b^.^eb^ ^b^sīhovā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0219^ea^ kā uppatti? aññatarassa kira bārāṇasirañño dūre uyyānaṃ hoti, so pageva uṭṭhāya uyyānaṃ gacchanto antarāmagge yānā oruyha udakaṭṭhānaṃ upagato ``mukhaṃ dhovissāmī''ti. tasmiñca padese sīhī sīhapotakaṃ janetvā gocarāya gatā. rājapuriso taṃ disvā ``sīhapotako, devā''ti ārocesi. rājā ``sīho kira kassaci na bhāyatī''ti taṃ upaparikkhituṃ bheriādīni ākoṭāpesi, sīhapotako taṃ saddaṃ sutvāpi tatheva sayi. atha yāvatatiyaṃ ākoṭāpesi. so tatiyavāre sīsaṃ ukkhipitvā sabbaṃ parisaṃ oloketvā tatheva sayi. atha rājā ``yāvassa mātā nāgacchati, tāva gacchāmā''ti vatvā gacchanto cintesi -- ``tadahujātopi sīhapotako na santasati na bhāyati, kudāssu nāmāhampi taṇhādiṭṭhiparitāsaṃ chaḍḍetvā na santaseyyaṃ na bhāyeyya''nti? so taṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā gacchanto puna kevaṭṭehi macche gahetvā sākhāsu bandhitvā pasārite jāle vātaṃ asaṅgaṃyeva gacchamānaṃ disvā tasmiṃ nimittaṃ aggahesi -- ``kudāssu nāmāhampi taṇhādiṭṭhimohajālaṃ phāletvā evaṃ asajjamāno gaccheyya''nti?

[03] atha uyyānaṃ gantvā silāpaṭṭapokkharaṇiyā tīre nisinno vātabbhāhatāni padumāni onamitvā udakaṃ phusitvā vātavigame puna yathāṭhāne ṭhitāni udakena anupalittāni disvā tasmiṃ nimittaṃ aggahesi -- ``kudāssu nāmāhampi yathā etāni udake jātāni udakena anupalittāni tiṭṭhanti. evaṃ loke jāto lokena anupalitto tiṭṭheyya''nti. so punappunaṃ ``yathā sīho vāto padumāni, evaṃ asantasantena asajjamānena anupalittena bhavitabba''nti cintetvā rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā vipassanto paccekabodhiṃ sacchikatvā imaṃ udānagāthaṃ abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^a^V1.0203^ea^ ^b^sīho^eb^ti cattāro sīhā -- tiṇasīho, paṇḍusīho, kāḷasīho, kesarasīhoti. tesaṃ kesarasīho aggamakkhāyati. so idha adhippeto. ^b^vāto^eb^ puratthimādivasena anekavidho. ^b^padumaṃ^eb^ rattasetādivasena. tesu yo koci vāto yaṃ kiñci padumañca vaṭṭatiyeva. tattha yasmā santāso nāma attasinehena hoti, attasineho ^a^M1.0220^ea^ ca nāma taṇhālepo, sopi diṭṭhisampayuttena vā diṭṭhivippayuttena vā lobhena hoti, sopi ^a^P0.0199^ea^ ca taṇhāyeva. sajjanaṃ pana tattha upaparikkhādivirahitassa mohena hoti, moho ca avijjā. tattha samathena taṇhāya pahānaṃ, vipassanāya avijjāya. tasmā samathena attasinehaṃ pahāya ^b^sīhova saddesu^eb^ aniccadukkhādīsu ^b^asantasanto,^eb^ vipassanāya mohaṃ pahāya ^b^vātova jālamhi^eb^ khandhāyatanādīsu ^b^asajjamāno,^eb^ samatheneva lobhaṃ lobhasampayuttadiṭṭhiñca pahāya, ^b^padumaṃva toyena^eb^ sabbabhavabhogalobhena alippamāno. ettha ca samathassa sīlaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ, samatho samādhissa, samādhi vipassanāyāti evaṃ dvīsu dhammesu siddhesu tayo khandhā siddhāva honti. tattha sīlakkhandhena sūro hoti. so sīhova saddesu āghātavatthūsu kujjhitukāmatāya na santasati, paññākkhandhena paṭividdhasabhāvo vātova jālamhi khandhādidhammabhede na sajjati, samādhikkhandhena vītarāgo padumaṃva toyena rāgena na lippati. evaṃ samathavipassanāhi sīlasamādhipaññākkhandhehi ca yathāsambhavaṃ taṇhāvijjānaṃ tiṇṇañca akusalamūlānaṃ pahānavasena asantasanto asajjamāno alippamāno ca veditabbo. sesaṃ vuttanayamevāti.
[06] sīhādigāthāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 128^b^.^eb^ ^b^sīho yathā^eb^ti kā uppatti? aññataro kira bārāṇasirājā paccantaṃ kupitaṃ vūpasametuṃ gāmānugāmimaggaṃ chaḍḍetvā ujuṃ aṭavimaggaṃ gahetvā mahatiyā senāya gacchati. tena ca samayena aññatarasmiṃ pabbatapāde sīho bālasūriyātapaṃ tappamāno nipanno hoti. taṃ disvā rājapurisā rañño ārocesuṃ. rājā ``sīho kira na santasatī''ti bheripaṇavādisaddaṃ kārāpesi, sīho tatheva nipajji. dutiyampi kārāpesi, sīho tatheva nipajji. tatiyampi kārāpesi, tadā ``sīho mama paṭisattu atthī''ti catūhi pādehi suppatiṭṭhitaṃ patiṭṭhahitvā sīhanādaṃ nadi. taṃ sutvā hatthārohādayo hatthiādīhi orohitvā tiṇagahanāni paviṭṭhā, hatthiassagaṇā disāvidisā palātā. rañño hatthīpi rājānaṃ gahetvā vanagahanāni pothayamāno palāyi ^a^M1.0221^ea^. rājā taṃ sandhāretuṃ asakkonto rukkhasākhāya olambitvā pathaviṃ patitvā ekapadikamaggena gacchanto paccekabuddhānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pāpuṇi. tattha paccekabuddhe pucchi -- ``api, bhante, saddamassutthā''ti? ``āma, mahārājā''ti. ``kassa saddaṃ, bhante''ti? ``paṭhamaṃ ^a^V1.0204^ea^ bherisaṅkhādīnaṃ, pacchā sīhassā''ti ^a^P0.0200^ea^. ``na bhāyittha, bhante''ti. ``na mayaṃ, mahārāja, kassaci saddassa bhāyāmā''ti. ``sakkā pana, bhante, mayhampi edisaṃ kātu''nti? ``sakkā, mahārāja, sace pabbajissasī''ti. ``pabbajāmi, bhante''ti. tato naṃ pabbājetvā pubbe vuttanayeneva ābhisamācārikaṃ sikkhāpesuṃ. sopi pubbe vuttanayeneva vipassanto paccekabodhiṃ sacchikatvā imaṃ udānagāthaṃ abhāsi.

[03] tattha sahanā ca hananā ca sīghajavattā ca ^b^sīho^eb^. kesarasīhova idha adhippeto. dāṭhā balamassa atthīti ^b^dāṭhabalī. pasayha abhibhuyyā^eb^ti ubhayaṃ ^b^cārī^eb^-saddena saha yojetabbaṃ ^b^pasayhacārī abhibhuyyacārī^eb^ti. tattha pasayha niggahetvā caraṇena pasayhacārī, abhibhavitvā santāsetvā vasīkatvā caraṇena abhibhuyyacārī. svāyaṃ kāyabalena pasayhacārī, tejasā abhibhuyyacārī, tattha sace koci vadeyya -- ``kiṃ pasayha abhibhuyya cārī''ti, tato ^b^migāna^eb^nti sāmivacanaṃ upayogatthe katvā ``mige pasayha abhibhuyya cārī''ti paṭivattabbaṃ. ^b^pantānī^eb^ti dūrāni. ^b^senāsanānī^eb^ti vasanaṭṭhānāni. sesaṃ vuttanayeneva sakkā jānitunti na vitthāritanti.
[06] dāṭhabalīgāthāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 129^b^.^eb^ ^b^mettaṃ upekkha^eb^nti kā uppatti? aññataro kira rājā mettādijhānalābhī ahosi. so ``jhānasukhantarāyo rajja''nti jhānānurakkhaṇatthaṃ rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā vipassanto paccekabodhiṃ sacchikatvā imaṃ udānagāthaṃ abhāsi.

[03] tattha ``sabbe sattā sukhitā bhavantū''tiādinā nayena hitasukhūpanayanakāmatā ^b^mettā^eb^. ``aho vata imamhā dukkhā mucceyyu''ntiādinā nayena ahitadukkhāpanayanakāmatā ^b^karuṇā^eb^. ``modanti vata bhonto sattā, modanti sādhu suṭṭhū''tiādinā nayena hitasukhāvippayogakāmatā ^b^muditā^eb^. ``paññāyissanti sakena kammenā''ti sukhadukkhājjhupekkhanatā ^b^upekkhā^eb^. gāthābandhasukhatthaṃ pana uppaṭipāṭiyā mettaṃ vatvā upekkhā ^a^M1.0222^ea^ vuttā, muditā ca pacchā. ^b^vimutti^eb^nti catassopi etā attano paccanīkadhammehi vimuttattā vimuttiyo. tena vuttaṃ -- ``mettaṃ upekkhaṃ karuṇaṃ vimuttiṃ, āsevamāno muditañca kāle''ti.

[03] tattha ^a^P0.0201^ea^ ^b^āsevamāno^eb^ti tisso tikacatukkajjhānavasena, upekkhaṃ catutthajjhānavasena bhāvayamāno ^a^V1.0205^ea^. ^b^kāle^eb^ti mettaṃ āsevitvā tato vuṭṭhāya karuṇaṃ, tato vuṭṭhāya muditaṃ, tato itarato vā nippītikajjhānato vuṭṭhāya upekkhaṃ āsevamāno eva ``kāle āsevamāno''ti vuccati, āsevituṃ vā phāsukakāle. ^b^sabbena lokena avirujjhamāno^eb^ti dasasu disāsu sabbena sattalokena avirujjhamāno. mettādīnañhi bhāvitattā sattā appaṭikūlā honti, sattesu ca virodhibhūto paṭigho vūpasammati. tena vuttaṃ -- ``sabbena lokena avirujjhamāno''ti. ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana mettādikathā ^b^aṭṭhasāliniyā^eb^ dhammasaṅgahaṭṭhakathāyaṃ (dha0 sa0 aṭṭha0 251) vuttā. sesaṃ vuttasadisamevāti.
[06] appamaññāgāthāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 130^b^.^eb^ ^b^rāgañca dosañcā^eb^ti kā uppatti? rājagahaṃ kira nissāya mātaṅgo nāma paccekabuddho viharati sabbapacchimo paccekabuddhānaṃ. atha amhākaṃ bodhisatte uppanne devatāyo bodhisattassa pūjanatthāya āgacchantiyo taṃ disvā ``mārisā, mārisā, buddho loke uppanno''ti bhaṇiṃsu. so nirodhā vuṭṭhahanto taṃ sutvā attano jīvitakkhayaṃ disvā himavante mahāpapāto nāma pabbato paccekabuddhānaṃ parinibbānaṭṭhānaṃ. tattha ākāsena gantvā pubbe parinibbutapaccekabuddhassa aṭṭhisaṅghātaṃ papāte pakkhipitvā silātale nisīditvā imaṃ udānagāthaṃ abhāsi.

[03] tattha rāgadosamohā uragasutte vuttāva. ^b^saṃyojanānī^eb^ti dasa saṃyojanāni, tāni ca tena tena maggena sandālayitvā. ^b^asantasaṃ jīvitasaṅkhayamhī^eb^ti jīvitasaṅkhayo vuccati cuticittassa paribhedo. tasmiñca jīvitasaṅkhaye jīvitanikantiyā pahīnattā asantasanti. ettāvatā sopādisesaṃ ^a^M1.0223^ea^ nibbānadhātuṃ attano dassetvā gāthāpariyosāne anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyīti.
[06] jīvitasaṅkhayagāthāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 131^b^.^eb^ ^b^bhajantī^eb^ti kā uppatti? bārāṇasiyaṃ kira aññataro rājā ādigāthāya vuttappakārameva phītaṃ rajjaṃ samanusāsati. tassa kharo ābādho uppajji, dukkhā vedanā pavattanti. vīsatisahassitthiyo ^a^P0.0202^ea^ taṃ parivāretvā hatthapādasambāhanādīni karonti. amaccā ``na dānāyaṃ rājā jīvissati, handa, mayaṃ attano saraṇaṃ gavesāmā''ti cintetvā aññatarassa ^a^V1.0206^ea^ rañño santikaṃ gantvā upaṭṭhānaṃ yāciṃsu. te tattha upaṭṭhahantiyeva, na kiñci labhanti. rājā ābādhā vuṭṭhahitvā pucchi -- ``itthannāmo ca itthannāmo ca kuhi''nti? tato taṃ pavattiṃ sutvāva sīsaṃ cāletvā tuṇhī ahosi. tepi amaccā ``rājā vuṭṭhito''ti sutvā tattha kiñci alabhamānā paramena pārijuññena pīḷitā punadeva āgantvā rājānaṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu. tena ca raññā ``kuhiṃ, tātā, tumhe gatā''ti vuttā āhaṃsu -- ``devaṃ dubbalaṃ disvā ājīvikabhayenamhā asukaṃ nāma janapadaṃ gatā''ti. rājā sīsaṃ cāletvā cintesi -- ``yaṃnūnāhaṃ tameva ābādhaṃ dassessaṃ, kiṃ punapi evaṃ kareyyuṃ, no''ti? so pubbe rogena phuṭṭho viya bāḷhaṃ vedanaṃ dassento gilānālayaṃ akāsi. itthiyo samparivāretvā pubbasadisameva sabbaṃ akaṃsu. tepi amaccā tatheva puna bahutaraṃ janaṃ gahetvā pakkamiṃsu. evaṃ rājā yāvatatiyaṃ sabbaṃ pubbasadisaṃ akāsi, tepi tatheva pakkamiṃsu. tato catutthampi te āgate disvā rājā -- ``aho! ime dukkaraṃ akaṃsu, ye maṃ byādhitaṃ pahāya anapekkhā pakkamiṃsū''ti nibbinno rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā vipassanto paccekabodhiṃ sacchikatvā imaṃ udānagāthaṃ abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^b^bhajantī^eb^ti sarīrena allīyantā payirupāsanti. ^b^sevantī^eb^ti añjalikammādīhi kiṃkārapaṭissāvitāya ca paricaranti. kāraṇaṃ attho etesanti ^b^kāraṇatthā,^eb^ bhajanāya ca sevanāya ca nāññaṃ kāraṇamatthi, attho eva nesaṃ kāraṇaṃ, atthahetu sevantīti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^nikkāraṇā^eb^ ^a^M1.0224^ea^ ^b^dullabhā ajja mittā^eb^ti ``ito kiñci lacchāmā''ti evaṃ attapaṭilābhakāraṇena nikkāraṇā, kevalaṃ --
[21] ``upakāro ca yo mitto, yo mitto sukhadukkhako.
[22] atthakkhāyī ca yo mitto, yo mitto anukampako''ti.. (dī0 ni0 3.265) --

[25] evaṃ vuttena ariyena mittabhāvena samannāgatā dullabhā ajja mittā. ^b^attaṭṭhapaññā^eb^ti attani ṭhitā etesaṃ paññā. attānameva oloketi, na aññanti attho. ``attatthapaññā''tipi pāṭho, tassa attano atthameva oloketi, na paratthanti attho. ``diṭṭhatthapaññā''ti ayampi kira porāṇapāṭho, tassa sampati diṭṭheyeva atthe etesaṃ paññā ^a^P0.0203^ea^, na āyatinti attho. diṭṭhadhammikatthaṃyeva oloketi, na samparāyikatthanti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^asucī^eb^ti asucinā anariyena kāyavacīmanokammena samannāgatā.

[03] ^b^khaggavisāṇakappo^eb^ti ^a^V1.0207^ea^ khaggena rukkhādayo chindanto viya sakasiṅgena pabbatādayo cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ kurumāno vicaratīti khaggavisāṇo. visasadisā āṇāti visāṇā. khaggaṃ viyāti khaggaṃ. khaggaṃ visāṇaṃ yassa migassa soyaṃ migo khaggavisāṇo, tassa khaggavisāṇassa kappo khaggavisāṇakappo. khaggavisāṇasadiso paccekabuddho ^b^eko^eb^ adutiyo asahāyo careyya vihareyya vatteyya yapeyya yāpeyyāti attho.

[03] 132^b^.^eb^ ^b^visuddhasīlā^eb^ti visesena suddhasīlā, catupārisuddhiyā suddhasīlā. ^b^suvisuddhapaññā^eb^ti suṭṭhu visuddhapaññā, rāgādivirahitattā parisuddhamaggaphalapaṭisambhidādipaññā. ^b^samāhitā^eb^ti ^b^saṃ^eb^ suṭṭhu āhitā, santike ṭhapitacittā. ^b^jāgariyānuyuttā^eb^ti jāgaraṇaṃ jāgaro, niddātikkamoti attho. jāgarassa bhāvo jāgariyaṃ, jāgariye anuyuttā jāgariyānuyuttā. ^b^vipassakā^eb^ti ``aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā''ti visesena passanasīlā, vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā viharantīti attho. ^b^dhammavisesadassī^eb^ti dasakusaladhammānaṃ ^a^M1.0225^ea^ catusaccadhammassa navalokuttaradhammassa vā visesena passanasīlā. ^b^maggaṅgabojjhaṅgagate^eb^ti sammādiṭṭhādīhi maggaṅgehi satisambojjhaṅgādīhi bojjhaṅgehi gate sampayutte ariyadhamme. ^b^vijaññā^eb^ti visesena jaññā, jānantāti attho.

[03] 133^b^.^eb^ ^b^suññatāppaṇihitañcānimitta^eb^nti anattānupassanāvasena suññatavimokkhañca dukkhānupassanāvasena appaṇihitavimokkhañca, aniccānupassanāvasena animittavimokkhañca. ^b^āsevayitvā^eb^ti vaḍḍhetvā. ^b^ye^eb^ katasambhārā ^b^dhīrā^eb^ janā ^b^jinasāsanamhi sāvakattaṃ^eb^ sāvakabhāvaṃ ^b^na vajanti^eb^ na pāpuṇanti, te dhīrā katasambhārā ^b^sayambhū^eb^ sayameva bhūtā ^b^paccekajinā^eb^ paccekabuddhā ^b^bhavanti^eb^.

[03] 134^b^.^eb^ kiṃ bhūtā? ^b^mahantadhammā^eb^ pūritamahāsambhārā ^b^bahudhammakāyā^eb^ anekadhammasabhāvasarīrā. punapi kiṃ bhūtā? ^b^cittissarā^eb^ cittagatikā jhānasampannāti attho. ^b^sabbadukkhoghatiṇṇā^eb^ sakalasaṃsāraoghaṃ tiṇṇā atikkantā ^b^udaggacittā^eb^ kodhamānādikilesavirahitattā somanassacittā santamanāti attho. ^b^paramatthadassī^eb^ pañcakkhandhadvādasāyatanadvattiṃsākārasaccapaṭiccasamuppādādivasena ^a^P0.0204^ea^ paramatthaṃ uttamatthaṃ dassanasīlā. acalābhītaṭṭhena ^b^sīhopamā^eb^ sīhasadisāti attho. ^b^khaggavisāṇakappā^eb^ khaggavisāṇamigasiṅgasadisā gaṇasaṅgaṇikābhāvenāti attho.

[03] 135^b^.^eb^ ^b^santindriyā^eb^ti cakkhundriyādīnaṃ sakasakārammaṇe appavattanato santasabhāvaindriyā ^a^V1.0208^ea^. ^b^santamanā^eb^ti santacittā, nikkilesabhāvena santasabhāvacittasaṅkappāti attho. ^b^samādhī^eb^ti suṭṭhu ekaggacittā. ^b^paccantasattesu patippacārā^eb^ti paccantajanapadesu sattesu dayākaruṇādīhi paticaraṇasīlā. ^b^dīpā parattha idha vijjalantā^eb^ti sakalalokānuggahakaraṇena paraloke ca idhaloke ca vijjalantā dīpā padīpasadisāti attho. ^b^paccekabuddhā satataṃ hitāme^eb^ti ime paccekabuddhā satataṃ sabbakālaṃ sakalalokahitāya paṭipannāti attho.

[03] 136^b^.^eb^ ^b^pahīnasabbāvaraṇā^eb^ ^a^M1.0226^ea^ ^b^janindā^eb^ti te paccekabuddhā janānaṃ indā uttamā kāmacchandanīvaraṇādīnaṃ sabbesaṃ pañcāvaraṇānaṃ pahīnattā pahīnasabbāvaraṇā. ^b^ghanakañcanābhā^eb^ti rattasuvaṇṇajambonadasuvaṇṇapabhā sadisāabhāvantāti attho. ^b^nissaṃsayaṃ lokasudakkhiṇeyyā^eb^ti ekantena lokassa sudakkhiṇāya aggadānassa paṭiggahetuṃ arahā yuttā, nikkilesattā sundaradānapaṭiggahaṇārahāti attho. ^b^paccekabuddhā satatappitāme^eb^ti ime paccekañāṇādhigamā buddhā satataṃ niccakālaṃ appitā suhitā paripuṇṇā, sattāhaṃ nirāhārāpi nirodhasamāpattiphalasamāpattivasena paripuṇṇāti attho.
[03] 137^b^.^eb^ patiekā visuṃ sammāsambuddhato visadisā aññe asādhāraṇabuddhā ^b^paccekabuddhā^eb^. atha vā --
[21] ``upasaggā nipātā ca, paccayā ca ime tayo.
[22] nekenekatthavisayā, iti neruttikābravu''nti.. --

[25] vuttattā patisaddassa ekaupasaggatā pati padhāno hutvā sāmibhūto anekesaṃ dāyakānaṃ appamattakampi āhāraṃ paṭiggahetvā saggamokkhassa pāpuṇanato. tathā hi annabhārassa bhattabhāgaṃ paṭiggahetvāpassantasseva bhuñjitvā devatāhi sādhukāraṃ dāpetvā tadaheva taṃ duggataṃ seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ pāpetvā koṭisaṅkhadhanuppādanena ca, khadiraṅgārajātake (jā0 aṭṭha0 1.1.khadiraṅgārajātakavaṇṇanā) mārena nimmitakhadiraṅgārakūpopariuṭṭhitapadumakaṇṇikaṃ madditvā bodhisattena dinnaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paṭiggahetvā tassa passantasseva ākāsagamanena somanassuppādanena ca, padumavatīaggamahesīputtānaṃ mahājanakarañño deviyā ^a^P0.0205^ea^ ārādhanena gandhamādanato ākāsena āgamma dānapaṭiggahaṇena mahājanakabodhisattassa ca deviyā ca somanassuppādanena ca, tathā abuddhuppāde chātakabhaye sakalajambudīpe uppanne bārāṇasiseṭṭhino chātakabhayaṃ paṭicca pūretvā rakkhite saṭṭhisahassakoṭṭhāgāre vīhayo khepetvā bhūmiyaṃ nikhātadhaññāni ca cāṭisahassesu pūritadhaññāni ^a^V1.0209^ea^ ca khepetvā sakalapāsādabhittīsu mattikāhi madditvā limpitadhaññāni ca khepetvā tadā nāḷimattamevāvasiṭṭhaṃ ``idaṃ bhuñjitvā ajja marissāmā''ti ^a^M1.0227^ea^ cittaṃ uppādetvā sayantassa gandhamādanato eko paccekabuddho āgantvā gehadvāre aṭṭhāsi. seṭṭhi taṃ disvā pasādaṃ uppādetvā jīvitaṃ pariccajamāno paccekabuddhassa patte okiri. paccekabuddho vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā attano ānubhāvena passantasseva seṭṭhissa pañcapaccekabuddhasatehi saha paribhuñji. tadā bhattapacitaukkhaliṃ, pidahitvā ṭhapesuṃ.

[03] niddamokkantassa seṭṭhino chātatte uppanne so vuṭṭhahitvā bhariyaṃ āha -- ``bhatte ācāmakabhattamattaṃ olokehī''ti. susikkhitā sā ``sabbaṃ dinnaṃ nanū''ti avatvā ukkhaliyā pidhānaṃ vivari. sā ukkhali taṅkhaṇeva sumanapupphamakuḷasadisassa sugandhasālibhattassa pūritā ahosi. sā ca seṭṭhi ca santuṭṭhā sayañca sakalagehavāsino ca sakalanagaravāsino ca bhuñjiṃsu. dabbiyā gahitagahitaṭṭhānaṃ puna pūritaṃ. sakalasaṭṭhisahassakoṭṭhāgāresu sugandhasāliyo pūresuṃ. sakalajambudīpavāsino seṭṭhissa gehatoyeva dhaññabījāni gahetvā sukhitā jātā. evamādīsu anekasattanikāyesu sukhotaraṇaparipālanasaggamokkhapāpanesu pati sāmibhūto buddhoti paccekabuddho. ^b^paccekabuddhānaṃ subhāsitānī^eb^ti paccekabuddhehi ovādānusāsanīvasena suṭṭhu bhāsitāni kathitāni vacanāni. ^b^caranti lokamhi sadevakamhī^eb^ti devalokasahite sattaloke caranti pavattantīti attho. ^b^sutvā tathā ye na karonti bālā^eb^ti tathārūpaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ subhāsitavacanaṃ ye bālā janā na karonti na manasi karonti, ^b^te^eb^ bālā ^b^dukkhesu^eb^ saṃsāradukkhesu ^b^punappunaṃ^eb^ uppattivasena ^b^caranti^eb^ pavattanti, dhāvantīti attho.

[03] 138^b^.^eb^ ^b^paccekabuddhānaṃ subhāsitānī^eb^ti suṭṭhu bhāsitāni caturāpāyato muccanatthāya bhāsitāni vacanāni. kiṃ bhūtāni? ^b^avassavantaṃ^eb^ pagghantaṃ khuddaṃ madhuṃ yathā madhuravacanānīti attho. ^b^ye paṭipattiyuttā^eb^ paṇḍitajanāpi paṭipattīsu vuttānusārena pavattantā tathārūpaṃ madhuravacanaṃ sutvā vacanakarā bhavanti, te paṇḍitajanā ^a^P0.0206^ea^ ^b^saccadasā^eb^ catusaccadassino ^b^sapaññā^eb^ paññāsahitā bhavantīti attho.

[03] 139^b^.^eb^ ^b^paccekabuddhehi^eb^ ^a^M1.0228^ea^ ^b^jinehi bhāsitā^eb^ti kilese jinanti jiniṃsūti jinā, tehi jinehi paccekabuddhehi vuttā bhāsitā kathitā. ^b^kathā uḷārā^eb^ ojavantā pākaṭā santi pavattanti. ^b^tā,^eb^ kathā ^b^sakyasīhena^eb^ sakyarājavaṃsasīhena gotamena tathāgatena ^b^abhinikkhamitvā^eb^ buddhabhūtena ^a^V1.0210^ea^ ^b^naruttamena^eb^ narānaṃ uttamena seṭṭhena ^b^pakāsitā^eb^ pākaṭīkatā desitāti sambandho. kimatthanti āha ^b^``dhammavijānanattha''^eb^nti. navalokuttaradhammaṃ visesena jānāpanatthanti attho.

[03] 140^b^.^eb^ ^b^lokānukampāya imāni tesa^eb^nti lokānukampatāya lokassa anukampaṃ paṭicca imāni vacanāni imā gāthāyo. tesaṃ ^b^paccekabuddhānaṃ vikubbitāni^eb^ visesena kubbitāni bhāsitānīti attho. ^b^saṃvegasaṅgamativaḍḍhanattha^eb^nti paṇḍitānaṃ saṃvegavaḍḍhanatthañca asaṅgavaḍḍhanatthaṃ ekībhāvavaḍḍhanatthañca mativaḍḍhanatthaṃ paññāvaḍḍhanatthañca ^b^sayambhusīhena^eb^ anācariyakena hutvā sayameva bhūtena jātena paṭividdhena sīhena abhītena gotamena sammāsambuddhena imāni vacanāni ^b^pakāsitāni,^eb^ imā gāthāyo pakāsitā vivaritā uttānīkatāti attho. ^b^itī^eb^ti parisamāpanatthe nipāto.
[06] iti visuddhajanavilāsiniyā apadāna-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] paccekabuddhāpadānasaṃvaṇṇanā samattā.

[03] tadanantaraṃ ^a^V1.0211^ea^ therāpadānasaṅgahagāthāyo saṃvaṇṇetuṃ ^b^``atha therāpadānaṃ suṇāthā''^eb^ti āha. ^b^atha-apadāna^eb^-saddānamattho heṭṭhā vuttova. ettha ^b^thera^eb^-saddo panāyaṃ kālathirapaññattināmadheyyajeṭṭhādīsu anekesu atthesu vattati. tathā hi ``therovassikāni pūtīni cuṇṇakajātānī''tiādīsu (dī0 ni0 2.379; ma0 ni0 1.112) kāle, therovassikāni cirakālaṃ ovassikānīti attho. ``theropi tāva mahā''iccādīsu thire thirasīloti attho. ``therako ayamāyasmā mahallako''tiādīsu paññattiyaṃ ^a^M1.0229^ea^, lokapaññattimattoti attho. ``cundatthero phussatthero''tiādīsu ^a^P0.0207^ea^ nāmadheyye, evaṃ katanāmoti attho. ``thero cāyaṃ kumāro mama puttesū''tiādīsu jeṭṭhe, jeṭṭho kumāroti attho. idha panāyaṃ kāle ca thire ca vattati. tasmā ciraṃ kālaṃ ṭhitoti thero, thiratarasīlācāramaddavādiguṇābhiyutto vā theroti vuccati. thero ca thero ceti therā, therānaṃ apadānaṃ kāraṇaṃ ^b^therāpadānaṃ,^eb^ taṃ therāpadānaṃ suṇāthāti sambandho. ^b^himavantassa avidūre, lambako nāma pabbato^eb^tiādi āyasmato sāriputtattherassa apadānaṃ, tassāyasmato mahāmoggallānattherassa ca vatthu evaṃ veditabbaṃ --

[03] atīte kira ito kappato satasahassakappādhike ekāsaṅkhyeyyamatthake āyasmā sāriputto brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbattitvā nāmena saradamāṇavo nāma ahosi. mahāmoggallāno gahapatimahāsālakule nibbattitvā nāmena sirivaḍḍhanakuṭumbiko nāma ahosi. te ubhopi sahapaṃsukīḷanasahāyā ahesuṃ. tesu saradamāṇavo pitu accayena kulasantakaṃ dhanaṃ paṭipajjitvā ekadivasaṃ rahogato cintesi -- ``imesaṃ sattānaṃ maraṇaṃ nāma ekantikaṃ, tasmā mayā ekaṃ pabbajjaṃ upagantvā vimokkhamaggo gavesitabbo''ti sahāyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ``samma, ahaṃ pabbajitukāmo. kiṃ tvaṃ pabbajituṃ sakkhissasī''ti vatvā tena ``na sakkhissāmī''ti vutte ``hotu ahameva pabbajissāmī''ti ratanakoṭṭhāgārāni vivarāpetvā kapaṇaddhikādīnaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā pabbatapādaṃ gantvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbaji. tassa pabbajitassa anupabbajjaṃ pabbajitā catusattatisahassamattā brāhmaṇaputtā ahesuṃ. so pañca abhiññāyo aṭṭha ca samāpattiyo nibbattetvā tesampi jaṭilānaṃ kasiṇaparikammaṃ ācikkhi. te sabbepi pañcābhiññā aṭṭha ca samāpattiyo nibbattisuṃ.

[03] tena samayena anomadassī nāma sammāsambuddho loke uppajjitvā pavattitavaradhammacakko satte ^a^V1.0212^ea^ saṃsāramahoghato tāretvā ekadivasaṃ saradatāpasassa ca antevāsikānañca saṅgahaṃ kattukāmo eko ^a^M1.0230^ea^ adutiyo pattacīvaramādāya ākāsena gantvā ``buddhabhāvaṃ me jānātū''ti tāpasassa passantasseva ākāsato otaritvā pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāsi. saradatāpaso satthu sarīre mahāpurisalakkhaṇāni upadhāretvā ``sabbaññubuddhoyevāya''nti niṭṭhaṃ gantvā paccuggamanaṃ katvā āsanaṃ paññāpetvā adāsi. nisīdi bhagavā paññatte āsane. saradatāpaso satthu santike ekamantaṃ nisīdi.

[03] tasmiṃ samaye tassa antevāsikā catusattatisahassamattā jaṭilā paṇītapaṇītāni ^a^P0.0208^ea^ ojavantāni phalāphalāni gahetvā āgatā satthāraṃ disvā sañjātapasādā attano ācariyassa satthu ca nisinnākāraṃ oloketvā ``ācariya, mayaṃ pubbe `tumhehi mahantataro koci natthī'ti maññāma, ayaṃ pana puriso tumhehi mahantataro maññe''ti āhaṃsu. kiṃ vadetha, tātā, sāsapena saddhiṃ aṭṭhasaṭṭhiyojanasatasahassubbedhaṃ sineruṃ samaṃ kātuṃ icchatha, sabbaññubuddhena maṃ tulaṃ mā karitthāti. atha te tāpasā ācariyassa vacanaṃ sutvā ``yāva mahā vatāyaṃ purisuttamo''ti sabbeva pādesu nipatitvā satthāraṃ vandiṃsu.

[03] atha te ācariyo āha -- ``tātā, satthu anucchaviko no deyyadhammo natthi, satthā ca bhikkhācaravelāya idhāgato, handa, mayaṃ deyyadhammaṃ yathābalaṃ dassāma. tumhehi yaṃ yaṃ paṇītaṃ phalāphalaṃ ābhataṃ, taṃ taṃ āharathā''ti āharāpetvā hatthe dhovitvā sayaṃ tathāgatassa patte patiṭṭhāpesi. satthārā phalāphale paṭiggahitamatte devatā dibbojaṃ pakkhipiṃsu. tāpaso udakampi sayameva parissāvetvā adāsi. tato bhojanakiccaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā satthari nisinne sabbe antevāsike pakkosāpetvā satthu santike sāraṇīyaṃ kathaṃ kathento nisīdi. satthā ``dve aggasāvakā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ āgacchantū''ti cintesi. tāvadeva satasahassakhīṇāsavaparivārā aggasāvakā āgantvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu.

[03] tato saradatāpaso antevāsike āmantesi -- ``tātā, satthu bhikkhusaṅghassa ca pupphāsanena pūjā kātabbā, tasmā pupphāni āharathā''ti. te tāvadeva iddhiyā vaṇṇagandhasampannāni pupphāni āharitvā buddhassa yojanappamāṇaṃ pupphāsanaṃ paññāpesuṃ, ubhinnaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ tigāvutaṃ ^a^M1.0231^ea^, sesabhikkhūnaṃ aḍḍhayojanikādibhedaṃ, saṅghanavakassa usabhamattaṃ paññāpesuṃ. evaṃ paññattesu āsanesu saradatāpaso tathāgatassa purato añjaliṃ paggayha ``bhante, mayhaṃ anuggahatthāya imaṃ pupphāsanaṃ atiruhathā''ti āha. nisīdi bhagavā pupphāsane ^a^V1.0213^ea^. satthari nisinne dve aggasāvakā sesabhikkhū ca attano attano pattāsane nisīdiṃsu. satthā ``tesaṃ mahapphalaṃ hotū''ti nirodhaṃ samāpajji. satthu samāpannabhāvaṃ ñatvā dve aggasāvakāpi sesabhikkhūpi nirodhaṃ samāpajjiṃsu. tāpaso sattāhaṃ nirantaraṃ satthu pupphacchattaṃ dhārento aṭṭhāsi. itare vanamūlaphalaṃ paribhuñjitvā sesakāle añjaliṃ paggayha aṭṭhaṃsu. satthā sattāhassa accayena nirodhato vuṭṭhahitvā aggasāvakaṃ nisabhattheraṃ āmantesi -- ``tāpasānaṃ pupphāsanānumodanaṃ karohī''ti. thero sāvakapāramīñāṇe ṭhatvā tesaṃ pupphāsanānumodanaṃ ^a^P0.0209^ea^ akāsi. tassa desanāvasāne satthā dutiyaṃ aggasāvakaṃ anomattheraṃ āmantesi -- ``tvampi imesaṃ dhammaṃ desehī''ti. sopi tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ sammasitvā tesaṃ dhammaṃ kathesi. dvinnampi desanāya dhammābhisamayo nāhosi. atha satthā buddhavisaye ṭhatvā dhammadesanaṃ ārabhi. desanāvasāne ṭhapetvā saradatāpasaṃ avasesā sabbepi catusattatisahassajaṭilā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. satthā te ``etha bhikkhavo''ti hatthaṃ pasāresi. te tāvadeva antarahitatāpasavesā aṭṭhaparikkhāradharā saṭṭhivassikatthero viya ahesuṃ.

[03] saradatāpaso pana ``aho vatāhampi ayaṃ nisabhatthero viya anāgate ekassa buddhassa sāvako bhaveyya''nti desanākāle uppannaparivitakkatāya aññavihito hutvā maggaphalāni paṭivijjhituṃ nāsakkhi. atha satthāraṃ vanditvā tathā paṇidhānaṃ akāsi. satthā anantarāyena samijjhanabhāvaṃ disvā ``ito kappasatasahassādhikaṃ ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ atikkamitvā gotamassa nāma sammāsambuddhassa aggasāvako sāriputto nāma bhavissatī''ti byākaritvā dhammakathaṃ vatvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivāro ākāsaṃ pakkhandi. saradatāpasopi sahāyassa sirivaḍḍhassa santikaṃ gantvā ``samma, mayā anomadassissa bhagavato pādamūle anāgate uppajjanakassa gotamasammāsambuddhassa aggasāvakaṭṭhānaṃ patthitaṃ, tvampi tassa dutiyasāvakaṭṭhānaṃ ^a^M1.0232^ea^ patthehī''ti. sirivaḍḍho taṃ upadesaṃ sutvā attano nivesanadvāre aṭṭhakarīsamattaṃ ṭhānaṃ samatalaṃ kāretvā lājapañcamāni pupphāni vikiritvā nīluppalacchadanaṃ maṇḍapaṃ kāretvā buddhāsanaṃ paññāpetvā bhikkhūnampi āsanāni paññāpetvā mahantaṃ sakkārasammānaṃ sajjetvā saradatāpasena satthāraṃ nimantāpetvā sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ pavattetvā buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ mahārahehi vatthehi acchādetvā dutiyasāvakabhāvāya paṇidhānaṃ akāsi. satthā tassa anantarāyena samijjhanabhāvaṃ disvā vuttanayena byākaritvā bhattānumodanaṃ katvā pakkāmi. sirivaḍḍho haṭṭhapahaṭṭho yāvajīvaṃ kusalakammaṃ katvā dutiyacittavāre kāmāvacaradevaloke nibbatti. saradatāpaso cattāro brahmavihāre bhāvetvā brahmaloke nibbatti.

[03] tato ^a^V1.0214^ea^ paṭṭhāya tesaṃ ubhinnampi antarā kammaṃ na kathitaṃ. amhākaṃ pana bhagavato uppattito puretarameva saradatāpaso rājagahassa avidūre upatissāgāme rūpasāriyā brāhmaṇiyā kucchimhi ^a^P0.0210^ea^ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. taṃdivasamevassa sahāyopi rājagahasseva avidūre kolitagāme moggaliyā brāhmaṇiyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. tasmā moggallāno moggaliyā brāhmaṇiyā puttoti moggallāno. moggaligottena jātoti vā moggallāno. atha vā mātukumārikakāle tassā mātāpitūhi vuttaṃ -- ``mā uggali mā uggalī''ti vacanamupādāya ``muggalī''ti nāmaṃ. tassā muggaliyā puttoti moggallāno. atha vā sotāpattimaggādimaggassa lābhe ādāne paṭivijjhane alaṃ samatthoti moggallānoti. tāni kira dve kulāni yāva sattamā kulaparivaṭṭā ābaddhasahāyāneva. tesaṃ dvinnaṃ ekadivasameva gabbhaparihāramadaṃsu. dasamāsaccayena jātānampi tesaṃ chasaṭṭhi dhātiyo paṭṭhapesuṃ. nāmaggahaṇadivase rūpasārībrāhmaṇiyā puttassa upatissagāme jeṭṭhakulassa puttattā ^b^upatisso^eb^ti nāmaṃ kariṃsu. itarassa kolitagāme jeṭṭhakulassa puttattā ^b^kolito^eb^ti nāmaṃ kariṃsu. te ubhopi mahatā parivārena vaḍḍhantā vuddhimanvāya sabbasippānaṃ pāraṃ agamaṃsu.

[03] athekadivasaṃ ^a^M1.0233^ea^ te rājagahe giraggasamajjaṃ passantā mahājanaṃ sannipatitaṃ disvā ñāṇassa paripākaṃ gatattā yoniso ummujjantā ``sabbepime oraṃ vassasatāva maccumukhaṃ pavisantī''ti saṃvegaṃ paṭilabhitvā ``amhehi mokkhadhammo pariyesitabbo, tañca pariyesantehi ekā pabbajjā laddhuṃ vaṭṭatī''ti nicchayaṃ katvā pañcamāṇavakasatehi saddhiṃ sañcayassa paribbājakassa santike pabbajiṃsu. tesaṃ pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya sañcayo lābhaggayasaggappatto ahosi. te katipāheneva sabbaṃ sañcayassa samayaṃ parimajjitvā tattha sāraṃ adisvā tato nibbijjitvā tattha tattha paṇḍitasammate samaṇabrāhmaṇe pañhaṃ pucchanti, te tehi puṭṭhā na sampādenti. aññadatthu teyeva tesaṃ pañhaṃ vissajjenti. evaṃ te mokkhaṃ pariyesantā katikaṃ akaṃsu -- ``amhesu yo paṭhamaṃ amataṃ adhigacchati, so itarassa ārocetū''ti.

[03] tena ca samayena amhākaṃ satthari paṭhamābhisambodhiṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakke anupubbena uruvelakassapādike sahassajaṭile dametvā rājagahe viharante ekadivasaṃ upatisso paribbājako paribbājakārāmaṃ gacchanto āyasmantaṃ assajittheraṃ rājagahe piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā ``na mayā evarūpo ākappasampanno pabbajito diṭṭhapubbo, santadhammena nāma ettha bhavitabba''nti sañjātapasādo pañhaṃ pucchituṃ āyasmantaṃ udikkhanto piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhi. theropi laddhapiṇḍapāto paribhuñjituṃ patirūpaṃ okāsaṃ gato. paribbājako attano paribbājakapīṭhaṃ ^a^V1.0215^ea^ paññāpetvā adāsi. bhattakiccapariyosāne ^a^P0.0211^ea^ cassa attano kuṇḍikāya udakaṃ adāsi. evaṃ so ācariyavattaṃ katvā katabhattakiccena therena saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ katvā -- ``ko vā te satthā, kassa vā tvaṃ dhammaṃ rocesī''ti pucchi. thero sammāsambuddhaṃ apadisi. puna tena ``kiṃ vādī panāyasmato satthā''ti puṭṭho ``imassa sāsanassa gambhīrataṃ dassessāmī''ti attano navakabhāvaṃ pavedetvā saṅkhepavasena cassa sāsanadhammaṃ kathento ``ye dhammā hetuppabhavā''ti (mahāva0 60; apa0 thera 1.1.286) gāthamāha. paribbājako paṭhamapadadvayameva sutvā sahassanayasampanne sotāpattimaggaphale patiṭṭhahi. itaraṃ padadvayaṃ sotāpannakāle niṭṭhāsi. gāthāpariyosāne pana sotāpanno hutvā uparivisese apavattante ``bhavissati ettha kāraṇa''nti sallakkhetvā ^a^M1.0234^ea^ theraṃ āha -- ``mā, bhante, upari dhammadesanaṃ vaḍḍhayittha, ettakameva alaṃ, kahaṃ amhākaṃ satthā vasatī''ti? ``veḷuvane''ti. ``bhante, tumhe purato gacchatha, ahaṃ mayhaṃ sahāyassa katapaṭiññaṃ mocetvā taṃ gahetvā āgamissāmī''ti pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā theraṃ uyyojetvā paribbājakārāmaṃ agamāsi.

[03] kolitaparibbājako taṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ disvā ``mukhavaṇṇo na aññadivasesu viya addhānena amataṃ adhigataṃ bhavissatī''ti tenevassa visesādhigamaṃ sambhāvetvā amatādhigamaṃ pucchi. sopissa ``āvuso, amatamadhigata''nti paṭijānitvā tameva gāthaṃ abhāsi. gāthāpariyosāne kolito sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahitvā āha -- ``kahaṃ no satthā''ti? ``veḷuvane''ti. ``tena hi, āvuso, āyāma, satthāraṃ passissāmā''ti. upatisso sabbakālampi ācariyapūjakova, tasmā sañcayassa satthu guṇe pakāsetvā tampi satthu santikaṃ netukāmo ahosi. so lābhāsāpakato antevāsikabhāvaṃ anicchanto ``na sakkomi cāṭi hutvā udakasiñcanaṃ hotu''nti paṭikkhipi. te anekehi kāraṇehi taṃ saññāpetuṃ asakkontā attano ovāde vattamānehi aḍḍhuteyyasatehi antevāsikehi saddhiṃ veḷuvanaṃ agamaṃsu. satthā te dūratova āgacchante disvā ``etaṃ me sāvakayugaṃ bhavissati, aggaṃ bhaddayuga''nti vatvā tesaṃ parisāya cariyavasena dhammaṃ desetvā arahatte patiṭṭhāpetvā ehibhikkhubhāvena upasampadaṃ adāsi. yathā tesaṃ evaṃ aggasāvakānampi iddhimayapattacīvaraṃ āgatameva. uparimaggattayakiccaṃ pana na niṭṭhāsi. kasmā? sāvakapāramīñāṇassa mahantatāya.

[03] tesu āyasmā mahāmoggallāno pabbajitato sattame divase magadharaṭṭhe kallavālagāme samaṇadhammaṃ karonto thinamiddhe okkamante satthārā ^a^P0.0212^ea^ saṃvejito thinamiddhaṃ vinodetvā dhātukammaṭṭhānaṃ ^a^V1.0216^ea^ suṇanto eva uparimaggattayaṃ adhigantvā sāvakapāramīñāṇassa matthakaṃ pāpuṇi. āyasmā sāriputto pabbajjāya addhamāsaṃ atikkamitvā satthārā saddhiṃ rājagahe sūkarakhataleṇe viharanto attano bhāgineyyassa dīghanakhaparibbājakassa ^a^M1.0235^ea^ vedanāpariggahasuttante (ma0 ni0 2.201 ādayo) desiyamāne desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā parassa vaḍḍhitaṃ bhattaṃ bhuñjanto viya sāvakapāramīñāṇassa matthakaṃ pāpuṇi. iti dvinnaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ satthu samīpe eva sāvakapāramīñāṇaṃ matthakaṃ pattaṃ.
[03] evaṃ pattasāvakapāramīñāṇo āyasmā sāriputto ``kena kammena ayaṃ sampatti laddhā''ti āvajjento taṃ ñatvā pītisomanassavasena udānaṃ udānento ``himavantassa avidūre''tiādimāha. tena vuttaṃ --
[21] ``himavantassa avidūre, lambako nāma pabbato.
[22] assamo sukato mayhaṃ, paṇṇasālā sumāpitā''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^himavantassā^eb^ti himo assa atthīti himavā, tassa himavantassa ^b^avidūre^eb^ samīpe, himālayapaṭibaddhavanehi attho. ^b^lambako nāma pabbato^eb^ti evaṃnāmako paṃsumissakapabbato. ^b^assamo sukato mayha^eb^nti tasmiṃ lambake pabbate mayhaṃ mamatthāya kato assamo araññavāso āsamantato samoti assamo. natthi paviṭṭhānaṃ samo parissamo etthāti vā assamo, so itthambhūto araññavāso suṭṭhu kato, rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānakuṭimaṇḍapādivasena sundarenākārena katoti attho. ^b^paṇṇasālā^eb^ti usīrapabbajādīhi paṇṇehi chāditā nivasanapaṇṇasālāti attho.
[21] ``uttānakūlā nadikā, supatitthā manoramā.
[22] susuddhapulinākiṇṇā, avidūre mamassamaṃ''..

[03] tattha ^b^uttānakūlā^eb^ti agambhīrā nadī. ^b^supatitthā^eb^ti sundarapatitthā. ^b^manoramā^eb^ manallīnā manāpā. ^b^susuddhapulinākiṇṇā^eb^ti suṭṭhu dhavalamuttādalasadisavālukākiṇṇā gahanībhūtāti attho. sā itthambhūtā ^b^nadikā^eb^ kunnadī ^b^mamassamaṃ^eb^ mayhaṃ assamassa avidūre samīpe ahosīti attho. ``assama''nti ca sattamyatthe upayogavacananti veditabbaṃ.
[21] ``asakkharā ^a^V1.0217^ea^ ^a^P0.0213^ea^ apabbhārā, sādu appaṭigandhikā.
[22] sandatī nadikā tattha, sobhayantā mamassamaṃ''..

[03] tattha ^a^M1.0236^ea^ ^b^asakkharā^eb^ti ``pulinākiṇṇā''ti vuttattā asakkharā sakkharavirahitā. ^b^apabbhārā^eb^ti pabbhāravirahitā, agambhīrakūlāti attho. ^b^sādu appaṭigandhikā^eb^ti sādurasodakā duggandharahitā mayhaṃ assamapadaṃ sobhayantī ^b^nadikā^eb^ khuddakanadī ^b^sandati^eb^ pavattatīti attho.
[21] ``kumbhīlā makarā cettha, susumārā ca kacchapā.
[22] sandati nadikā tattha, sobhayantā mamassamaṃ''..

[03] tattha ^b^kumbhīla^eb^macchā ^b^makara^eb^macchā ca ^b^susumārā^eb^ caṇḍamacchā ca ^b^kacchapa^eb^macchā ca ^b^ettha^eb^ etissaṃ nadiyaṃ kīḷantā ahesunti sambandho. mamassamaṃ sobhayantā ^b^nadikā^eb^ khuddakanadī ^b^sandati^eb^ pavattatīti sambandho.
[21] ``pāṭhīnā pāvusā macchā, balajā muñjarohitā.
[22] vaggaḷā papatāyantā, sobhayanti mamassamaṃ''..

[03] ^b^pāṭhīna^eb^macchā ca ^b^pāvusā macchā^eb^ ca ^b^balaja^eb^macchā ca ^b^muñja^eb^macchā ^b^rohita^eb^macchā ca ^b^vaggaḷa^eb^macchā ca ete sabbe macchajātikā ito cito ca ^b^papatāyantā^eb^ nadiyā saddhiṃ pavattantā mama assamapadaṃ sobhayantīti attho.
[21] ``ubho kūlesu nadiyā, pupphino phalino dumā.
[22] ubhato abhilambantā, sobhayanti mamassamaṃ''..

[03] tattha ^b^ubho kūlesū^eb^ti tassā nadiyā ubhosu passesu dhuva^b^pupphino^eb^ dhuva^b^phalino^eb^ rukkhā ^b^ubhato abhilambantā^eb^ nadiyā ubho tīre heṭṭhā onamantā mama assamaṃ sobhayantīti attho.
[21] ``ambā sālā ca tilakā, pāṭalī sinduvārakā.
[22] dibbagandhā sampavanti, pupphitā mama assame''..

[03] tattha ^a^V1.0218^ea^ ^b^ambā^eb^ti madhupiṇḍiambā ca ^b^sāla^eb^rukkhā ca ^b^tilaka^eb^rukkhā ca ^b^pāṭali^eb^rukkhā ca ^b^sinduvāraka^eb^rukkhā ca ete rukkhā niccakālaṃ ^b^pupphitā^eb^ ^a^P0.0214^ea^ pupphantā. dibbā gandhā iva mama assame sugandhā ^b^sampavanti^eb^ samantato pavāyantīti attho.
[21] ``campakā ^a^M1.0237^ea^ saḷalā nīpā, nāgapunnāgaketakā.
[22] dibbagandhā sampavanti, pupphitā mama assame''..

[03] tattha ^b^campaka^eb^rukkhā ca ^b^saḷala^eb^rukkhā ca suvaṇṇavaṭṭalasadisapupphā ^b^nīpa^eb^rukkhā ca ^b^nāga^eb^rukkhā ca ^b^punnāga^eb^rukkhā ca sugandhayantā ^b^ketaka^eb^rukkhā ca ete sabbe rukkhā dibbā gandhāriva mama assame ^b^pupphitā^eb^ phullitā ^b^sampavanti^eb^ sugandhaṃ suṭṭhu pavāyantīti attho.
[21] asokā ca``adhimuttā asokā ca, bhaginīmālā ca pupphitā.
[22] aṅkolā bimbijālā ca, pupphitā mama assame''..

[03] tattha pupphitā ^b^adhimuttaka^eb^rukkhā ca pupphitā ^b^asoka^eb^rukkhā ca pupphitā ^b^bhaginīmālā ca^eb^ pupphitā ^b^aṅkolā^eb^ ca pupphitā ^b^bimbijālā^eb^ ca ete rukkhā mama assame phullitā sobhayantīti sambandho.
[21] ``ketakā kandali ceva, godhukā tiṇasūlikā.
[22] dibbagandhaṃ sampavantā, sobhayanti mamassamaṃ''..

[03] tattha ^b^ketakā^eb^ti sugandhaketakagacchā ca. ^b^kandali^eb^rukkhā ca ^b^godhuka^eb^rukkhā ca ^b^tiṇasūlika^eb^gacchā ca ete sabbe rukkhajātikā dibbagandhaṃ pavāyamānā mama assamaṃ sakalaṃ sobhayantīti attho.
[21] ``kaṇikārā kaṇṇikā ca, asanā ajjunā bahū.
[22] dibbagandhaṃ sampavantā, sobhayanti mamassamaṃ''..
[03] ete kaṇikārādayo rukkhā mama assamaṃ sakalaṃ sobhayantā dibbagandhaṃ sampavāyantīti sambandho.
[21] ``punnāgā ^a^V1.0219^ea^ giripunnāgā, koviḷārā ca pupphitā.
[22] dibbagandhaṃ sampavantā, sobhayanti mamassamaṃ''..
[03] punnāgādayo rukkhā dibbagandhaṃ pavāyamānā mama assamaṃ sobhayantīti attho.
[21] ``uddālakā ^a^P0.0215^ea^ ca kuṭajā, kadambā vakulā bahū.
[22] dibbagandhaṃ sampavantā, sobhayanti mamassamaṃ''..
[03] uddālakādayo ^a^M1.0238^ea^ rukkhā dibbagandhaṃ vāyamānā mama assamaṃ sobhayantīti sambandho.
[21] ``āḷakā isimuggā ca, kadalimātuluṅgiyo.
[22] gandhodakena saṃvaḍḍhā, phalāni dhārayanti te''..
[03] tattha ete āḷakādayo gacchā candanādisugandhagandhodakena vaḍḍhitvā suvaṇṇaphalāni dhārentā mama assamaṃ sobhayantīti attho.
[21] ``aññe pupphanti padumā, aññe jāyanti kesarī.
[22] aññe opupphā padumā, pupphitā taḷāke tadā''..

[03] tattha ^b^aññe pupphanti padumā^eb^ti mama assamassa avidūre taḷāke aññe ekacce padumā pupphanti, ekacce ^b^kesarī^eb^ padumā ^b^jāyanti^eb^ nibbattanti, ekacce padumā ^b^opupphā^eb^ vigalitapattakesarāti attho.
[21] ``gabbhaṃ gaṇhanti padumā, niddhāvanti muḷāliyo.
[22] siṅghāṭipattamākiṇṇā, sobhanti taḷāke tadā''..

[03] tattha ^b^gabbhaṃ gaṇhanti padumā^eb^ti tadā tāpasena hutvā mama vasanasamaye ekacce padumā taḷākabbhantare makuḷapupphādayo gaṇhanti. ^b^muḷāliyo^eb^ padumamūlā ^b^niddhāvanti^eb^ ito kaddamabbhantarato hatthidāṭhā viya gacchantīti attho. pattapupphamākiṇṇā gahanībhūtā siṅghāṭiyo sobhayantīti attho.
[21] ``nayitā ^a^V1.0220^ea^ ambagandhī ca, uttalī bandhujīvakā.
[22] dibbagandhā sampavanti, pupphitā taḷāke tadā''..

[03] ^b^tadā^eb^ mama vasanasamaye taḷākassa samīpe ^b^nayitā^eb^ ca gacchā ^b^ambagandhī ca^eb^ gacchā ^b^uttalī^eb^ nāma gacchā ca ^b^bandhujīvakā^eb^ ca ete sabbe ^a^P0.0216^ea^ gacchā ^b^pupphitā^eb^ pupphadhāritā sugandhavāhakā taḷākaṃ sobhayantīti attho.
[21] ``pāṭhīnā pāvusā macchā, balajā muñjarohitā.
[22] saṃgulā maggurā ceva, vasanti taḷāke tadā''..
[03] ^b^tadā^eb^ ^a^M1.0239^ea^ mama vasanasamaye nibbhītā pāṭhīnādayo macchā ^b^taḷāke^eb^ vasantīti sambandho.
[21] ``kumbhīlā susumārā ca, tantigāhā ca rakkhasā.
[22] oguhā ajagarā ca, vasanti taḷāke tadā''..
[03] ^b^tadā^eb^ mama vasanasamaye mama assamasamīpe ^b^taḷāke^eb^ ete kumbhīlādayo macchā nibbhītā nirūpaddavā vasantīti sambandho.
[21] ``pārevatā ravihaṃsā, cakkavākā nadīcarā.
[22] kokilā sukasāḷikā, upajīvanti taṃ saraṃ''..

[03] tattha mama assamasamīpe saraṃ nissāya ^b^pārevatā^eb^pakkhī ca ^b^ravihaṃsā^eb^pakkhī ca ^b^nadīcarā cakkavāka^eb^pakkhī ca ^b^kokilā^eb^pakkhī ca ^b^suka^eb^pakkhī ca ^b^sāḷikā^eb^pakkhī ca taṃ saraṃ upanissāya jīvantīti sambandho.
[21] ``kukutthakā kuḷīrakā, vane pokkharasātakā.
[22] dindibhā suvapotā ca, upajīvanti taṃ saraṃ''..

[03] tattha ^b^kukutthakā^eb^ti evaṃnāmikā pakkhī ca. ^b^kuḷīrakā^eb^ti evaṃnāmikā pakkhī ca. vane ^b^pokkharasātakā^eb^ ^a^V1.0221^ea^ pakkhī ca ^b^dindibhā^eb^ pakkhī ca ^b^suvapotā^eb^ pakkhī ca ete sabbe pakkhino taṃ mama assamasamīpe saraṃ nissāya jīvantīti sambandho.
[21] ``haṃsā koñcā mayūrā ca, kokilā tambacūḷakā.
[22] pammakā jīvaṃjīvā ca, upajīvanti taṃ saraṃ''..
[03] sabbe ete haṃsādayo pakkhino taṃ saraṃ upanissāya jīvanti jīvikaṃ pālentīti attho.
[21] ``kosikā ^a^P0.0217^ea^ poṭṭhasīsā ca, kurarā senakā bahū.
[22] mahākāḷā ca sakuṇā, upajīvanti taṃ saraṃ''..

[03] tattha ^b^kosikā^eb^ ca pakkhī ^b^poṭṭhasīsā^eb^ ca pakkhī ^b^kurarā^eb^ ca pakkhī ^b^senakā^eb^ ca pakkhī ^b^mahākāḷā^eb^ ca pakkhī thale ^b^bahū^eb^ pakkhino taṃ saraṃ tassa sarassa samīpe ^b^jīvanti^eb^ jīvikaṃ kappentīti attho.
[21] ``pasadā ^a^M1.0240^ea^ ca varāhā ca, camarā gaṇḍakā bahū.
[22] rohiccā sukapotā ca, upajīvanti taṃ saraṃ''..
[03] tattha pasadādayo ete migā ^b^taṃ saraṃ^eb^ tasmiṃ sarasamīpe, bhummatthe upayogavacanaṃ, jīvitaṃ paripālentā viharantīti attho.
[21] ``sīhabyagghā ca dīpī ca, acchakokataracchakā.
[22] tidhā pabhinnamātaṅgā, upajīvanti taṃ saraṃ''..
[03] ete sīhādayo catuppadā sarasamīpe upaddavarahitā jīvantīti sambandho.
[21] ``kinnarā vānarā ceva, athopi vanakammikā.
[22] cetā ca luddakā ceva, upajīvanti taṃ saraṃ''..
[03] ettha ^a^V1.0222^ea^ ete evaṃnāmikā kinnarādayo sattā tasmiṃ sarasamīpe vasantīti attho.
[21] ``tindukāni piyālāni, madhukekā sumāriyo.
[22] dhuvaṃ phalāni dhārenti, avidūre mamassamaṃ''..
[03] tattha ete tindukādayo rukkhā dhuvaṃ hemantagimhavassānasaṅkhāte kālattaye mama assamato avidūre ṭhāne madhuraphalāni dhārentīti sambandho.
[21] ``kosambā saḷalā nimbā, sāduphalasamāyutā.
[22] dhuvaṃ phalāni dhārenti, avidūre mamassamaṃ''..
[03] tattha ete kosambādayo rukkhā sāraphalā madhuraphalā uttamaphalā ^b^samāyutā saṃ^eb^ suṭṭhu āyutā samaṅgībhūtā niccaṃ phaladhārino mama assamasamīpe sobhantīti attho.
[21] ``harītakā ^a^P0.0218^ea^ āmalakā, ambajambuvibhītakā.
[22] kolā bhallātakā billā, phalāni dhārayanti te''..
[03] te harītakādayo rukkhā mama assamasamīpe jātā niccaṃ phalāni dhārayantīti sambandho.
[21] ``āluvā ^a^M1.0241^ea^ ca kaḷambā ca, biḷālītakkaḷāni ca.
[22] jīvakā sutakā ceva, bahūkā mama assame''..
[03] ete āluvādayo mūlaphalā khuddā madhurasā mama assamasamīpe bahū santīti sambandho.
[21] ``assamassāvidūramhi, taḷākāsuṃ sunimmitā.
[22] acchodakā sītajalā, supatitthā manoramā''..

[03] tattha ^b^assamassāvidūramhi^eb^ assamassa samīpe ^b^sunimmitā^eb^ suṭṭhu ārohanaorohanakkhamaṃ katvā ^a^V1.0223^ea^ nimmitā ^b^acchodakā^eb^ vippasannodakā ^b^sītajalā^eb^ sītodakā ^b^supatitthā^eb^ sundaratitthā ^b^manoramā^eb^ somanassakarā taḷākā ^b^āsuṃ^eb^ ahesunti attho.
[21] ``padumuppalasañchannā, puṇḍarīkasamāyutā.
[22] mandālakehi sañchannā, dibbagandhopavāyati''..

[03] tattha padumehi ca uppalehi ca ^b^sañchannā^eb^ paripuṇṇā ^b^puṇḍarīkehi samāyutā^eb^ samaṅgībhūtā ^b^mandālakehi^eb^ ca ^b^sañchannā^eb^ gahanībhūtā taḷākā dibbagandhāni upavāyanti samantato vāyantīti attho.
[21] ``evaṃ sabbaṅgasampanne, pupphite phalite vane.
[22] sukate assame ramme, viharāmi ahaṃ tadā''..

[03] tattha ^b^evaṃ sabbaṅgasampanne^eb^ti abbehi nadikādiavayavehi sampanne paripuṇṇe pupphaphalarukkhehi gahanībhūte ^b^vane sukate^eb^ ramaṇīye ^b^assame^eb^ araññāvāse ^b^tadā^eb^ tāpasabhūtakāle ahaṃ viharāmīti attho.
[03] ettāvatā ^a^P0.0219^ea^ assamasampattiṃ dassetvā idāni attano sīlādiguṇasampattiṃ dassento --
[21] ``sīlavā vatasampanno, jhāyī jhānarato sadā.
[22] pañcābhiññābalappatto, suruci nāma tāpaso''ti.. -- āha.

[03] tattha ^a^M1.0242^ea^ ^b^sīlavā^eb^ti jhānasampayuttacatupārisuddhisīlasadisehi pañcahi sīlehi sampuṇṇoti attho. ^b^vatasampanno^eb^ti ``ito paṭṭhāya gharāvāsaṃ pañca kāmaguṇe vā na sevissāmī''ti vatasamādānena sampanno. ^b^jhāyī^eb^ti lakkhaṇūpanijjhānāarammaṇūpanijjhānehi jhāyī jhāyanasīlo. ^b^jhānarato^eb^ti etesu jhānesu rato allīno ^b^sadā^eb^ sampuṇṇo. ^b^pañcābhiññābalappatto^eb^ti iddhividhadibbasotaparacittavijānanapubbenivāsānussatidibbacakkhusaṅkhātāhi pañcahi abhiññāhi visesapaññāhi balasampanno, paripuṇṇoti attho. nāmena ^b^suruci nāma^eb^ tāpaso hutvā viharāmīti sambandho.
[03] ettakena ^a^V1.0224^ea^ attano guṇasampattiṃ dassetvā parisasampattiṃ dassento --
[21] ``catuvīsasahassāni, sissā mayhaṃ upaṭṭhahuṃ.
[22] sabbe maṃ brāhmaṇā ete, jātimanto yasassino''ti.. -- ādimāha.
[03] tattha ete sabbe catuvīsatisahassabrāhmaṇā mayhaṃ sissā ^b^jātimanto^eb^ jātisampannā ^b^yasassino^eb^ parivārasampannā maṃ upaṭṭhahunti sambandho.
[21] ``lakkhaṇe itihāse ca, sanighaṇḍusakeṭubhe.
[22] padakā veyyākaraṇā, sadhamme pāramiṃ gatā''..

[03] tattha ^b^lakkhaṇe^eb^ti lakkhaṇasatthe. sabbalokiyānaṃ itthipurisānaṃ ``imehi lakkhaṇehi samannāgatā dukkhitā bhavanti, imehi sukhitā bhavantī''ti lakkhaṇaṃ jānāti. tappakāsako gantho lakkhaṇaṃ, tasmiṃ lakkhaṇe ca. ^b^itihāse^eb^ti ``itiha āsa itiha āsā''ti vuttavacanapaṭidīpake ganthe. lakkhaṇe ca itihāse ca ^b^pāramiṃ^eb^ pariyosānaṃ ^b^gatā^eb^ti sambandho. rukkhapabbatādīnaṃ nāmappakāsakaganthaṃ ``nighaṇḍū''ti vuccati. ^b^keṭūbhe^eb^ti kiriyākappavikappānaṃ kavīnaṃ upakārako gantho. nighaṇḍuyā saha vattatīti sanighaṇḍu, keṭubhena saha vattatīti sakeṭubhaṃ, tasmiṃ sanighaṇḍusakeṭubhe vedattaye pāramiṃ gatāti ^a^P0.0220^ea^ sambandho. ^b^padakā^eb^ti nāmapadasamāsataddhitākhyātakitakādipadesu chekā ^a^M1.0243^ea^. ^b^veyyākaraṇāni^eb^ candapāṇinīyakalāpādibyākaraṇe chekā. ^b^sadhamme pāramiṃ gatā^eb^ti attano dhamme brāhmaṇadhamme vedattaye pāramiṃ pariyosānaṃ gatā pattāti attho.
[21] ``uppātesu nimittesu, lakkhaṇesu ca kovidā.
[22] pathabyā bhūmantalikkhe, mama sissā susikkhitā''..

[03] tattha ukkāpātabhūmikampādikesu ^b^uppātesu^eb^ ca subhanimittāsubhanimittesu ca itthilakkhaṇapurisalakkhaṇamahāpurisalakkhaṇesu ca ^b^kovidā^eb^ chekā. pathaviyā ca bhūmiyā ca sakalaloke ca ^b^antalikkhe^eb^ ākāse cāti sabbattha mama sissā susikkhitā.
[21] ``appicchā ^a^V1.0225^ea^ nipakā ete, appāhārā alolupā.
[22] lābhālābhena santuṭṭhā, parivārenti maṃ sadā''..

[03] tattha ^b^appicchā^eb^ti appakenāpi yāpentā. ^b^nipakā^eb^ti nepakkasaṅkhātāya paññāya samannāgatā. ^b^appāhārā^eb^ti ekāhārā ekabhattikāti attho. ^b^alolupā^eb^ti lolupataṇhāya appavattanakā. ^b^lābhālābhenā^eb^ti lābhena alābhena ca ^b^santuṭṭhā^eb^ somanassā ete mama sissā ^b^sadā^eb^ niccakālaṃ maṃ ^b^parivārenti^eb^ upaṭṭhahantīti attho.
[21] ``jhāyī jhānaratā dhīrā, santacittā samāhitā.
[22] ākiñcaññaṃ patthayantā, parivārenti maṃ sadā''..

[03] tattha ^b^jhāyī^eb^ti lakkhaṇūpanijjhānāarammaṇūpanijjhānehi samannāgatā. jhāyanasīlā vā. ^b^jhānaratā^eb^ti tesu ca jhānesu ratā allīnā. ^b^dhīrā^eb^ti dhitisampannā. ^b^santacittā^eb^ti vūpasantamanā. ^b^samāhitā^eb^ti ekaggacittā. ^b^ākiñcañña^eb^nti nippalibodhabhāvaṃ. ^b^patthayantā^eb^ti icchantā. itthambhūtā me sissā sadā maṃ parivārentīti sambandho.
[21] ``abhiññāpāramippattā, pettike gocare ratā.
[22] antalikkhacarā dhīrā, parivārenti maṃ sadā''..

[03] tattha ^b^abhiññāpāramippattā^eb^ti pañcasu abhiññāsu pāramiṃ pariyosānaṃ pattā pūritāti attho. ^b^pettike gocare ratā^eb^ti buddhānuññātāya aviññattiyā ^a^M1.0244^ea^ laddhe āhāre ratāti attho. ^b^antalikkhacarā^eb^ti ^a^P0.0221^ea^ antalikkhena ākāsena gacchantā āgacchantā cāti attho. ^b^dhīrā^eb^ti thirabhūtā sīhabyagghādiparissaye acchambhitasabhāvāti attho. evaṃbhūtā mama tāpasā sadā maṃ parivārentīti attho.
[21] ``saṃvutā chasu dvāresu, anejā rakkhitindriyā.
[22] asaṃsaṭṭhā ca te dhīrā, mama sissā durāsadā''..

[03] tattha cakkhādīsu chasu dvāresu rūpādīsu chasu ārammaṇesu ^b^saṃvutā^eb^ pihitā paṭicchannā, rakkhitagopitadvārāti attho. ^b^anejā^eb^ nittaṇhā ^b^rakkhitindriyā^eb^ gopitacakkhādīndriyā ^b^asaṃsaṭṭhā^eb^ ñātīhi ^a^V1.0226^ea^ gahaṭṭhehi amissībhūtāti attho. ^b^durāsadā^eb^ti duṭṭhu āsadā, āsādetuṃ ghaṭṭetuṃ asakkuṇeyyā ayoggāti attho.
[21] ``pallaṅkena nisajjāya, ṭhānacaṅkamanena ca.
[22] vītināmenti te rattiṃ, mama sissā durāsadā''..
[03] tattha mama sissā ^b^pallaṅkena^eb^ ūrubaddhāsanena seyyaṃ vihāya nisajjāya ca ṭhānena ca caṅkamena ca sakalaṃ rattiṃ visesena ^b^atināmenti^eb^ atikkāmentīti sambandho.
[21] ``rajanīye na rajjanti, dussanīye na dussare.
[22] mohanīye na muyhanti, mama sissā durāsadā''..

[03] te itthambhūtā mama sissā tāpasā ^b^rajanīye^eb^ rajjitabbe vatthusmiṃ ^b^na rajjanti^eb^ rajjaṃ na uppādenti. ^b^dussanīye^eb^ dussitabbe dosaṃ uppādetuṃ yutte vatthumhi ^b^na dussare^eb^ dosaṃ na karonti. ^b^mohanīye^eb^ mohituṃ yutte vatthumhi ^b^na muyhanti^eb^ mohaṃ na karonti, paññāsampayuttā bhavantīti attho.
[21] ``iddhiṃ vīmaṃsamānā te, vattanti niccakālikaṃ.
[22] pathaviṃ te pakampenti, sārambhena durāsadā''..

[03] te mama sissā ``ekopi hutvā bahudhā hoti, bahudhāpi hutvā eko hotī''tiādikaṃ (paṭi0 ma0 1.102) iddhivikubbanaṃ niccakālikaṃ vīmaṃsamānā vattantīti ^a^M1.0245^ea^ sambandho. te mama sissā ākāsepi udakepi pathaviṃ nimminitvā iriyāpathaṃ pakampentīti attho. ^b^sārambhena^eb^ yugaggāhena kalahakaraṇena na āsādetabbāti attho.
[21] ``kīḷamānā ^a^P0.0222^ea^ ca te sissā, kīḷanti jhānakīḷitaṃ.
[22] jambuto phalamānenti, mama sissā durāsadā''..

[03] te mama sissā ^b^kīḷamānā^eb^ paṭhamajjhānādikīḷaṃ kīḷanti laḷanti ramantīti attho. ^b^jambuto^eb^ ^a^V1.0227^ea^ ^b^phalamānentī^eb^ti himavantamhi satayojanubbedhajamburukkhato ghaṭappamāṇaṃ jambuphalaṃ iddhiyā gantvā ānentīti attho.
[21] ``aññe gacchanti goyānaṃ, aññe pubbavidehakaṃ.
[22] aññe ca uttarakuruṃ, esanāya durāsadā''..

[03] tesaṃ mama sissānaṃ antare ^b^aññe^eb^ ekacce ^b^goyānaṃ^eb^ aparagoyānaṃ dīpaṃ gacchanti, ekacce ^b^pubbavidehakaṃ^eb^ dīpaṃ gacchanti, ekacce ^b^uttarakuruṃ^eb^ dīpaṃ gacchanti, te durāsadā etesu ṭhānesu ^b^esanāya^eb^ gavesanāya paccayapariyesanāya gacchantīti sambandho.
[21] ``purato pesenti khāriṃ, pacchato ca vajanti te.
[22] catuvīsasahassehi, chāditaṃ hoti ambaraṃ''..

[03] te mama sissā ākāsena gacchamānā ^b^khāriṃ^eb^ tāpasaparikkhārabharitaṃ kājaṃ purato pesenti paṭhamaṃ abhimukhañca taṃ pesetvā sayaṃ tassa pacchato gacchantīti attho. evaṃ gacchamānehi catuvīsasahassehi tāpasehi ^b^ambaraṃ^eb^ ākāsatalaṃ ^b^chāditaṃ^eb^ paṭicchannaṃ hotīti sambandho.
[21] ``aggipākī anaggī ca, dantodukkhalikāpi ca.
[22] asmena koṭṭitā keci, pavattaphalabhojanā''..

[03] tattha ^b^keci^eb^ ekacce mama sissā ^b^aggipākī^eb^ phalāphalapaṇṇādayo pacitvā khādanti, ekacce ^b^anaggī^eb^ aggīhi apacitvā āmakameva khādanti, ekacce dantikā dantehiyeva tacaṃ uppāṭetvā khādanti. ekacce ^b^udukkhalikā^eb^ udukkhalehi koṭṭetvā khādanti. ekacce ^b^asmena koṭṭitā^eb^ pāsāṇena koṭṭetvā khādanti. ekacce sayaṃpatitaphalāhārāti sambandho.
[21] ``udakorohaṇā ^a^M1.0246^ea^ keci, sāyaṃ pāto sucīratā.
[22] toyābhisecanakarā, mama sissā durāsadā''..
[03] durāsadā mama sissā keci ^b^sucīratā^eb^ suddhikāmā sāyaṃ pāto ca ^b^udakorohaṇā^eb^ udakapavesakāti attho. keci ^b^toyābhisecanakarā^eb^ udakena attani abhisiñcanakarāti attho.
[21] ``parūḷhakacchanakhalomā ^a^V1.0228^ea^ ^a^P0.0223^ea^, paṅkadantā rajassirā.
[22] gandhitā sīlagandhena, mama sissā durāsadā''..

[03] tattha te durāsadā mama sissā ^b^kacchesu^eb^ ubhayakacchesu ca hatthapādesu ca ^b^parūḷhā^eb^ sañjātā, dīghanakhalomāti attho. khurakammarahitattā amaṇḍitā apasādhitāti adhippāyo. ^b^paṅkadantā^eb^ti iṭṭhakacuṇṇakhīrapāsāṇacuṇṇādīhi dhavalamakatattā malaggahitadantāti attho. ^b^rajassirā^eb^ti telamakkhanādirahitattā dhūlīhi makkhitasīsāti attho. ^b^gandhitā sīlagandhenā^eb^ti jhānasamādhisamāpattīhi sampayuttasīlena samaṅgībhūtattā lokiyasīlagandhena sabbattha sugandhībhūtāti attho. ^b^mama sissā durāsadā^eb^ti imehi vuttappakāraguṇehi samannāgatattā āsādetuṃ ghaṭṭetuṃ asakkuṇeyyā mama sissāti sambandho.
[21] ``pātova sannipatitvā, jaṭilā uggatāpanā.
[22] lābhālābhaṃ pakittetvā, gacchanti ambare tadā''..

[03] tattha ^b^pātova sannipatitvā^eb^ti sattamyatthe topaccayo, pātarāsakāleyeva mama santike rāsibhūtāti attho. ^b^uggatāpanā^eb^ pākaṭatapā patthaṭatapā ^b^jaṭilā^eb^ jaṭādhārino tāpasā. ^b^lābhālābhaṃ pakittetvā^eb^ khuddake ca mahante ca lābhe pākaṭe katvā ^b^tadā^eb^ tasmiṃ kāle ^b^ambare^eb^ ākāsatale gacchantīti sambandho.

[03] 192^b^.^eb^ puna tesaṃyeva guṇe pakāsento ^b^etesaṃ pakkamantāna^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha ākāse vā thale vā ^b^pakkamantānaṃ^eb^ gacchantānaṃ ^b^etesaṃ^eb^ tāpasānaṃ vākacīrajanito mahāsaddo pavattatīti attho. ^b^muditā honti devatā^eb^ti evaṃ mahāsaddaṃ pavattetvā gacchantānaṃ ajinacammasaddena ^a^M1.0247^ea^ santuṭṭhā ``sādhu sādhu, ayyā''ti somanassajātā devatā ^b^muditā^eb^ santuṭṭhā hontīti sambandho.

[03] 193^b^.^eb^ ^b^disodisa^eb^nti te isayo ^b^antalikkhacarā^eb^ ākāsacārino dakkhiṇādisānudisaṃ ^b^pakkamanti^eb^ gacchantīti sambandho. ^b^sake balenupatthaddhā^eb^ti attano sarīrabalena vā jhānabalena vā samannāgatā ^b^yadicchakaṃ^eb^ yattha yattha gantukāmā, tattha tattheva gacchantīti sambandho.

[03] 194^b^.^eb^ puna tesamevānubhāvaṃ pakāsento ^b^pathavīkampakā ete^eb^tiādimāha. tadā ^b^ete^eb^ sabbattha icchācārā ^b^pathavīkampakā^eb^ medanīsañcalanajātikā ^b^nabhacārino^eb^ ākāsacārino. ^b^uggatejā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0229^ea^ uggatatejā patthaṭatejā ^b^duppasahā^eb^ pasayha abhibhavitvā pavattituṃ asakkuṇeyyāti duppasahā. ^b^sāgarova akhobhiyā^eb^ti aññehi akhobhiyo anāluḷito sāgaro iva samuddo viya aññehi akhobhiyā kampetuṃ asakkuṇeyyā hontīti sambandho.

[03] 195^b^.^eb^ ^b^ṭhānacaṅkamino kecī^eb^ti tesaṃ mama sissānaṃ antare ekacce isayo ṭhāniriyāpathacaṅkamaniriyāpathasampannā, ekacce isayo ^b^nesajjikā^eb^ ^a^P0.0224^ea^ nisajjiriyāpathasampannā, ekacce isayo ^b^pavattabhojanā^eb^ sayaṃpatitapaṇṇāhārā evarūpehi guṇehi yuttattā durāsadāti sambandho.

[03] 196^b^.^eb^ te sabbe thomento ^b^mettāvihārino^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ``aparimāṇesu cakkavāḷesu aparimāṇā sattā sukhī hontū''tiādinā sinehalakkhaṇāya mettāya pharitvā viharanti, attabhāvaṃ pavattentīti ^b^mettāvihārino^eb^ ete mama sissāti attho. sabbe te isayo ^b^sabbapāṇinaṃ^eb^ sabbesaṃ sattānaṃ ^b^hitesī^eb^ hitagavesakā. ^b^anattukkaṃsakā^eb^ attānaṃ na ukkaṃsakā amānino ^b^kassaci^eb^ kañci puggalaṃ ^b^na vambhenti^eb^ nīcaṃ katvā na maññantīti attho.

[03] 197^b^.^eb^ te mama sissā sīlasamādhisamāpattiguṇayuttattā sīharājā iva ^b^acchambhītā^eb^ nibbhayā, ^b^gajarājā iva^eb^ hatthirājā viya ^b^thāmavā^eb^ sarīrabalajhānabalasampannā byaggharājā iva, ^b^durāsadā^eb^ ghaṭṭetumasakkuṇeyyā mama santike āgacchantīti sambandho.

[03] 198^b^.^eb^ tato ^a^M1.0248^ea^ attano ānubhāvassa dassanalesena pakāsento ^b^vijjādharā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha mantasajjhāyādivijjādharā ca rukkhapabbatādīsu vasantā bhummadevatā ca bhūmaṭṭhathalaṭṭhā ^b^nāgā^eb^ ca ^b^gandhabba^eb^devā ca caṇḍā ^b^rakkhasā^eb^ ca ^b^kumbhaṇḍā^eb^ devā ca ^b^dānavā^eb^ devā ca icchiticchitanimmānasamatthā ^b^garuḷā^eb^ ca taṃ saraṃ upajīvantīti sambandho, tasmiṃ sare sarassa samīpe vasantīti attho.
[03] 199^b^.^eb^ punapi tesaṃyeva attano sissatāpasānaṃ guṇe vaṇṇento ^b^te jaṭā khāribharitā^eb^tiādimāha. taṃ sabbaṃ uttānatthameva. ^b^khāribhāra^eb^nti udañcanakamaṇḍaluādikaṃ tāpasaparikkhāraṃ.

[03] 207^b^.^eb^ punapi attano guṇe pakāsento ^b^uppāte supine cāpī^eb^tiādimāha. tattha brāhmaṇasippesu ^a^V1.0230^ea^ nipphattiṃ gatattā nakkhattapāṭhe ca chekattā ``imassa rājakumārassa uppannanakkhattaṃ subhaṃ asubha''nti uppātalakkhaṇe ca supine ca pavattiṃ pucchitena ``idaṃ supinaṃ subhaṃ, idaṃ asubha''nti supinanipphattikathane ca sabbesaṃ itthipurisānaṃ hatthapādalakkhaṇakathane ca suṭṭhu sikkhito sakalajambudīpe pavattamānaṃ mantapadaṃ lakkhaṇamantakoṭṭhāsaṃ sabbaṃ ahaṃ tadā mama tāpasakāle dhāremīti sambandho.

[03] 208^b^.^eb^ attano byākaraṇaṃ buddhaguṇapubbaṅgamaṃ pakāsento ^b^anomadassī^eb^tiādimāha. tattha na omakanti anomaṃ. maṃsacakkhudibbacakkhusamantacakkhudhammacakkhubuddhacakkhūhi ^a^P0.0225^ea^ sabbasattānaṃ passanaṃ dassanaṃ nāma, anomaṃ dassanaṃ yassa bhagavato so bhagavā ^b^anomadassī^eb^. bhāgyavantatādīhi kāraṇehi ^b^bhagavā^eb^ lokassa jeṭṭhaseṭṭhattā ^b^lokajeṭṭho^eb^ usabho nisabho āsabhoti tayo gavajeṭṭhakā. tattha gavasatajeṭṭhako usabho, gavasahassajeṭṭhako nisabho, gavasatasahassajeṭṭhako āsabho, narānaṃ āsabho ^b^narāsabho^eb^ paṭividdhasabbadhammo, ^b^sambuddho vivekakāmo^eb^ ekībhāvaṃ icchanto ^b^himavantaṃ^eb^ himālayapabbataṃ upāgamīti sambandho.
[03] 209^b^.^eb^ ^b^ajjhogāhetvā himavanta^eb^nti himavantasamīpaṃ ogāhetvā pavisitvāti attho. sesaṃ uttānatthameva.

[03] 210-1^b^.^eb^ ^b^jalitaṃ^eb^ ^a^M1.0249^ea^ jalamānaṃ indīvarapupphaṃ iva, ^b^hutāsanaṃ^eb^ homassa āsanaṃ, ^b^ādittaṃ^eb^ ābhāyutaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ iva, ^b^gagane^eb^ ākāse jotamānaṃ vijju iva, suṭṭhu phullaṃ sālarājaṃ iva, nisinnaṃ lokanāyakaṃ addasanti sambandho.

[03] 213^b^.^eb^ devānaṃ devo devadevo, taṃ ^b^devadevaṃ^eb^ disvāna tassa ^b^lakkhaṇaṃ^eb^ dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇasañjānanakāraṇaṃ. ``buddho nu kho na vā buddho''ti ^b^upadhārayiṃ^eb^ vicāresiṃ. ^b^cakkhumaṃ^eb^ pañcahi cakkhūhi cakkhumantaṃ jinaṃ kena kāraṇena passāmīti sambandho.

[03] 214^b^.^eb^ ^b^caraṇuttame^eb^ uttamapādatale ^b^sahassārāni^eb^ cakkalakkhaṇāni dissanti, ahaṃ tassa bhagavato tāni lakkhaṇāni disvā tathāgate ^b^niṭṭhaṃ gacchiṃ^eb^ sanniṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi, nissandeho āsinti attho. sesaṃ uttānatthameva.

[03] 218^b^.^eb^ ^b^sayambhū^eb^ sayameva bhūtā. ^b^amitodaya^eb^ amitānaṃ aparimāṇānaṃ guṇānaṃ udaya uṭṭhānaṭṭhāna ^a^V1.0231^ea^, idaṃ padadvayaṃ ālapanameva. ^b^imaṃ lokaṃ^eb^ imaṃ sattalokaṃ ^b^saṃ^eb^ suṭṭhu ^b^uddharasi^eb^ saṃsārato uddharitvā nibbānathalaṃ pāpesīti attho. te sabbe sattā tava dassanaṃ ^b^āgamma^eb^ āgantvā ^b^kaṅkhāsotaṃ^eb^ vicikicchāmahoghaṃ ^b^taranti^eb^ atikkamantīti sambandho.

[03] 219^b^.^eb^ bhagavantaṃ thomento tāpaso ^b^tuvaṃ satthā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha, bhante, sabbaññu tuvaṃ sadevakassa lokassa ^b^satthā^eb^ ācariyo uttamaṭṭhena tvameva ^b^ketu^eb^ ucco, sakalaloke pakāsanaṭṭhena tvameva ^b^dhajo,^eb^ lokattaye uggatattā tvameva ^b^yūpo^eb^ ussāpitathambhasadiso, ^b^pāṇinaṃ^eb^ sabbasattānaṃ tvameva ^b^parāyaṇo^eb^ uttamagamanīyaṭṭhānaṃ tvameva ^a^P0.0226^ea^ ^b^patiṭṭhā^eb^ patiṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ lokassa mohandhakāravidhamanato tvameva ^b^dīpo^eb^ telapadīpo viya, ^b^dvipaduttamo^eb^ dvipadānaṃ devabrahmamanussānaṃ uttamo seṭṭhoti sambandho.

[03] 220^b^.^eb^ puna bhagavantaṃyeva thomento ^b^sakkā samudde udaka^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha caturāsītiyojanasahassagambhīre samudde udakaṃ āḷhakena ^a^M1.0250^ea^ ^b^pametuṃ^eb^ minituṃ sakkā bhaveyya, bhante, sabbaññu tava ñāṇaṃ ``ettakaṃ pamāṇa''nti ^b^pametave^eb^ minituṃ na tveva sakkāti attho.
[03] 221^b^.^eb^ ^b^tulamaṇḍale^eb^ tulapañjare ṭhapetvā ^b^pathaviṃ^eb^ medaniṃ dhāretuṃ sakkā, bhante, sabbaññu tava ñāṇaṃ dhāretuṃ na tu eva sakkāti sambandho.
[03] 222^b^.^eb^ bhante, sabbaññu ^b^ākāso^eb^ sakalantalikkhaṃ rajjuyā vā aṅgulena vā minituṃ sakkā bhaveyya, tava pana ñāṇaṃ ñāṇākāsaṃ na tu eva ^b^pametave^eb^ minituṃ sakkāti attho.

[03] 223^b^.^eb^ ^b^mahāsamudde udaka^eb^nti caturāsītiyojanasahassagambhīre sāgare ^b^akhilaṃ udakañca,^eb^ catunahutādhikadviyojanasatasahassabahalaṃ ^b^akhilaṃ pathavi^eb^ñca ^b^jahe^eb^ jaheyya atikkameyya samaṃ kareyya buddhassa ñāṇaṃ ^b^upādāya^eb^ gahetvā tuleyya samaṃ kareyya. ^b^upamāto^eb^ upamāvasena ^b^na yujjare^eb^ na yojeyyuṃ. ñāṇameva adhikanti attho.

[03] 224^b^.^eb^ ^b^cakkhuma^eb^ pañcahi cakkhūhi cakkhumanta, ālapanametaṃ. saha devehi pavattassa lokassa, bhummatthe sāmivacanaṃ. sadevake lokasmiṃ antare ^b^yesaṃ^eb^ yattakānaṃ sattānaṃ cittaṃ pavattati. ^b^ete^eb^ tattakā sacittakā sattā tava ñāṇamhi ^b^antojālagatā^eb^ ñāṇajālasmiṃ anto paviṭṭhāti sambandho, ñāṇajālena sabbasatte passasīti attho.

[03] 225^b^.^eb^ bhante ^a^V1.0232^ea^, ^b^sabbaññu^eb^ sabbadhammajānanaka, tvaṃ ^b^yena ñāṇena^eb^ catumaggasampayuttena sakalaṃ uttamaṃ ^b^bodhiṃ^eb^ nibbānaṃ ^b^patto^eb^ adhigato ^b^asi^eb^ bhavasi, tena ñāṇena ^b^paratitthiye^eb^ aññatitthiye ^b^maddasī^eb^ abhibhavasīti sambandho.

[03] 226^b^.^eb^ tena tāpasena thomitākāraṃ pakāsentā dhammasaṅgāhakā therā ^b^imā gāthā thavitvānā^eb^ti āhaṃsu. tattha ^b^imā gāthā^eb^ti ettakāhi gāthāhi ^b^thavitvāna^eb^ thomanaṃ katvāna nāmena suruci nāma tāpaso ^b^sesaṭṭhakathāsu^eb^ (a0 ni0 aṭṭha0 1.1.189-190; dha0 pa0 aṭṭha0 1.sāriputtattheravatthu) pana ``saradamāṇavo''ti āgato. so aṭṭhakathānayato pāṭhoyeva pamāṇaṃ, atha vā sundarā ruci ajjhāsayo nibbānālayo assāti ^b^suruci^eb^. sarati gacchati indriyadamanāya ^a^M1.0251^ea^ pavattatīti sarado, iti dvayampi tasseva nāmaṃ. so surucitāpaso ajinacammaṃ pattharitvāna pathaviyaṃ nisīdi, accāsannādayo cha nisajjadose vajjetvā sarado nisīdīti attho.

[03] 227^b^.^eb^ tattha nisinno tāpaso tassa bhagavato ñāṇameva thomento ^b^cullāsītisahassānī^eb^tiādimāha ^a^P0.0227^ea^. tattha ^b^cullāsītisahassānī^eb^ti caturāsītisahassāni, ^b^girirājā^eb^ merupabbatarājā, ^b^mahaṇṇave^eb^ sāgare ^b^ajjhogāḷho^eb^ adhiogāḷho paviṭṭho, ^b^tāvadeva^eb^ tattakāni caturāsītisahassāni ^b^accuggato^eb^ atiuggato idāni pavuccatīti sambandho.

[03] 228^b^.^eb^ ^b^tāva accuggato^eb^ tathā atiuggato neru, so mahāneru ^b^āyato^eb^ uccato ca vitthārato ca evaṃ mahanto nerurājā koṭisatasahassiyo saṅkhāṇubhedena ^b^cuṇṇito^eb^ cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ kato asi.

[03] 229^b^.^eb^ bhante, sabbaññu tava ñāṇaṃ lakkhe ṭhapiyamānamhi ñāṇe sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā satasahassaṃ vā ekekaṃ binduṃ katvā ṭhapite tadeva mahānerussa cuṇṇaṃ khayaṃ gaccheyya, tava ñāṇaṃ ^b^pametave^eb^ pamāṇaṃ kātuṃ eva na sakkāti sambandho.

[03] 230^b^.^eb^ ^b^sukhumacchikena^eb^ sukhumacchiddena jālena yo sakalamahāsamudde udakaṃ ^b^parikkhipe^eb^ samantato parikkhaṃ kareyya, evaṃ parikkhite ye keci pāṇā udake jātā sabbe te antojālagatā ^b^siyuṃ^eb^ bhaveyyunti attho.

[03] 231^b^.^eb^ tamupameyyaṃ ^a^V1.0233^ea^ dassento ^b^tatheva hī^eb^tiādimāha. tattha yathā udajā pāṇā antojālagatā honti, tatheva ^b^mahāvīra^eb^ mahābodhiadhigamāya vīriyakara. ye keci ^b^puthu^eb^ anekā ^b^titthiyā^eb^ micchā titthakarā ^b^diṭṭhigahanapakkhandā^eb^ diṭṭhisaṅkhātagahanaṃ paviṭṭhā ^b^parāmāsena^eb^ sabhāvato parato āmasanalakkhaṇāya diṭṭhiyā ^b^mohitā^eb^ pihitā santi.

[03] 232^b^.^eb^ tava ^a^M1.0252^ea^ ^b^suddhena^eb^ nikkilesena ñāṇena ^b^anāvaraṇadassinā^eb^ sabbadhammānaṃ āvaraṇarahitadassanasīlena ^b^ete^eb^ sabbe titthiyā ^b^antojālagatā^eb^ ñāṇajālassanto pavesitā vā tathevāti sambandho. ^b^ñāṇaṃ te nātivattare^eb^ti tava ñāṇaṃ te titthiyā nātikkamantīti attho.

[03] 233^b^.^eb^ evaṃ vuttathomanāvasāne bhagavato attano byākaraṇārabbhaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^bhagavā tamhi samaye^eb^tiādimāha. tattha yasmiṃ samaye tāpaso bhagavantaṃ thomesi, tasmiṃ thomanāya pariyosānakāle saṅkhyātikkantaparivāratāya mahāyaso anomadassī bhagavā kilesamārādīnaṃ jitattā ^b^jino. samādhimhā^eb^ appitasamādhito vuṭṭhahitvā sakalajambudīpaṃ dibbacakkhunā olokesīti sambandho.

[03] 234-5^b^.^eb^ tassa anomadassissa bhagavato ^b^munino^eb^ monasaṅkhātena ñāṇena samannāgatassa nisabho nāma sāvako ^b^santacittehi^eb^ vūpasantakilesamānasehi tādīhi iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu akampiyasabhāvattā, ^b^tādibhi^eb^ khīṇāsavehi ^b^suddhehi^eb^ parisuddhakāyakammādiyuttehi chaḷabhiññehi tādīhi aṭṭhahi lokadhammehi akampanasabhāvehi satasahassehi parivuto buddhassa cittaṃ, ^b^aññāya^eb^ jānitvā lokanāyakaṃ ^b^upesi,^eb^ tāvadeva samīpaṃ agamāsīti sambandho.

[03] 236^b^.^eb^ te ^a^P0.0228^ea^ tathā āgatā samānā ^b^tattha^eb^ bhagavato samīpe. ^b^antalikkhe^eb^ ākāse ṭhitā bhagavantaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ akaṃsu. te sabbe ^b^pañjalikā^eb^ namassamānā ākāsato buddhassa santike ^b^otaruṃ^eb^ orohiṃsūti sambandho.
[03] 237^b^.^eb^ puna byākaraṇadānassa pubbabhāgakāraṇaṃ pakāsento ^b^sitaṃ pātukarī^eb^tiādimāha. taṃ sabbaṃ uttānatthameva.

[03] 241^b^.^eb^ ^b^yo maṃ pupphenā^eb^ti yo tāpaso mayi cittaṃ pasādetvā anekapupphena maṃ pūjesi, ñāṇañca ^a^V1.0234^ea^ me ^b^anu^eb^ punappunaṃ ^b^thavi^eb^ thomesi, ^b^tamaha^eb^nti taṃ tāpasaṃ ahaṃ ^b^kittayissāmi^eb^ pākaṭaṃ karissāmi, ^b^mama bhāsato^eb^ bhāsantassa vacanaṃ ^b^suṇotha^eb^ savanavisayaṃ karotha manasi karotha.

[03] 250^b^.^eb^ ^b^pacchime^eb^ ^a^M1.0253^ea^ ^b^bhavasampatte^eb^ti byākaraṇaṃ dadamāno bhagavā āha. tattha ^b^pacchime^eb^ pariyosānabhūte bhave sampatte sati. ^b^manussattaṃ^eb^ manussajātiṃ ^b^gamissati,^eb^ manussaloke uppajjissatīti attho. rūpasāradhanasāravayasārakulasārabhogasārapuññasārādīhi sārehi sāravantatāya sārī nāma brāhmaṇī kucchinā dhārayissati.

[03] 253^b^.^eb^ byākaraṇamūlamārabhi ^b^aparimeyye ito kappe^eb^ti. ettha dvinnaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ kappasatasahassañca pāramī pūritā, tathāpi gāthābandhasukhatthaṃ antarakappāni upādāya evaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03] 254^b^.^eb^ ``sāriputtoti nāmena, hessati aggasāvako''ti byākaraṇamadāsi, byākaraṇaṃ datvā taṃ thomento so bhagavā ^b^ayaṃ bhāgīrathī^eb^tiādimāha. gaṅgā, yamunā, sarabhū, mahī, aciravatīti imāsaṃ pañcannaṃ gaṅgānaṃ antare ayaṃ bhāgīrathī nāma paṭhamamahāgaṅgā ^b^himavantā pabhāvitā^eb^ himavantato āgatā anotattadahato pabhavā, ^b^mahodadhiṃ^eb^ mahāudakakkhandhaṃ ^b^appayanti^eb^ pāpuṇanti, ^b^mahāsamuddaṃ^eb^ mahāsāgaraṃ ^b^appeti^eb^ upagacchati yathā, tathā eva ayaṃ sāriputto ^b^sake tīsu visārado^eb^ attano kule pavattamānesu tīsu vedesu visārado apakkhalitañāṇo patthaṭañāṇo. ^b^paññāya pāramiṃ gantvā^eb^ attano sāvakañāṇassa pariyosānaṃ gantvā, ^b^pāṇine^eb^ sabbasatte ^b^tappayissati^eb^ santappessati suhittabhāvaṃ karissatīti attho.

[03] 257^b^.^eb^ ^b^himavantamupādāyā^eb^ti himālayapabbataṃ ādiṃ katvā ^b^mahodadhiṃ^eb^ mahāsamuddaṃ udakabhāraṃ ^b^sāgaraṃ^eb^ pariyosānaṃ katvā ^b^etthantare^eb^ etesaṃ dvinnaṃ pabbatasāgarānaṃ majjhe ^b^yaṃ pulinaṃ^eb^ yattakā vālukarāsi atthi, ^b^gaṇanāto^eb^ gaṇanavasena ^b^asaṅkhiyaṃ^eb^ saṅkhyātikkantaṃ ^a^P0.0229^ea^.

[03] 258^b^.^eb^ ^b^tampi sakkā asesenā^eb^ti taṃ pulinampi nisesena ^b^saṅkhātuṃ^eb^ sakkā sakkuṇeyya bhaveyya, sā gaṇanā yathā hotīti sambandho. tathā sāriputtassa paññāya ^b^anto^eb^ pariyosānaṃ na tveva bhavissatīti attho.

[03] 259^b^.^eb^ ^b^lakkhe...pe0...^eb^ ^a^M1.0254^ea^ ^a^V1.0235^ea^ ^b^bhavissatīti lakkhe^eb^ ñāṇalakkhe ñāṇassa ekasmiṃ kale ^b^ṭhapiyamānamhi^eb^ ṭhapite sati gaṅgāya vālukā ^b^khīye^eb^ parikkhayaṃ gaccheyyāti attho.

[03] 260^b^.^eb^ ^b^mahāsamudde^eb^ti caturāsītiyojanasahassagambhīre catumahāsāgare ^b^ūmiyo^eb^ gāvutādibhedā taraṅgarāsayo ^b^gaṇanāto asaṅkhiyā^eb^ saṅkhyāvirahitā yathā honti, tatheva sāriputtassa paññāya ^b^anto^eb^ pariyosānaṃ ^b^na hessati^eb^ na bhavissatīti sambandho.

[03] 261^b^.^eb^ so evaṃ paññavā sāriputto gotamagottattā ^b^gotamaṃ^eb^ sakyakule jeṭṭhakaṃ sakyapuṅgavaṃ sambuddhaṃ ^b^ārādhayitvā^eb^ vattapaṭipattisīlācārādīhi cittārādhanaṃ katvā ^b^paññāya^eb^ sāvakañāṇassa ^b^pāramiṃ^eb^ pariyosānaṃ gantvā tassa bhagavato aggasāvako hessatīti sambandho.

[03] 262^b^.^eb^ so evaṃ aggasāvakaṭṭhānaṃ patto sakyaputtena bhagavatā iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu akampiyasabhāvena pavattitaṃ pākaṭaṃ kataṃ ^b^dhammacakkaṃ^eb^ saddhammaṃ ^b^anuvattessati^eb^ avinassamānaṃ dhāressati. ^b^dhammavuṭṭhiyo^eb^ dhammadesanāsaṅkhātā vuṭṭhiyo ^b^vassento^eb^ desento pakāsento vivaranto vibhajanto uttānīkaronto pavattissatīti attho.

[03] 263^b^.^eb^ gotamo sakyapuṅgavo bhagavā etaṃ sabbaṃ ^b^abhiññāya^eb^ visesena ñāṇena jānitvā ^b^bhikkhusaṅghe^eb^ ariyapuggalamajjhe nisīditvā ^b^aggaṭṭhāne^eb^ sakalapaññādiguṇagaṇābhirame uccaṭṭhāne ṭhapessatīti sambandho.

[03] 264^b^.^eb^ evaṃ so laddhabyākaraṇo somanassappatto pītisomanassavasena udānaṃ udānento ^b^aho me sukataṃ kamma^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha ^b^aho^eb^ti vimhayatthe nipāto. anomadassissa bhagavato ^b^satthuno^eb^ garuno ^b^sukataṃ^eb^ suṭṭhu kataṃ saddahitvā kataṃ ^b^kammaṃ^eb^ puññakoṭṭhāsaṃ aho vimhayaṃ acinteyyānubhāvanti attho. ^b^yassa^eb^ bhagavato ^b^ahaṃ kāraṃ^eb^ puññasambhāraṃ katvā ^b^sabbattha^eb^ sakalaguṇagaṇe ^b^pāramiṃ^eb^ pariyosānaṃ ^b^gato^eb^ paramaṃ koṭiṃ sampatto, so bhagavā aho vimhayoti sambandho.

[03] 265^b^.^eb^ ^b^aparimeyye^eb^ti ^a^M1.0255^ea^ saṅkhyātikkantakālasmiṃ kataṃ kusalakammaṃ, ^b^me^eb^ mayhaṃ ^b^idha^eb^ imasmiṃ pacchimattabhāve ^b^phalaṃ^eb^ vipākaṃ dassesi. ^b^sumutto^eb^ suṭṭhu vimutto chekena dhanuggahena khitto ^a^P0.0230^ea^ saravego iva ahaṃ tena puññaphalena kilese ^b^jhāpayiṃ^eb^ jhāpesinti attho.

[03] 266^b^.^eb^ attano ^a^V1.0236^ea^ eva vīriyaṃ pakāsento ^b^asaṅkhata^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha ^b^asaṅkhata^eb^nti na saṅkhataṃ, paccayehi samāgamma na katanti attho. taṃ asaṅkhataṃ nibbānaṃ kilesakālussiyābhāvena ^b^acalaṃ^eb^ katasambhārānaṃ patiṭṭhaṭṭhena ^b^padaṃ gavesanto^eb^ pariyesanto ^b^sabbe titthiye^eb^ sakale titthakare diṭṭhuppādake puggale ^b^vicinaṃ^eb^ upaparikkhanto ^b^esāhaṃ^eb^ eso ahaṃ ^b^bhave^eb^ kāmabhavādike bhave ^b^saṃsariṃ^eb^ paribbhaminti sambandho.

[03] 267-8^b^.^eb^ attano adhippāyaṃ pakāsento ^b^yathāpi byādhito poso^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^byādhito^eb^ti byādhinā pīḷito ^b^poso^eb^ puriso osadhaṃ pariyeseyya yathā, tathā ahaṃ asaṅkhataṃ amataṃ padaṃ nibbānaṃ gavesanto ^b^abbokiṇṇaṃ^eb^ avicchinnaṃ nirantaraṃ, ^b^pañcasataṃ^eb^ jātipañcasatesu attabhāvesu isipabbajjaṃ pabbajinti sambandho.
[03] 271^b^.^eb^ ^b^kutitthe sañcariṃ aha^eb^nti lāmake titthe gamanamagge ahaṃ sañcariṃ.

[03] 272^b^.^eb^ ^b^sāratthiko poso^eb^ sāragavesī puriso. ^b^kadaliṃ chetvāna phālaye^eb^ti kadalikkhandhaṃ chetvā dvedhā phāleyya. ^b^na tattha sāraṃ vindeyyā^eb^ti phāletvā ca pana tattha kadalikkhandhe sāraṃ na vindeyya na labheyya, so puriso sārena ^b^rittako^eb^ tucchoti sambandho.

[03] 273^b^.^eb^ yathā kadalikkhandho sārena ^b^ritto^eb^ tuccho, ^b^tatheva^eb^ tathā eva loke ^b^titthiyā^eb^ nānādiṭṭhigatikā bahujjanā asaṅkhatena nibbānena ^b^rittā^eb^ tucchāti sambandho. ^b^se^eb^ti nipātamattaṃ.

[03] 274^b^.^eb^ ^b^pacchimabhave^eb^ pariyosānajātiyaṃ ^b^brahmabandhu^eb^ brāhmaṇakule jāto ahaṃ ahosinti attho. ^b^mahābhogaṃ chaḍḍetvānā^eb^ti mahantaṃ bhogakkhandhaṃ ^a^M1.0256^ea^ kheḷapiṇḍaṃ iva chaḍḍetvā, ^b^anagāriyaṃ^eb^ kasivāṇijjādikammavirahitaṃ tāpasapabbajjaṃ ^b^pabbajiṃ^eb^ paṭipajjinti attho.
[06] paṭhamabhāṇavāravaṇṇanā samattā.

[03] 275-7^b^.^eb^ ^b^ajjhāyako...pe0... muniṃ mone samāhita^eb^nti monaṃ vuccati ñāṇaṃ, tena monena samannāgato muni, tasmiṃ mone sammā āhitaṃ ṭhapitaṃ samāhitaṃ cittanti attho. āgusaṅkhātaṃ pāpaṃ na karotīti nāgo, assajitthero, taṃ mahānāgaṃ suṭṭhu ^a^P0.0231^ea^ phullaṃ vikasitapadumaṃ yathā virocamānanti attho.
[03] 278-281^b^.^eb^ ^b^disvā me...pe0...^eb^ ^a^V1.0237^ea^ ^b^pucchituṃ amataṃ pada^eb^nti uttānatthameva.
[03] 282^b^.^eb^ ^b^vīthintare^eb^ti vīthiantare ^b^anuppattaṃ^eb^ sampattaṃ upagataṃ taṃ theraṃ ^b^upagantvāna^eb^ samīpaṃ gantvā ahaṃ pucchinti sambandho.

[03] 284^b^.^eb^ ^b^kīdisaṃ te mahāvīrā^eb^ti sakaladhitipurisasāsane arahantānamantare paṭhamaṃ dhammacakkapavattane, arahattappattamahāvīra, anujātaparivārabahulatāya ^b^mahāyasa te^eb^ tava buddhassa kīdisaṃ ^b^sāsanaṃ dhammaṃ^eb^ dhammadesanāsaṅkhātaṃ sāsananti sambandho. ^b^so^eb^ bhadramukha, ^b^me^eb^ mayhaṃ ^b^sādhu^eb^ bhaddakaṃ sāsanaṃ ^b^kathayassu^eb^ kathehīti attho.

[03] 285^b^.^eb^ tato kathitākāraṃ dassento ^b^so me puṭṭho^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^so^eb^ti assajitthero, ^b^me^eb^ mayā ^b^puṭṭho^eb^ ``sāsanaṃ kīdisa''nti kathito sabbaṃ kathaṃ kathesi. sabbaṃ sāsanaṃ satthagambhīratāya ^b^gambhīraṃ^eb^ desanādhammapaṭivedhagambhīratāya ^b^gambhīraṃ^eb^ paramatthasaccavibhāvitādivasena ^b^nipuṇaṃ padaṃ^eb^ nibbānaṃ taṇhāsallassa ^b^hantāraṃ^eb^ vināsakaraṃ sabbassa saṃsāradukkhassa ^b^apanudanaṃ^eb^ khepanakaraṃ dhammanti sambandho.

[03] 286^b^.^eb^ tena kathitākāraṃ dassento ^b^ye dhammā^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^hetuppabhavā^eb^ hetuto kāraṇato uppannā jātā bhūtā sañjātā nibbattā abhinibbattā, ^b^ye dhammā^eb^ ye sappaccayā sabhāvadhammā santi saṃvijjanti upalabhantīti ^a^M1.0257^ea^ sambandho. ^b^tesaṃ^eb^ dhammānaṃ ^b^hetuṃ^eb^ kāraṇaṃ tathāgato ^b^āha^eb^ kathesi. ^b^tesañca yo nirodho^eb^ti tesaṃ hetudhammānaṃ yo nirodho nirujjhanasabhāvo, ^b^evaṃvādī mahāsamaṇo^eb^ti sīlasamādhipaññādiguṇaparivāramahantatāya samitapāpattā viddhaṃsitapāpattā ca mahāsamaṇo bhagavā evaṃvādī hetuvūpasamanādivadanasīlo kathetāti attho.
[03] 287^b^.^eb^ tato vuttadhammaṃ sutvā attanā paccakkhakatappakāraṃ dassento ^b^soha^eb^ntiādimāha. taṃ uttānameva.

[03] 289^b^.^eb^ ^b^eseva dhammo yaditāvadevā^eb^ti sacepi ito uttariṃ natthi, ettakameva idaṃ sotāpattiphalameva pattabbaṃ. tathā eso eva dhammoti attho. ^b^paccabyatha^eb^ paṭividdhatha tumhe asokaṃ ^b^padaṃ^eb^ nibbānaṃ. amhehi nāma idaṃ padaṃ bahukehi kappanahutehi adiṭṭhameva abbhatītaṃ.

[03] 290^b^.^eb^ ^b^yvāhaṃ^eb^ ^a^V1.0238^ea^ ^a^P0.0232^ea^ ^b^dhammaṃ gavesanto^eb^ti yo ahaṃ dhammaṃ santipadaṃ gavesanto pariyesanto ^b^kutitthe^eb^ kucchitatitthe ninditabbatitthe ^b^sañcariṃ^eb^ paribbhaminti attho. ^b^so me attho anuppatto^eb^ti so pariyesitabbo attho mayā anuppatto sampatto, idāni pana ^b^me^eb^ mayhaṃ ^b^nappamajjituṃ^eb^ appamādena bhavituṃ kāloti attho.

[03] 291^b^.^eb^ ahaṃ assajinā therena ^b^tosito^eb^ katasomanasso, ^b^acalaṃ^eb^ niccalaṃ nibbānapadaṃ, ^b^patvāna^eb^ pāpuṇitvā ^b^sahāyakaṃ^eb^ kolitamāṇavaṃ ^b^gavesanto^eb^ pariyesanto assamapadaṃ agamāsinti attho.

[03] 292^b^.^eb^ ^b^dūratova mamaṃ disvā^eb^ti assamapadato dūratova āgacchantaṃ mamaṃ disvā susikkhito ^b^me^eb^ mama sahāyo ṭhānanisajjādīriyāpathehi ^b^sampanno^eb^ samaṅgībhūto ^b^idaṃ^eb^ upari vuccamānavacanaṃ ^b^abravi^eb^ kathesīti attho.

[03] 293^b^.^eb^ bho sahāya, ^b^pasannamukhanettāsi^eb^ pasannehi sobhanehi daddallamānehi mukhanettehi samannāgato asi. munibhāvo iva te ^b^dissati^eb^ paññāyati. itthambhūto tvaṃ ^b^amatādhigato^eb^ amataṃ nibbānaṃ adhigato asi, ^b^kacci accutaṃ^eb^ nibbāna^b^padaṃ^eb^ adhigato adhigacchīti pucchāmīti attho.

[03] 294^b^.^eb^ ^b^subhānurūpo^eb^ ^a^M1.0258^ea^ ^b^āyāsī^eb^ti subhassa pasannavaṇṇassa anurūpo hutvā āyāsi āgacchasi. ^b^āneñjakārito viyā^eb^ti tomarādīhi kārito āneñjo hatthī viya ^b^dantova^eb^ tīhi māsehi susikkhito iva bāhitapāpattā, ^b^brāhmaṇa dantadamatho^eb^ sikkhitasikkho nibbānapade upasanto asīti pucchi.
[03] 295^b^.^eb^ tena puṭṭho ^b^amataṃ mayā^eb^tiādimāha. taṃ uttānatthameva.

[03] 299^b^.^eb^ ^b^apariyositasaṅkappo^eb^ti ``anāgate ekassa buddhassa aggasāvako bhaveyya''nti patthitapatthanāya koṭiṃ appattasaṅkappoti attho. ^b^kutitthe^eb^ agantabbamagge ^b^ahaṃ sañcariṃ^eb^ paribbhamiṃ. bhante gotama, lokajeṭṭha tava dassanaṃ ^b^āgamma^eb^ patvā, ^b^mama saṅkappo^eb^ mayhaṃ patthanā ^b^pūrito^eb^ arahattamaggādhigamena sāvakapāramīñāṇassa pāpuṇanena paripuṇṇoti adhippāyo.

[03] 300^b^.^eb^ ^b^pathaviyaṃ^eb^ ^a^V1.0239^ea^ ^b^patiṭṭhāyā^eb^ti pathaviyaṃ nibbattā ^b^samaye^eb^ hemantakāle ^b^pupphanti^eb^ vikasanti, ^b^dibbagandhā^eb^ sugandhā suṭṭhu ^b^pavanti^eb^ pavāyanti, ^b^sabbapāṇinaṃ^eb^ sabbe devamanusse ^b^tosenti^eb^ somanassayutte karonti yathā.

[03] 301^b^.^eb^ ^b^tathevāhaṃ mahāvīrā^eb^ti mahāvīriyavantasakyakulapasutamahāparivāra ^b^te^eb^ tava sāsane ^b^patiṭṭhāya^eb^ ahaṃ patiṭṭhahitvā ^a^P0.0233^ea^ ^b^pupphituṃ^eb^ arahattamaggañāṇena vikasituṃ ^b^samayaṃ^eb^ kālaṃ ^b^esāmi^eb^ gavesāmi tathevāti sambandho.

[03] 302^b^.^eb^ ^b^vimuttipuppha^eb^nti sabbakilesehi vimuccanato vimocanato vā vimutti arahattaphalavimuttisaṅkhātaṃ pupphaṃ ^b^esanto^eb^ gavesento, tañca kho ^b^bhavasaṃsāramocanaṃ^eb^ kāmabhavādibhavesu saṃsaraṇaṃ gamanaṃ bhavasaṃsāraṃ, tato mocanaṃ bhavasaṃsāramocanaṃ. ^b^vimuttipupphalābhenā^eb^ti vimuccanaṃ vimuccanti vā katasambhārā etāyāti vimutti, aggaphalaṃ. pupphanti vikasanti veneyyā etenāti pupphaṃ. vimutti eva pupphaṃ vimuttipupphaṃ. labhanaṃ lābho, vimuttipupphassa lābho vimuttipupphalābho. tena vimuttipupphalābhena adhigamanena ^b^sabbapāṇinaṃ^eb^ sabbasatte ^b^tosemi^eb^ somanassaṃ pāpemīti attho.

[03] 303^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yāvatā^eb^ ^a^M1.0259^ea^ ^b^buddhakhettamhī''^eb^tiādīsu ^b^cakkhuma^eb^ pañcahi cakkhūhi cakkhumanta yattake ṭhāne ratanasuttādīnaṃ parittānaṃ āṇā ānubhāvo pavattati, tattake satasahassakoṭicakkavāḷasaṅkhāte buddhakhette ^b^ṭhapetvāna mahāmuniṃ^eb^ sammāsambuddhaṃ vajjetvā avasesesu sattesu añño koci ^b^tava puttassa^eb^ tuyhaṃ puttena mayā ^b^paññāya sadiso^eb^ samo natthīti sambandho. sesaṃ uttānameva.

[03] 308^b^.^eb^ ^b^paṭipannā^eb^ti catumaggasamaṅgino ca ^b^phalaṭṭhā^eb^ arahattaphale ṭhitā ca ^b^sekhā phalasamaṅgino^eb^ heṭṭhimehi tīhi phalehi samannāgatā ca ete aṭṭha ariyabhikkhū, ^b^uttamatthaṃ^eb^ nibbānaṃ ^b^āsīsakā^eb^ gavesakā, ^b^taṃ^eb^ paññavantaṃ ^b^parivārenti sadā^eb^ sabbakālaṃ sevanti bhajanti payirupāsantīti attho.
[03] 310^b^.^eb^ kāyavedanācittadhammānupassanāsaṅkhātānaṃ catunnaṃ satipaṭṭhānānaṃ ^b^kusalā^eb^ chekā satisambojjhaṅgādīnaṃ sattannaṃ sambojjhaṅgānaṃ ^b^bhāvanāya^eb^vaḍḍhanāya^b^ ratā^eb^ allīnā.
[03] ^b^.^eb^ ^b^uḷurājāva^eb^ ^a^V1.0240^ea^ tārakarājā iva ca sobhasi.

[03] 315^b^.^eb^ rukkhapabbataratanasattādayo dhāretīti dharaṇī, dharaṇiyaṃ ruhā sañjātā vaḍḍhitā cāti ^b^dharaṇīruhā^eb^ rukkhā. pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāya ^b^ruhanti^eb^ vaḍḍhanti vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ āpajjanti. ^b^vepullataṃ^eb^ vipulabhāvaṃ paripūrabhāvaṃ ^b^pāpuṇanti, te^eb^ rukkhā kamena ^b^phalaṃ dassayanti^eb^ phaladhārino honti.

[03] 317-9^b^.^eb^ punapi bhagavantameva thomento ^b^sindhu sarassatī^eb^tiādimāha. tattha sindhuvādi nāma gaṅgā ca sarassatī nāma gaṅgā ca nandiyagaṅgā ca candabhāgāgaṅgā ca gaṅgā nāma gaṅgā ca yamunā nāma gaṅgā ca sarabhū nāma gaṅgā ca mahī nāma gaṅgā ca. ^b^sandamānānaṃ^eb^ gacchantīnaṃ ^b^etāsaṃ^eb^ gaṅgānaṃ ^b^sāgarova^eb^ samuddo eva ^b^sampaṭicchati^eb^ ^a^P0.0234^ea^ paṭiggaṇhāti dhāreti. tadā etā sabbagaṅgā ^b^purimaṃ nāmaṃ^eb^ sindhuvādigaṅgātyādikaṃ purimaṃ nāmapaññattivohāraṃ ^b^jahanti^eb^ chaḍḍenti ^b^sāgaroteva^eb^ sāgaro iti eva ^b^ñāyati^eb^ pākaṭā bhavati yathā. ^b^tatheva^eb^ tathā eva ^b^ime^eb^ ^a^M1.0260^ea^ ^b^catubbaṇṇā^eb^ khattiyabrāhmaṇavessasuddasaṅkhātā cattāro kulā ^b^tavantike^eb^ tava antike samīpe ^b^pabbajitvā^eb^ pattakāsāyacīvaradhārino paricarantā ^b^purimaṃ nāmaṃ^eb^ khattiyādināmadheyyaṃ paññattivohāraṃ ^b^jahanti^eb^ cajanti, ^b^buddhaputtāti^eb^ buddhassa orasāti ^b^ñāyare^eb^ pākaṭā bhaveyyuṃ.

[03] 320-4^b^.^eb^ ^b^cando^eb^ candamaṇḍalo abbhā mahikā rajo dhumo rāhūti pañcahi upakkilesehi virahitattā ^b^vimalo^eb^ vigatamalo nimmalo, ^b^ākāsadhātuyā^eb^ ākāsagabbhe ^b^gacchaṃ^eb^ gacchanto, ^b^sabbe^eb^ tārakasamūhe ābhāya maddamāno loke ^b^atirocati^eb^ daddallati yathā. ^b^tatheva^eb^ tathā eva tvaṃ...pe0....

[03] 325-7^b^.^eb^ ^b^udake jātā^eb^ udake saṃvaḍḍhā kumudā mandālakā ca ^b^bahū^eb^ saṅkhātikkantā, ^b^toyena^eb^ udakena kaddamakalalena ca ^b^upalimpanti^eb^ allīyanti yathā, tatheva ^b^bahukā sattā^eb^ aparimāṇā sattā loke ^b^jātā^eb^ saṃvaḍḍhā rāgena ca dosena ca ^b^aṭṭitā^eb^ bandhitā ^b^virūhare^eb^ viruhanti. kaddame kumudaṃ yathā viruhati sañjāyati. ^b^kesarī^eb^ti padumaṃ.

[03] 329-30^b^.^eb^ ^b^rammake māse^eb^ti kattikamāse ``komudiyā cātumāsiniyā''ti vuttattā. ^b^vārijā^eb^ padumapupphādayo ^b^bahū^eb^ pupphā ^b^pupphanti^eb^ vikasanti, ^b^taṃ māsaṃ^eb^ taṃ kattikamāsaṃ nātivattanti vārijāti sambandho. ^b^samayo pupphanāya so^eb^ti so kattikamāso pupphanāya vikasanāya samayo kāloti ^a^V1.0241^ea^ attho. yathā pupphanti tatheva tvaṃ, sakyaputta, ^b^pupphito^eb^ vikasito asi. ^b^pupphito te vimuttiyā^eb^ti te tuyhaṃ sissā katasambhārā bhikkhū vimuttiyā arahattaphalañāṇena pupphito vikasito. yathā vārijaṃ padumaṃ pupphanasamayaṃ nātikkamati, tathā te sāsanaṃ ovādānusāsaniṃ ^b^nātivattanti^eb^ nātikkamantīti attho.

[03] 333-4^b^.^eb^ ^b^yathāpi selo himavā^eb^ti himavā nāma selamayapabbato. ^b^sabbapāṇinaṃ^eb^ sabbesaṃ byādhitānaṃ sattānaṃ ^b^osadho^eb^ osadhavanto sabbanāgānaṃ sabbāsurānaṃ sabbadevānañca ^b^ālayo^eb^ agārabhūto yathā, tatheva tvaṃ, mahāvīra, sabbapāṇinaṃ jarābyādhimaraṇādīhi pamocanato osadho viya. yathā so himavā nāgādīnaṃ ālayo, tathā ^a^M1.0261^ea^ tevijjāya ca chaḷabhiññāya ca iddhiyā ca ^b^pāramiṃ^eb^ pariyosānaṃ ^b^gatā^eb^ pattā tuvaṃ nissāya vasantīti sambandho. heṭṭhā vā upari vā upamāupameyyavasena gāthānaṃ sambandhanayā suviññeyyāva.

[03] 342^b^.^eb^ ^b^āsayānusayaṃ ñatvā^eb^ti ettha āsayoti ajjhāsayo cariyā, anusayoti thāmagatakileso. ``ayaṃ rāgacarito, ayaṃ dosacarito, ayaṃ mohacarito''tiādinā ^a^P0.0235^ea^ āsayañca anusayaṃ kilesapavattiñca jānitvāti attho. ^b^indriyānaṃ balābala^eb^nti saddhindriyādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ tikkhindriyo mudindriyo svākāro dvākāro suviññāpayo duviññāpayoti evaṃ balābalaṃ jānitvā. ^b^bhabbābhabbe viditvānā^eb^ti ``mayā desitaṃ dhammaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ ayaṃ puggalo bhabbo samattho, ayaṃ puggalo abhabbo''ti viditvā paccakkhaṃ katvā, bhante, sabbaññu tvaṃ cātuddīpikamahāmegho viya dhammadesanāsīhanādena abhītanādena ^b^gajjasi^eb^ sakalaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ ekaninnādaṃ karosi.
