[03] amhākampi bodhisatto tasmiṃ samaye tusitapurā cavitvā suddhodanamahārājassa aggamahesiyā kucchimhi nibbattitvā anukkamena vuddhippatto ekūnatiṃsa vassāni agāramajjhe vasitvā mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā anukkamena paṭividdhasabbaññutaññāṇo bodhimaṇḍe sattasattāhaṃ vītināmetvā isipatane migadāye dhammacakkaṃ pavattetvā lokānuggahaṃ karonto rājagahaṃ gantvā veḷuvane vihāsi. tadā suddhodanamahārājā -- ``putto kira me ^a^P0.0270^ea^ rājagahaṃ anuppatto; gacchatha, bhaṇe, mama puttaṃ ānethā''ti sahassasahassaparivāre dasa amacce pesesi. te sabbe ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbajiṃsu. tesu udāyittherena cārikāgamanaṃ āyācito bhagavā vīsatisahassakhīṇāsavaparivuto rājagahato nikkhamitvā ^a^M1.0303^ea^ kapilavatthupuraṃ gantvā ñātisamāgame anekāni pāṭihāriyāni dassetvā pāṭihāriyavicittaṃ dhammadesanaṃ kathetvā mahājanaṃ amatapānaṃ pāyetvā dutiyadivase pattacīvaramādāya nagaradvāre ṭhatvā ``kiṃ nu kho kulanagaraṃ āgatānaṃ sabbabuddhānaṃ āciṇṇa''nti āvajjamāno ``sapadānaṃ piṇḍāya caraṇaṃ āciṇṇa''nti ñatvā sapadānaṃ ^a^V1.0278^ea^ piṇḍāya carati. rājā ``putto te piṇḍāya caratī''ti sutvā turitaturito āgantvā antaravīthiyaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā attano nivesanaṃ pavesetvā mahantaṃ sakkārasammānaṃ akāsi. bhagavā tattha kattabbaṃ ñātisaṅgahaṃ katvā rāhulakumāraṃ pabbājetvā nacirasseva kapilavatthunagarato mallaraṭṭhe cārikaṃ caramāno anupiyambavanaṃ pāpuṇi.

[03] tasmiṃ samaye suddhodanamahārājā sākiyagaṇaṃ sannipātetvā āha -- ``sace mama putto agāraṃ ajjhāvasissa, rājā abhavissa cakkavattī sattaratanasampanno khattiyagaṇaparivāro, nattāpi me rāhulakumāro khattiyagaṇena saddhiṃ taṃ parivāretvā acarissa, tumhepi etamatthaṃ jānātha. idāni pana mama putto buddho jāto, khattiyāvāssa parivārā hontu, tumhe ekekakulato ekekaṃ dārakaṃ dethā''ti. evaṃ vutte ekappahāreneva dveasītisahassakhattiyakumārā pabbajiṃsu.

[03] tasmiṃ samaye mahānāmo sakko kuṭumbasāmiko, so attano kaniṭṭhaṃ anuruddhaṃ sakkaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca -- ``etarahi, tāta anuruddha, abhiññātā abhiññātā sakyakumārā bhagavantaṃ pabbajitaṃ anupabbajanti, amhākañca kulā natthi koci agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito, tena hi tvaṃ vā pabbajāhi, ahaṃ vā pabbajissāmī''ti. taṃ sutvā anuruddho gharāvāse ruciṃ akatvā attasattamo agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito. tassa pabbajjānukkamo saṅghabhedakakkhandhake (cūḷava0 330 ādayo) āgatoyeva. evaṃ anupiyaṃ gantvā pabbajitesu pana tesu tasmiṃyeva antovasse bhaddiyatthero arahattaṃ pāpuṇi, anuruddhatthero dibbacakkhuṃ nibbattesi, devadatto aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattesi, ānandatthero sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi, bhagutthero ca kimilatthero ca pacchā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. tesaṃ sabbesampi therānaṃ ^a^P0.0271^ea^ attano attano āgataṭṭhānesu pubbapatthanābhinīhāro āvi bhavissati. ayaṃ anuruddhatthero dhammasenāpatissa ^a^M1.0304^ea^ santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā cetiyaraṭṭhe pācīnavaṃsadāyaṃ gantvā samaṇadhammaṃ karonto satta mahāpurisavitakke vitakkesi, aṭṭhame kilamati. satthā ``anuruddho aṭṭhame mahāpurisavitakke kilamatī''ti ñatvā ``tassa saṅkappaṃ pūressāmī''ti tattha gantvā paññattavarabuddhāsane nisinno aṭṭhamaṃ mahāpurisavitakkaṃ pūretvā catupaccayasantosabhāvanārāmapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ mahāariyavaṃsapaṭipadaṃ kathetvā ākāse uppatitvā bhesakalāvanameva gato.

[03] thero tathāgate gatamatteyeva tevijjo mahākhīṇāsavo hutvā ``satthā mayhaṃ manaṃ jānitvā āgantvā aṭṭhamaṃ mahāpurisavitakkaṃ pūretvā adāsi, so ca me manoratho matthakaṃ patto''ti buddhānaṃ dhammadesanaṃ attano ca paṭivedhadhammaṃ ārabbha imā udānagāthā abhāsi --
[21] ``mama ^a^V1.0279^ea^ saṅkappamaññāya, satthā loke anuttaro.
[22] manomayena kāyena, iddhiyā upasaṅkami..
[21] ``yadā me ahu saṅkappo, tato uttari desayi.
[22] nippapañcarato buddho, nippapañcamadesayi..
[21] ``tassāhaṃ dhammamaññāya, vihāsiṃ sāsane rato.
[22] tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana''nti.. (theragā0 901-903).
[03] atha naṃ aparabhāge satthā jetavane mahāvihāre viharanto ``dibbacakkhukānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anuruddho aggo''ti (a0 ni0 1.192) aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.

[03] 421^b^.^eb^ evaṃ so bhagavato santikā dibbacakkhukānaṃ aggaṭṭhānaṃ labhitvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassavasena pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento ^b^sumedhaṃ bhagavantāha^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha sundarā upaṭṭhāpanapaññā maggaphalapaññā vipassanāpaññā catupaṭisambhidādisaṅkhātā medhā yassa bhagavato so sumedho, taṃ ^b^sumedhaṃ^eb^ bhāgyasampannattā ^b^bhagavantaṃ^eb^ lokassa ^b^jeṭṭhaṃ^eb^ seṭṭhaṃ padhānabhūtaṃ saṃsārato paṭhamaṃ niggataṃ narānaṃ āsabhaṃ purecārikaṃ ^b^vūpakaṭṭhaṃ^eb^ vivekabhūtaṃ gaṇasaṅgaṇikārāmato apagataṃ viharantaṃ ahaṃ addasanti sambandho.

[03] 422^b^.^eb^ sabbadhammānaṃ ^a^M1.0305^ea^ sayameva buddhattā ^b^sambuddhaṃ, upagantvāna^eb^ samīpaṃ gantvāti attho. ^b^añjaliṃ paggahetvānā^eb^ti dasaṅgulipuṭaṃ muddhani katvāti attho. sesaṃ uttānatthameva.
[03] 430^b^.^eb^ ^b^divā rattiñca passāmī^eb^ti tadā devaloke ca manussaloke ca uppannakāle ^a^P0.0272^ea^ maṃsacakkhunā samantato yojanaṃ passāmīti attho.

[03] 431^b^.^eb^ ^b^sahassalokaṃ ñāṇenā^eb^ti paññācakkhunā sahassacakkavāḷaṃ passāmīti attho. ^b^satthu sāsane^eb^ti idāni gotamassa bhagavato sāsane. ^b^dīpadānassa^eb^ dīpapūjāya idaṃ phalaṃ, iminā phalena dibbacakkhuṃ anuppatto paṭiladdho uppādesinti attho.
[06] anuruddhattherāpadānavaṇṇanā samattā.

[01] ^b^ajjhāyako^eb^ ^a^V1.0280^ea^ ^b^mantadharo^eb^tiādikaṃ āyasmato puṇṇassa mantāṇiputtattherassa apadānaṃ. ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato uppattito puretarameva haṃsavatīnagare brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbattitvā anukkamena viññutaṃ patto. aparabhāge padumuttare bhagavati uppajjitvā bodhaneyyānaṃ dhammaṃ desente heṭṭhā vuttanayena mahājanena saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā parisapariyante nisīditvā dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ dhammakathikānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā ``mayāpi anāgate evarūpena bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī''ti cintetvā desanāvasāne uṭṭhitāya parisāya satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā nimantetvā heṭṭhā vuttanayena mahāsakkāraṃ katvā bhagavantaṃ evamāha -- ``bhante, ahaṃ iminā adhikārena na aññaṃ sampattiṃ patthemi, yathā paneso bhikkhu sattamadivasamatthake tumhehi dhammakathikānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito, evaṃ ahampi anāgate ekassa buddhassa sāsane dhammakathikānaṃ aggo bhaveyya''nti patthanaṃ akāsi. satthā anāgataṃ oloketvā tassa patthanāya samijjhanabhāvaṃ disvā ``anāgate ^a^M1.0306^ea^ kappasatasahassamatthake gotamo nāma buddho uppajjissati, tassa sāsane pabbajitvā tvaṃ dhammakathikānaṃ aggo bhavissasī''ti byākāsi.

[03] so yāvatāyukaṃ kalyāṇakammaṃ katvā tato cuto kappasatasahassaṃ puññasambhāraṃ sambharanto devamanussesu saṃsaritvā amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle kapilavatthunagarassa avidūre doṇavatthunāmake brāhmaṇagāme brāhmaṇamahāsālakule aññāsikoṇḍaññattherassa bhāgineyyo hutvā nibbatti. tassa ^b^puṇṇo^eb^ti nāmaṃ akaṃsu. so satthari abhisambodhiṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakke anukkamena rājagahaṃ upanissāya viharante aññāsikoṇḍaññassa santike pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado padhānamanuyuñjanto sabbaṃ pabbajitakiccaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā ``dasabalassa santikaṃ gamissāmī''ti mātulattherena saddhiṃ satthu santikaṃ āgantvā kapilavatthusāmantāyeva ^a^P0.0273^ea^ ohiyitvā yoniso manasikāre kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.

[01] tassa ^a^V1.0281^ea^ pana puṇṇattherassa santike pabbajitā kulaputtā pañcasatā ahesuṃ. thero te dasakathāvatthūhi ovadi. tepi sabbe dasakathāvatthūhi ovaditā tassa ovāde ṭhatvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇitvā attano pabbajitakiccaṃ matthakappattaṃ ñatvā upajjhāyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā āhaṃsu -- ``bhante, mayaṃ pabbajitakiccassa matthakaṃ pattā, dasannañca kathāvatthūnaṃ lābhino, samayo dāni no dasabalaṃ passitu''nti, thero tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā cintesi -- ``mayhaṃ dasakathāvatthulābhitaṃ satthā jānāti. ahaṃ dhammaṃ desento dasakathāvatthūni amuñcitvāva desemi, mayi ca gacchante sabbepime bhikkhū maṃ parivāretvā gacchissanti, evaṃ me gaṇena saddhiṃ gantvā ayuttaṃ dasabalaṃ passituṃ, ime tāva dasabalaṃ passituṃ gacchantū''ti. atha te evamāha -- ``āvuso, tumhe purato gantvā dasabalaṃ passatha, mama vacanena tathāgatassa pāde vandatha, ahampi tumhākaṃ gatamaggena āgacchissāmī''ti. tepi therā sabbe dasabalassa jātibhūmiraṭṭhavāsino sabbe khīṇāsavā sabbe dasakathāvatthulābhino upajjhāyassa ovādaṃ acchinditvā theraṃ vanditvā anupubbena cārikaṃ carantā saṭṭhiyojanamaggaṃ ^a^M1.0307^ea^ atikkamma rājagahe veḷuvanamahāvihāraṃ gantvā dasabalassa pāde vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu. āciṇṇaṃ kho panetaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ āgantukehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ paṭisammoditunti bhagavā tehi saddhiṃ ``kacci, bhikkhave, khamanīya''ntiādinā nayena madhurapaṭisanthāraṃ katvā ``kuto ca tumhe, bhikkhave, āgatatthā''ti pucchitvā puna tehi ``jātibhūmito''ti vutte ``ko nu kho, bhikkhave, jātibhūmiyaṃ jātibhūmakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ evaṃ sambhāvito `attanā ca appiccho appicchakathañca bhikkhūnaṃ kattā'''ti (ma0 ni0 1.252) dasakathāvatthulābhiṃ bhikkhuṃ pucchi. tepi ``puṇṇo nāma, bhante, āyasmā mantāṇiputto''ti ārocayiṃsu.

[01] tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā āyasmā sāriputto theraṃ dassanakāmo ahosi. atha satthā rājagahato sāvatthiṃ agamāsi. puṇṇattheropi dasabalassa tattha āgatabhāvaṃ sutvā ``satthāraṃ passissāmī''ti gantvā antogandhakuṭiyaṃyeva tathāgataṃ sampāpuṇi. satthā tassa dhammaṃ desesi. thero dhammaṃ sutvā dasabalaṃ vanditvā paṭisallānatthāya andhavanaṃ gantvā aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle divāvihāraṃ nisīdi. sāriputtattheropi tassāgamanaṃ sutvā sīsānulokiko gantvā okāsaṃ sallakkhetvā tasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisinnakaṃ upasaṅkamitvā therena saddhiṃ sammoditvā taṃ visuddhikkamaṃ ^a^P0.0274^ea^ (ma0 ni0 1.257) pucchi. sopissa pucchitapucchitaṃ byākaronto rathavinītūpamāya ativiya cittaṃ ārādhesi. te aññamaññassa subhāsitaṃ samanumodiṃsu.

[03] 434^b^.^eb^ atha naṃ satthā aparabhāge bhikkhusaṅghassa majjhe nisinno theraṃ ``etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave ^a^V1.0282^ea^, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhammakathikānaṃ yadidaṃ puṇṇo''ti (a0 ni0 1.188, 196) etadagge ṭhapesi. so pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassavasena pubbacaritāpadānaṃ vibhāvento ^b^ajjhāyako^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^ajjhāyako^eb^ti anekabrāhmaṇānaṃ vācetā sikkhāpetā. ^b^mantadharo^eb^ti mantānaṃ dhāretāti attho, vedasaṅkhātassa catutthavedassa sajjhāyanasavanadānānaṃ vasena dhāretāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^tiṇṇaṃ vedāna^eb^nti iruvedayajuvedasāmavedasaṅkhātānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ ñāṇena dhāretabbatā ``vedo''ti laddhanāmesu tīsu vedaganthesu pāraṃ pariyosānaṃ gatoti attho ^a^M1.0308^ea^. ^b^purakkhatomhi sissehī^eb^ti mama niccaparivārabhūtehi sissehi parivuto ahaṃ amhi. ^b^upagacchiṃ naruttama^eb^nti narānaṃ uttamaṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamiṃ, samīpaṃ gatoti attho. sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.

[03] 438^b^.^eb^ ^b^abhidhammanayaññūha^eb^nti ahaṃ tadā tassa buddhassa kāle abhidhammanayakovidoti attho. ^b^kathāvatthuvisuddhiyā^eb^ti kathāvatthuppakaraṇe visuddhiyā cheko, appicchasantuṭṭhikathādīsu dasasu kathāvatthūsu vā cheko, tāya kathāvatthuvisuddhiyā ^b^sabbesaṃ^eb^ yatijanānaṃ paṇḍitānaṃ ^b^viññāpetvāna^eb^ bodhetvāna ^b^anāsavo^eb^ nikkileso ^b^viharāmi^eb^ vāsaṃ kappemi.

[03] 439^b^.^eb^ ^b^ito pañcasate kappe^eb^ti ito pañcabuddhapaṭimaṇḍitato bhaddakappato pañcasate kappe ^b^suppakāsakā^eb^ suṭṭhu pākaṭā cakkaratanādi sattahi ratanehi sampannā jambudīpādicatudīpamhi ^b^issarā^eb^ padhānā ^b^caturo^eb^ cattāro cakkavattirājāno ahesunti attho. sesaṃ vuttanayamevāti.
[06] puṇṇamantāṇiputtattherāpadānavaṇṇanā samattā.

[03] ^b^nagare^eb^ ^a^V1.0283^ea^ ^b^haṃsavatiyā^eb^tiādikaṃ āyasmato upālittherassa apadānaṃ. ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare vibhavasampanne brāhmaṇakule nibbatto. ekadivasaṃ satthu santike dhammakathaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ^a^P0.0275^ea^ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ vinayadharānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā satthu adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi.

[03] so yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kappakagehe nibbatto. ^b^upālī^eb^tissa nāmaṃ akaṃsu. so vayappatto anuruddhādīnaṃ channaṃ khattiyānaṃ piyasahāyo hutvā tathāgate anupiyambavane viharante pabbajjāya nikkhamantehi chahi khattiyehi saddhiṃ nikkhamitvā pabbaji. tassa pabbajjāvidhānaṃ pāḷiyaṃ (cūḷava0 330 ādayo) āgatameva. so pabbajitvā upasampanno ^a^M1.0309^ea^ hutvā satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā ``mayhaṃ, bhante, araññavāsaṃ anujānāthā''ti āha. ``bhikkhu araññe vasantassa ekameva dhuraṃ vaḍḍhissati, mayhaṃ pana santike vasantassa vipassanādhurañca ganthadhurañca paripūressatī''ti. so satthu vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. satthāpi naṃ sayameva sakalaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ uggaṇhāpesi. so aparabhāge bhārukacchavatthuṃ ajjukavatthuṃ kumārakassapavatthunti imāni tīṇi vatthūni vinicchini. satthā ekekasmiṃ vinicchaye sādhukāraṃ datvā tayo vinicchaye aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā theraṃ vinayadharānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.

[03] 441^b^.^eb^ evaṃ so etadaggaṭṭhānaṃ patvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassappatto taṃ pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento ^b^nagare haṃsavatiyā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^haṃsavatiyā^eb^ti haṃsāvaṭṭāakārena vati pākāraparikkhepo yasmiṃ nagare, taṃ nagaraṃ ^b^haṃsavatī^eb^. atha vā anekasaṅkhā haṃsā taḷākapokkharaṇīsarapallalādīsu nivasantā ito cito ca vidhāvamānā vasanti etthāti ^b^haṃsavatī,^eb^ tassā haṃsavatiyā. ^b^sujāto nāma brāhmaṇo^eb^ti suṭṭhu jātoti sujāto, ``akkhitto anupakuṭṭho''ti vacanato agarahito hutvā jātoti attho. ^b^asītikoṭinicayo^eb^ti asītikoṭidhanarāsiko ^b^pahūtadhanadhaññavā^eb^ asaṅkhyeyyadhanadhaññavā brāhmaṇo sujāto nāma ahosinti sambandho.

[03] 442^b^.^eb^ punapi ^a^V1.0284^ea^ tasseva mahantabhāvaṃ dassento ^b^ajjhāyako^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^ajjhāyako^eb^ti paresaṃ vedattayādiṃ vācetā. ^b^mantadharo^eb^ti mantā vuccati paññā, athabbanavedabyākaraṇādijānanapaññavāti attho. ^b^tiṇṇaṃ vedāna pāragū^eb^ti iruvedayajuvedasāmavedasaṅkhātānaṃ ^a^P0.0276^ea^ tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pariyosānaṃ pattoti attho. ^b^lakkhaṇe^eb^ti lakkhaṇasatthe, buddhapaccekabuddhacakkavattītthipurisānaṃ hatthapādādīsu dissamānalakkhaṇapakāsanakaganthe cāti attho. ^b^itihāse^eb^ti ``itiha āsa itiha āsā''ti porāṇakathāppakāsake ganthe. ^b^sadhamme^eb^ti sakadhamme brāhmaṇadhamme ^b^pāramiṃ gato^eb^ pariyosānaṃ koṭiṃ gato pattoti attho.
[03] 443^b^.^eb^ ^b^paribbājā^eb^ti ye nigaṇṭhasāvakā, te sabbe nānādiṭṭhikā tadā ^b^mahiyā^eb^ pathavītale carantīti sambandho.
[03] 445^b^.^eb^ yāva ^a^M1.0310^ea^ yattakaṃ kālaṃ jino nuppajjati, tāva tattakaṃ kālaṃ buddhoti vacanaṃ natthīti attho.
[03] 446^b^.^eb^ ^b^accayena ahoratta^eb^nti aho ca ratti ca ahorattaṃ, bahūnaṃ saṃvaccharānaṃ atikkamenāti attho. sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.

[03] 454^b^.^eb^ ^b^mantāṇiputto^eb^ti mantāṇīnāmāya kappakadhītuyā putto, māsapuṇṇatāya divasapuṇṇatāya ^b^puṇṇo^eb^ti laddhanāmoti attho. tassa satthussa sāvako ^b^hessati^eb^ bhavissatīti sambandho.

[03] 455^b^.^eb^ ^b^evaṃ kittayi so buddho^eb^ti ^b^so^eb^ padumuttaro bhagavā ^b^evaṃ^eb^ iminā pakārena ^b^sunandaṃ^eb^ sundarākārena somanassadāyakaṃ ^b^kittayi^eb^ byākaraṇamadāsīti attho. ^b^sabbaṃ janaṃ^eb^ sakalajanasamūhaṃ sādhukaṃ ^b^hāsayanto^eb^ somanassaṃ karonto ^b^sakaṃ balaṃ^eb^ attano balaṃ ^b^dassayanto^eb^ pākaṭaṃ karontoti sambandho.

[03] 456^b^.^eb^ tato anantaraṃ attano ānubhāvaṃ aññāpadesena dassento ^b^katañjalī^eb^tiādimāha. tadā tasmiṃ buddhuppādato purimakāle sunandaṃ tāpasaṃ katañjalipuṭā sabbe janā namassantīti sambandho. ^b^buddhe kāraṃ karitvānā^eb^ti evaṃ so sabbajanapūjitopi samāno ``pūjitomhī''ti mānaṃ akatvā ^a^V1.0285^ea^ buddhasāsane adhikaṃ kiccaṃ katvā attano ^b^gatiṃ^eb^ jātiṃ ^b^sodhesi^eb^ parisuddhamakāsīti attho.

[03] 457^b^.^eb^ ^b^sutvāna munino vaca^eb^nti tassa sammāsambuddhassa vācaṃ, gāthābandhasukhatthaṃ ā-kārassa rassaṃ katvā ``vaca''nti vuttaṃ. ``anāgatamhi addhāne gotamo nāma nāmena satthā loke bhavissatī''ti imaṃ munino vacanaṃ sutvā ^b^yathā^eb^ yena pakārena gotamaṃ bhagavantaṃ passāmi, tathā tena pakārena ^b^kāraṃ^eb^ adhikakiccaṃ puññasambhāraṃ ^b^kassāmi^eb^ karissāmīti ^b^me^eb^ mayhaṃ ^b^saṅkappo^eb^ cetanāmanasikāro ^b^ahu^eb^ ahosīti sambandho.

[03] 458^b^.^eb^ ^b^evāhaṃ cintayitvānā^eb^ti ``ahaṃ kāraṃ karissāmī''ti evaṃ cintetvā. ^b^kiriyaṃ cintayiṃ mamā^eb^ti ``mayā kīdisaṃ puññaṃ kattabbaṃ nu kho''ti kiriyaṃ kattabbakiccaṃ cintayinti attho. ^b^kyāhaṃ kammaṃ ācarāmī^eb^ti ahaṃ ^a^M1.0311^ea^ kīdisaṃ puññakammaṃ ācarāmi pūremi nu khoti ^a^P0.0277^ea^ attho. ^b^puññakkhette anuttare^eb^ti uttaravirahite sakalapuññassa bhājanabhūte ratanattayeti attho.

[03] 459^b^.^eb^ ^b^ayañca pāṭhiko bhikkhū^eb^ti ayaṃ bhikkhu sarabhaññavasena ganthapāṭhapaṭhanato vācanato ``pāṭhiko''ti laddhanāmo bhikkhu. buddhasāsane sabbesaṃ pāṭhīnaṃ pāṭhakavācakānaṃ antare vinaye ca ^b^agganikkhitto^eb^ aggo iti ṭhapito. taṃ ṭhānaṃ tena bhikkhunā pattaṭṭhānantaraṃ ahaṃ ^b^patthaye^eb^ patthemīti attho.

[03] 460^b^.^eb^ tato paraṃ attano puññakaraṇūpāyaṃ dassento ^b^idaṃ me amitaṃ bhoga^eb^ntiādimāha. ^b^me^eb^ mayhaṃ ^b^amitaṃ^eb^ pamāṇavirahitaṃ bhogarāsiṃ ^b^akkhobhaṃ^eb^ khobhetuṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ ^b^sāgarūpamaṃ^eb^ sāgarasadisaṃ ^b^tena bhogena^eb^ tādisena dhanena buddhassa ārāmaṃ māpayeti sambandho. sesaṃ uttānatthameva.
[03] 474^b^.^eb^ bhikkhusaṅghe nisīditvā sambuddho tena suṭṭhu māpitaṃ kāritaṃ saṅghārāmaṃ paṭiggahetvā tassārāmassānisaṃsadīpakaṃ idaṃ vacanaṃ ^b^abravi^eb^ kathesīti sambandho.

[03] 475^b^.^eb^ kathaṃ? ^b^yo so^eb^ti yo saṅghārāmadāyako tāpaso ^b^sumāpitaṃ^eb^ kuṭileṇamaṇḍapapāsādahammiyapākārādinā suṭṭhu sajjitaṃ saṅghārāmaṃ buddhassa ^b^pādāsi^eb^ pa-kārena somanassasampayuttacittena ^a^V1.0286^ea^ adāsi. ^b^tamahaṃ kittayissāmī^eb^ti taṃ tāpasaṃ ahaṃ pākaṭaṃ karissāmi, uttāniṃ karissāmīti attho. ^b^suṇātha mama bhāsato^eb^ti bhāsantassa mayhaṃ vacanaṃ suṇātha, ohitasotā avikkhittacittā manasi karothāti attho.
[03] 476^b^.^eb^ tena dinnārāmassa phalaṃ dassento ^b^hatthī assā rathā pattī^eb^tiādimāha. taṃ suviññeyyameva.
[03] 477^b^.^eb^ ^b^saṅghārāmassidaṃ phala^eb^nti idaṃ āyatiṃ anubhavitabbasampattisaṅkhātaṃ iṭṭhaphalaṃ saṅghārāmadānassa phalaṃ vipākanti attho.

[03] 478^b^.^eb^ ^b^chaḷāsītisahassānī^eb^ti ^a^M1.0312^ea^ chasahassāni asītisahassāni ^b^samalaṅkatā^eb^ suṭṭhu alaṅkatā sajjitā ^b^nāriyo^eb^ itthiyo ^b^vicittavatthābharaṇā^eb^ti vicittehi anekarūpehi vatthehi ābharaṇehi ca samannāgatā. ^b^āmuttamaṇikuṇḍalā^eb^ti olambitamuttāhāramaṇikañcitakaṇṇāti attho.

[03] 479^b^.^eb^ tāsaṃ itthīnaṃ rūpasobhātisayaṃ vaṇṇento ^b^āḷārapamhā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha āḷārāni mahantāni akkhīni maṇiguḷasadisāni yāsaṃ itthīnaṃ tā āḷārapamhā bhamarānamiva mandalocanāti attho. ^b^hasulā^eb^ hāsapakati, līlāvilāsāti attho. ^b^susaññā^eb^ti sundarasaññitabbasarīrāvayavā. ^b^tanumajjhimā^eb^ti khuddakaudarapadesā. sesaṃ uttānameva.

[03] 484^b^.^eb^ ^b^tassa^eb^ ^a^P0.0278^ea^ ^b^dhammesu dāyādo^eb^ti tassa gotamassa bhagavato dhammesu dāyādo dhammakoṭṭhāsabhāgī. ^b^oraso^eb^ti urasi jāto, sithiladhanitādidasavidhabyañjanabuddhisampannaṃ kaṇṭhatāluoṭṭhādipañcaṭṭhāne ghaṭṭetvā desitadhammaṃ sutvā sotāpattimaggādimaggapaṭipāṭiyā sabbakilese khepetvā arahatte ṭhitabhāvena urasi jātaputtoti attho. ^b^dhammanimmito^eb^ti dhammena samena adaṇḍena asatthena nimmito pākaṭo bhavissasīti attho. ^b^upāli nāma nāmenā^eb^ti kiñcāpi so mātu nāmena mantāṇiputtanāmo, anuruddhādīhi pana saha gantvā pabbajitattā khattiyānaṃ upasamīpe allīno yutto kāyacittehi samaṅgībhūtoti upālīti nāmena satthu sāvako ^b^hessati^eb^ bhavissatīti attho.

[03] 485^b^.^eb^ ^b^vinaye pāramiṃ patvā^eb^ti vinayapiṭake koṭiṃ pariyosānaṃ patvā pāpuṇitvā. ^b^ṭhānāṭṭhāne ca kovido^eb^ti kāraṇākāraṇe ca dakkho chekoti attho. ^b^jinasāsanaṃ dhārento^eb^ti jinena ^a^V1.0287^ea^ vuttānusāsaniṃ jinassa piṭakattayaṃ vācanasavanacintanadhāraṇādivasena dhārento, sallakkhentoti attho. ^b^viharissatināsavo^eb^ti nikkileso catūhi iriyāpathehi aparipatantaṃ attabhāvaṃ harissati pavattessatīti attho.

[03] 487^b^.^eb^ ^b^aparimeyyupādāyā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0313^ea^ anekasatasahasse ādiṃ katvā. ^b^patthemi tava sāsana^eb^nti ``gotamassa bhagavato sāsane vinayadharānaṃ aggo bhaveyya''nti tuyhaṃ sāsanaṃ patthemi icchāmīti attho. ^b^so me attho^eb^ti so etadaggaṭṭhānantarasaṅkhāto attho me mayā anuppattoti attho. ^b^sabbasaṃyojanakkhayo^eb^ti sabbesaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ khayo mayā anuppattoti sambandho, nibbānaṃ adhigatanti attho.

[03] 488^b^.^eb^ rājadaṇḍena ^b^tajjito^eb^ pīḷito ^b^sūlāvuto^eb^ sūle āvuto āvuṇito ^b^poso^eb^ puriso sūle ^b^sātaṃ^eb^ madhurasukhaṃ ^b^avindanto^eb^ nānubhavanto ^b^parimuttiṃva^eb^ parimocanameva icchati yathāti sambandho.

[03] 489-90^b^.^eb^ ^b^mahāvīra^eb^ vīrānamantare vīruttama ahaṃ ^b^bhavadaṇḍena^eb^ jātidaṇḍena, ^b^tajjito^eb^ pīḷito ^b^kammasūlāvuto^eb^ kusalākusalakammasūlasmiṃ āvuto ^b^santo^eb^ saṃvijjamāno, ^b^pipāsāvedanāya^eb^ pipāsāturabhāvena ^b^aṭṭito^eb^ abhibhūto dukkhāpito ^b^bhave sātaṃ^eb^ saṃsāre madhuraṃ sukhaṃ ^b^na vindāmi^eb^ na labhāmi. rāgaggidosaggimohaggisaṅkhātehi, narakaggikappuṭṭhānaggidukkhaggisaṅkhātehi vā tīhi aggīhi ḍayhanto ^b^parimuttiṃ^eb^ parimuccanupāyaṃ ^b^gavesāmi^eb^ pariyesāmi tathevāti sambandho. yathā rājadaṇḍaṃ ito gato patto parimuttiṃ gavesati, tathā ahaṃ bhavadaṇḍappatto parimuttiṃ gavesāmīti sambandho.

[03] 491-2^b^.^eb^ puna saṃsārato mocanaṃ upamopameyyavasena dassento ^b^yathā^eb^ ^a^P0.0279^ea^ ^b^visādo^eb^tiādimāha. tattha visena sappavisena ā samantato daṃsīyittha daṭṭho hotīti ^b^visādo,^eb^ sappadaṭṭhoti attho. atha vā visaṃ halāhalavisaṃ adati gilatīti ^b^visādo,^eb^ visakhādakoti attho. yo puriso visādo, tena tādisena visena paripīḷito, tassa visassa vighātāya vināsāya upāyanaṃ upāyabhūtaṃ ^b^agadaṃ^eb^ osadhaṃ ^b^gaveseyya^eb^ pariyeseyya, taṃ gavesamāno ^b^visaghātakaṃ^eb^ visanāsakaṃ ^b^agadaṃ^eb^ osadhaṃ ^b^passeyya^eb^ dakkheyya. so taṃ attano diṭṭhaṃ osadhaṃ pivitvā ^b^visamhā^eb^ visato ^b^parimuttiyā^eb^ parimocanakāraṇā sukhī ^b^assa^eb^ bhaveyya yathāti sambandho.

[03] 493^b^.^eb^ ^b^tathevāha^eb^nti ^a^M1.0314^ea^ yathā yena pakārena so naro visahato, savisena sappena daṭṭho visakhādako ^a^V1.0288^ea^ vā osadhaṃ pivitvā sukhī bhaveyya, tatheva tena pakārena ahaṃ avijjāya mohena ^b^saṃ^eb^ suṭṭhu pīḷito. ^b^saddhammāgadamesaha^eb^nti ahaṃ saddhammasaṅkhātaṃ osadhaṃ esaṃ pariyesantoti attho.

[03] 494-5^b^.^eb^ ^b^dhammāgadaṃ gavesanto^eb^ti saṃsāradukkhavisassa vināsāya dhammosadhaṃ gavesanto. ^b^addakkhiṃ sakyasāsana^eb^nti sakyavaṃsapabhavassa gotamassa sāsanaṃ saddakkhinti attho. ^b^aggaṃ sabbosadhānaṃ ta^eb^nti sabbesaṃ osadhānaṃ antare taṃ sakyasāsanasaṅkhātaṃ dhammosadhaṃ aggaṃ uttamanti attho. ^b^sabbasallavinodana^eb^nti rāgasallādīnaṃ sabbesaṃ sallānaṃ vinodanaṃ vūpasamakaraṃ ^b^dhammosadhaṃ^eb^ dhammasaṅkhātaṃ osadhaṃ pivitvā ^b^sabbaṃ visaṃ^eb^ sakalasaṃsāradukkhavisaṃ ^b^samūhaniṃ^eb^ nāsesinti sambandho. ^b^ajarāmara^eb^nti taṃ dukkhavisaṃ samūhanitvā ajaraṃ jarāvirahitaṃ amaraṃ maraṇavirahitaṃ ^b^sītibhāvaṃ^eb^ rāgapariḷāhādivirahitattā sītalabhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ ahaṃ ^b^phassayiṃ^eb^ paccakkhamakāsinti sambandho.

[03] 496^b^.^eb^ puna kilesatamassa upamaṃ dassento ^b^yathā bhūtaṭṭito^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^yathā^eb^ yena pakārena ^b^bhūtaṭṭito^eb^ bhūtena yakkhena aṭṭito pīḷito ^b^poso^eb^ puriso ^b^bhūtaggāhena^eb^ yakkhaggāhena ^b^pīḷito^eb^ dukkhito ^b^bhūtasmā^eb^ yakkhaggāhato ^b^parimuttiyā^eb^ mocanatthāya bhūtavejjaṃ gaveseyya.

[03] 497^b^.^eb^ taṃ gavesamāno ca bhūtavijjāya suṭṭhu ^b^kovidaṃ^eb^ chekaṃ bhūtavejjaṃ passeyya, ^b^so^eb^ bhūtavejjo ^b^tassa^eb^ yakkhaggahitassa purisassa āvesabhūtaṃ ^b^vihane^eb^ vināseyya, ^b^samūlañca^eb^ mūlena saha āyatiṃ anāsevakaṃ katvā ^b^vināsaye^eb^ viddhaṃseyyāti sambandho.

[03] 498^b^.^eb^ ^b^mahāvīra^eb^ vīruttama ^b^tamaggāhena^eb^ kilesandhakāraggāhena pīḷito ahaṃ ^b^tatheva^eb^ tena pakāreneva ^b^tamato^eb^ kilesandhakārato ^b^parimuttiyā^eb^ mocanatthāya ^b^ñāṇālokaṃ^eb^ paññāālokaṃ gavesāmīti sambandho.

[03] 499^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^M1.0315^ea^ ^a^P0.0280^ea^ tadanantaraṃ ^b^kilesatamasodhanaṃ^eb^ kilesandhakāranāsakaṃ sakyamuniṃ addasanti attho. ^b^so^eb^ sakyamuni ^b^me^eb^ mayhaṃ ^b^tamaṃ^eb^ andhakāraṃ kilesatimiraṃ bhūtavejjova ^b^bhūtakaṃ^eb^ yakkhaggahitaṃ iva ^b^vinodesi^eb^ dūrī akāsīti sambandho.

[03] 500^b^.^eb^ so ahaṃ evaṃ vimutto ^b^saṃsārasotaṃ^eb^ saṃsārapavāhaṃ ^b^saṃ^eb^ suṭṭhu ^b^chindiṃ^eb^ chedesiṃ, ^b^taṇhāsotaṃ^eb^ taṇhāmahoghaṃ ^b^nivārayiṃ^eb^ niravasesaṃ appavattiṃ akāsinti attho. ^b^bhavaṃ ugghāṭayiṃ sabba^eb^nti ^a^V1.0289^ea^ kāmabhavādikaṃ sabbaṃ navabhavaṃ ugghāṭayiṃ vināsesinti attho. mūlato vināsento bhūtavejjo iva mūlato ugghāṭayinti sambandho.

[03] 501^b^.^eb^ tato nibbānapariyesanāya upamaṃ dassento ^b^yathā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha garuṃ bhāriyaṃ nāgaṃ gilatīti ^b^garuḷo^eb^. garuṃ vā nāgaṃ lāti ādadātīti ^b^garuḷo,^eb^ garuḷarājā. attano bhakkhaṃ sakagocaraṃ pannagaṃ pakārena parahatthaṃ na gacchatīti ^b^pannago^eb^ti laddhanāmaṃ nāgaṃ gahaṇatthāya ^b^opatati^eb^ avapatati, ^b^samantā^eb^ samantato ^b^yojanasataṃ^eb^ satayojanappamāṇaṃ ^b^mahāsaraṃ^eb^ mahāsamuddaṃ attano pakkhavātehi ^b^vikkhobheti^eb^ āloḷeti yathāti sambandho.

[03] 502^b^.^eb^ ^b^so^eb^ supaṇṇo vihaṅgamo vehāsagamanasīlo ^b^pannagaṃ^eb^ nāmaṃ gahetvā adhosīsaṃ olambetvā ^b^viheṭhayaṃ^eb^ tattha tattha vividhena heṭhanena heṭhento ^b^ādāya^eb^ daḷhaṃ gahetvā ^b^yena kāmaṃ^eb^ yattha gantukāmo, tattha ^b^pakkamati^eb^ gacchatīti sambandho.

[03] 503^b^.^eb^ bhante mahāvīra, yathā garuḷo ^b^balī^eb^ balavā pannagaṃ gahetvā pakkamati, tathā eva ahaṃ ^b^asaṅkhataṃ^eb^ paccayehi akataṃ nibbānaṃ ^b^gavesanto^eb^ paṭipattipūraṇavasena pariyesanto ^b^dose^eb^ sakaladiyaḍḍhakilesasahasse ^b^vikkhālayiṃ^eb^ visesena samucchedappahānena sodhesiṃ ahanti sambandho.

[03] 504^b^.^eb^ yathā garuḷo pannagaṃ gahetvā bhuñjitvā viharati, tathā ahaṃ ^b^dhammavaraṃ^eb^ uttamadhammaṃ ^b^diṭṭho^eb^ passanto etaṃ ^b^santipadaṃ^eb^ nibbānapadaṃ ^b^anuttaraṃ^eb^ uttaravirahitaṃ maggaphalehi ^b^ādāya^eb^ gahetvā vaḷañjetvā viharāmīti sambandho.

[03] 505^b^.^eb^ idāni ^a^M1.0316^ea^ nibbānassa dullabhabhāvaṃ dassento ^b^āsāvatī nāma latā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha sabbesaṃ devānaṃ āsā icchā etissaṃ latāyaṃ atthīti ^b^āsāvatī^eb^ nāma latā, ^b^cittalatāvane^eb^ anekavicittāhi latāhi gahanībhūte vane uyyāne ^b^jātā^eb^ nibbattāti attho. ^b^tassā^eb^ latāya ^b^vassasahassena^eb^ vassasahassaccayena ^b^ekaṃ phalaṃ nibbattate^eb^ ekaṃ phalaṃ gaṇhāti.

[03] 506^b^.^eb^ ^b^taṃ devā^eb^ti taṃ āsāvatiṃ lataṃ ^b^tāva dūraphalaṃ^eb^ tattakaṃ cirakālaṃ atikkamitvā phalaṃ gaṇhantaṃ saṃvijjamānaṃ ^a^P0.0281^ea^ ^b^devā^eb^ tāvatiṃsadevatā ^b^payirupāsanti^eb^ bhajanti, sā āsāvatī nāma ^b^latuttamā^eb^ latānaṃ antare uttamalatā evaṃ devānaṃ piyā ahosīti sambandho.

[03] 507^b^.^eb^ ^b^satasahassupādāyā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0290^ea^ satasahassasaṃvaccharaṃ ādiṃ katvā. ^b^tāhaṃ paricare munī^eb^ti monaṃ vuccati ñāṇaṃ, bhante, muni ñāṇavanta sabbaññu, ahaṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ paricare payirupāsāmi. ^b^sāyaṃpātaṃ namassāmī^eb^ti sāyanhasamayañca pubbaṇhasamayañcāti dvikkhattuṃ namassāmi paṇāmaṃ karomi. ^b^yathā devā^eb^ tāvatiṃsā devā viya āsāvatīlataṃ sāyaṃpātañca payirupāsantīti sambandho.

[03] 508^b^.^eb^ ^b^avañjhā pāricariyā^eb^ti yasmā buddhadassanahetu nibbānappatti ahosi, tasmā buddhapāricariyā vattapaṭipattikiriyā avañjhā atucchā ^b^namassanā^eb^ paṇāmakiriyā ca ^b^amoghā^eb^ atucchā. tathā hi ^b^dūrāgataṃ^eb^ dūrato saṃsāraddhānato āgatampi, ^b^santaṃ^eb^ saṃvijjamānaṃ ^b^khaṇoyaṃ^eb^ ayaṃ buddhuppādakkhaṇo ^b^na virādhayi^eb^ nātikkami, maṃ atikkamitvā na gatoti attho.

[03] 509^b^.^eb^ buddhadassanahetu nibbānappatto ahaṃ āyatiṃ uppajjanakabhave mama paṭisandhiṃ ^b^vicinanto^eb^ upaparikkhanto na passāmīti sambandho. ^b^nirūpadhi^eb^ khandhūpadhikilesūpadhīhi virahito ^b^vippamutto^eb^ sabbakilesehi vinābhūto ^b^upasanto^eb^ kilesapariḷāhābhāvena santamānaso carāmi ahanti sambandho.

[03] 510^b^.^eb^ puna attano buddhadassanāya upamaṃ dassento ^b^yathāpi padumaṃ nāmā^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^sūriyaraṃsena^eb^ sūriyaraṃsisamphassena yathā padumaṃ nāma ^a^M1.0317^ea^ api ^b^pupphati^eb^ vikasati ^b^mahāvīra^eb^ vīruttama ahaṃ tathā eva ^b^buddharaṃsena^eb^ buddhena bhagavatā desitadhammaraṃsippabhāvena pupphitoti attho.

[03] 511-12^b^.^eb^ puna buddhadassanena nibbānadassanaṃ dīpento ^b^yathā balākā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^balākayonimhi^eb^ balākajātiyaṃ ^b^sadā^eb^ sabbasmiṃ kāle ^b^pumā^eb^ puriso yathā na vijjati. pume avijjamāne kathaṃ balākānaṃ gabbhaggahaṇaṃ hotīti ce? meghesu ^b^gajjamānesu^eb^ saddaṃ karontesu meghagajjanaṃ sutvā ^b^tā^eb^ balākiniyo ^b^sadā^eb^ sabbakāle ^b^gabbhaṃ gaṇhanti^eb^ aṇḍaṃ dhārentīti attho. ^b^yāva^eb^ yattakaṃ kālaṃ^b^ megho na gajjati^eb^ megho saddaṃ na karoti, tāva tattakaṃ kālaṃ ^b^ciraṃ^eb^ cirakālena ^b^gabbhaṃ^eb^ aṇḍaṃ dhārenti. ^b^yadā^eb^ yasmiṃ kāle megho ^b^pavassati^eb^ pakārena gajjitvā vassati vuṭṭhidhāraṃ paggharati, tadā tasmiṃ kāle ^b^bhārato^eb^ gabbhadhāraṇato ^b^parimuccanti^eb^ aṇḍaṃ pātentīti attho.

[03] 513^b^.^eb^ tato paraṃ upameyyasampadaṃ dassento ^b^padumuttarabuddhassā^eb^tiādimāha. padumuttarassa buddhassa ^b^dhammameghena^eb^ vohāraparamatthadesanāsaṅkhātameghena ^b^gajjato^eb^ gajjantassa desentassa ^a^P0.0282^ea^ ^b^dhammameghassa saddena^eb^ ^a^V1.0291^ea^ ghosānusārena ahaṃ tadā ^b^dhammagabbhaṃ^eb^ vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ dānasīlādipuññasambhāragabbhaṃ ^b^agaṇhiṃ^eb^ gahesiṃ tathāti sambandho.

[03] 514^b^.^eb^ ^b^satasahassupādāya^eb^ kappasatasahassaṃ ādiṃ katvā ^b^puññagabbhaṃ^eb^ dānasīlādipuññasambhāraṃ ahaṃ ^b^dharemi^eb^ pūremi. yāva ^b^dhammamegho^eb^ dhammadesanā ^b^na gajjati^eb^ buddhena na desīyati, tāva ahaṃ ^b^bhārato^eb^ saṃsāragabbhabhārato ^b^nappamuccāmi^eb^ na mocemi na visuṃ bhavāmīti sambandho.

[03] 515^b^.^eb^ bhante, ^b^sakyamuni^eb^ sakyavaṃsappabhava ^b^yadā^eb^ yasmiṃ kāle suddhodanamahārājassa tava pitu ^b^ramme^eb^ ramaṇīye ^b^kapilavatthave^eb^ kapilavatthunāmake nagare tuvaṃ dhammameghena ^b^gajjati^eb^ ghoseti, tadā tasmiṃ kāle ahaṃ ^b^bhārato^eb^ saṃsāragabbhabhārato ^b^parimucciṃ^eb^ mutto ahosinti sambandho.

[03] 516^b^.^eb^ tato paraṃ attanā adhigate maggaphale dassento ^b^suññata^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha attāttaniyādīnaṃ abhāvato ^b^suññataṃ^eb^ vimokkhañca rāgadosamohasabbakilesanimittānaṃ abhāvato, ^b^animittaṃ^eb^ vimokkhañca ^a^M1.0318^ea^ taṇhāpaṇidhissa abhāvato, ^b^appaṇihitaṃ^eb^ vimokkhañca ariyamaggaṃ adhigañchiṃ bhāvesinti sambandho. ^b^caturo ca phale sabbe^eb^ti cattāri sāmaññaphalāni sabbāni sacchi akāsinti attho. ^b^dhammevaṃ vijaṭayiṃ aha^eb^nti ahaṃ evaṃ sabbadhamme jaṭaṃ gahanaṃ vijaṭayiṃ viddhaṃsesinti attho.
[06] dutiyabhāṇavāravaṇṇanā samattā.

[03] 517^b^.^eb^ tato paraṃ attanā adhigatavisesameva dassento ^b^aparimeyyupādāyā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha na parimeyyoti ^b^aparimeyyo,^eb^ saṃvaccharagaṇanavasena pametuṃ saṅkhātuṃ asakkuṇeyyoti attho. taṃ aparimeyyaṃ kappaṃ ^b^upādāya^eb^ ādiṃ katvā ^b^tava sāsanaṃ^eb^ tuyhaṃ sāsanaṃ ``anāgate gotamassa bhagavato sāsane vinayadharānaṃ aggo bhaveyya''nti evaṃ patthemi. atītatthe vattamānavacanaṃ, patthesinti attho. ^b^so me attho^eb^ti so patthanāsaṅkhāto attho ^b^me^eb^ mayā ^b^anuppatto^eb^ nipphāditoti attho. anuttaraṃ ^b^santipadaṃ^eb^ nibbānaṃ anuppattaṃ adhigatanti sambandho.

[03] 518^b^.^eb^ so ahaṃ adhigatattā ^b^vinaye^eb^ vinayapiṭake ^b^pāramiṃ patto^eb^ pariyosānappatto. ^b^yathāpi pāṭhiko isī^eb^ti yathā padumuttarassa bhagavato sāsane vinayadharānaṃ aggo isi bhikkhu pāṭhiko pākaṭo ^a^V1.0292^ea^ ahosi, tathevāhanti attho. ^b^na me samasamo atthī^eb^ti vinayadhāritāya ^a^P0.0283^ea^ me mayā samasamo samāno añño na atthīti attho. ^b^sāsanaṃ^eb^ ovādānusāsanīsaṅkhātaṃ sāsanaṃ ^b^dhāremi^eb^ pūremīti attho.

[03] 519^b^.^eb^ punapi attano visesaṃ dassento ^b^vinaye khandhake cāpī^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^vinaye^eb^ti ubhatovibhaṅge. ^b^khandhake^eb^ti mahāvaggacūḷavagge. ^b^tikacchede cā^eb^ti tikasaṅghādisesatikapācittiyādike ca. ^b^pañcame^eb^ti parivāre ca. ^b^ettha^eb^ etasmiṃ sakale vinayapiṭake mayhaṃ ^b^vimati^eb^ dveḷhakaṃ ^b^natthi^eb^ na saṃvijjati. ^b^akkhare^eb^ti vinayapiṭakapariyāpanne a-kārādike akkhare. ^b^byañjane^eb^ti ka-kārādike byañjane vā me ^b^vimati^eb^ saṃsayo natthīti sambandho.

[03] 520^b^.^eb^ ^b^niggahe^eb^ ^a^M1.0319^ea^ ^b^paṭikamme cā^eb^ti pāpabhikkhūnaṃ niggahe ca sāpattikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ parivāsadānādike paṭikamme ca ^b^ṭhānāṭṭhāne^eb^ ca kāraṇe ca akāraṇe ca ^b^kovido^eb^ chekoti attho. ^b^osāraṇe^eb^ ca tajjanīyādikammassa paṭippassaddhivasena osāraṇe pavesane ca. ^b^vuṭṭhāpane^eb^ ca āpattito vuṭṭhāpane nirāpattikaraṇe ca chekoti sambandho. ^b^sabbattha pāramiṃ gato^eb^ti sabbasmiṃ vinayakamme pariyosānaṃ patto, dakkho chekoti attho.

[03] 521^b^.^eb^ ^b^vinaye khandhake cāpī^eb^ti vuttappakāre vinaye ca khandhake ca, ^b^padaṃ^eb^ suttapadaṃ ^b^nikkhipitvā^eb^ paṭṭhapetvā. ^b^ubhato viniveṭhetvā^eb^ti vinayato khandhakato cāti ubhayato nibbattetvā vijaṭetvā nayaṃ āharitvā. ^b^rasato^eb^ti kiccato. ^b^osareyyaṃ^eb^ osāraṇaṃ karomīti attho.

[03] 522^b^.^eb^ ^b^niruttiyā ca kusalo^eb^ti ``rukkho paṭo kumbho mālā citta''ntiādīsu vohāresu cheko. ^b^atthānatthe ca kovido^eb^ti atthe vaḍḍhiyaṃ anatthe hāniyañca kovido dakkhoti attho. ^b^anaññātaṃ mayā natthī^eb^ti vinayapiṭake sakale vā piṭakattaye mayā anaññātaṃ aviditaṃ apākaṭaṃ kiñci natthīti attho. ^b^ekaggo satthu sāsane^eb^ti buddhasāsane ahameva eko vinayadharānaṃ aggo seṭṭho uttamoti attho.

[03] 523^b^.^eb^ ^b^rūpadakkhe ahaṃ ajjā^eb^ti ajja etarahi kāle ^b^sakyaputtassa^eb^ bhagavato ^b^sāsane^eb^ pāvacane ahaṃ rūpadakkhe rūpadassane vinayavinicchayadassane ^b^sabbaṃ kaṅkhaṃ^eb^ sakalaṃ saṃsayaṃ ^b^vinodemi^eb^ vināsemīti sambandho. ^b^chindāmi sabbasaṃsaya^eb^nti ``ahosiṃ nu kho ahamatītamaddhāna''ntiādikaṃ (ma0 ni0 1.18; saṃ0 ni0 2.20; mahāni0 174) ^a^V1.0293^ea^ kālattayaṃ ārabbha uppannaṃ sabbaṃ soḷasavidhaṃ kaṅkhaṃ chindāmi vūpasamemi sabbaso viddhaṃsemīti attho.

[03] 524^b^.^eb^ ^b^padaṃ anupadañcāpī^eb^ti padaṃ pubbapadañca anupadaṃ parapadañca ^b^akkharaṃ^eb^ ekekamakkharañca ^b^byañjanaṃ^eb^ sithiladhanitādidasavidhaṃ ^a^P0.0284^ea^ byañjanavidhānañca. ^b^nidāne^eb^ti tena samayenātiādike nidāne ca. ^b^pariyosāne^eb^ti nigamane. ^b^sabbattha kovido^eb^ti sabbesu chasu ṭhānesu chekoti attho.

[03] 525^b^.^eb^ tato ^a^M1.0320^ea^ paraṃ bhagavatoyeva guṇe pakāsento ^b^yathāpi rājā balavā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha yathā ^b^balavā^eb^ thāmabalasampanno senābalasampanno vā rājā, ^b^paraṃ^eb^ paresaṃ paṭirājūnaṃ senaṃ ^b^niggaṇhitvā^eb^ nissesato gahetvā palāpetvā vā, ^b^tape^eb^ tapeyya santapeyya dukkhāpeyya. ^b^vijinitvāna saṅgāma^eb^nti saṅgāmaṃ parasenāya samāgamaṃ yuddhaṃ vijinitvā visesena jinitvā jayaṃ patvā. ^b^nagaraṃ tattha māpaye^eb^ti tattha tasmiṃ vijitaṭṭhāne nagaraṃ pāsādahammiyādivibhūsitaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ māpaye kārāpeyyāti attho.

[03] 526^b^.^eb^ ^b^pākāraṃ parikhañcāpī^eb^ti tattha māpitanagare pākāraṃ sudhādhavalaiṭṭhakāmayapākārañca kārayeti sambandho. ^b^parikhañcāpi^eb^ kaddamaparikhaṃ, udakaparikhaṃ, sukkhaparikhañca api kāraye. ^b^esikaṃ dvārakoṭṭhaka^eb^nti nagarasobhanatthaṃ ussāpitaesikāthambhañca mahantaṃ koṭṭhakañca catubhūmakādidvārakoṭṭhakañca kāraye. ^b^aṭṭālake ca vividhe^eb^ti catubhūmakādibhede atiuccāṭṭālake ca vividhe nānappakārake bahū ^b^kāraye^eb^ kārāpeyyāti sambandho.

[03] 527^b^.^eb^ ^b^siṅghāṭakaṃ caccarañcā^eb^ti na kevalaṃ pākārādayo kāraye, siṅghāṭakaṃ catumaggasandhiñca caccaraṃ antarāvīthiñca kārayeti sambandho. ^b^suvibhattantarāpaṇa^eb^nti suṭṭhu vibhattaṃ vibhāgato koṭṭhāsavantaṃ antarāpaṇaṃ anekāpaṇasahassaṃ kārāpeyyāti attho. ^b^kārayeyya sabhaṃ tatthā^eb^ti tasmiṃ māpitanagare sabhaṃ dhammādhikaraṇasālaṃ kāraye. ^b^atthānatthavinicchayaṃ^eb^ vaḍḍhiñca avaḍḍhiñca vinicchayakaraṇatthaṃ vinicchayasālaṃ kārayeti sambandho.

[03] 528^b^.^eb^ ^b^nigghātatthaṃ amittāna^eb^nti paṭirājūnaṃ paṭibāhanatthaṃ. ^b^chiddāchiddañca jānitu^eb^nti dosañca adosañca jānituṃ. ^b^balakāyassa rakkhāyā^eb^ti hatthiassarathapattisaṅkhātassa balakāyassa senāsamūhassa ^a^V1.0294^ea^ ārakkhaṇatthāya ^b^so^eb^ nagarasāmiko rājā, ^b^senāpaccaṃ^eb^ senāpatiṃ senānāyakaṃ mahāmattaṃ ^b^ṭhapeti^eb^ ṭhānantare patiṭṭhapetīti attho.

[03] 529^b^.^eb^ ^b^ārakkhatthāya^eb^ ^a^M1.0321^ea^ ^b^bhaṇḍassā^eb^ti jātarūparajatamuttāmaṇiādirājabhaṇḍassa ārakkhaṇatthāya samantato gopanatthāya ^b^me^eb^ mayhaṃ ^b^bhaṇḍaṃ mā vinassī^eb^ti ^b^nidhānakusalaṃ^eb^ rakkhaṇe kusalaṃ chekaṃ ^b^naraṃ^eb^ ^a^P0.0285^ea^ purisaṃ ^b^bhaṇḍarakkhaṃ^eb^ bhaṇḍarakkhantaṃ so rājā bhaṇḍāgāre ṭhapetīti sambandho.

[03] 530^b^.^eb^ ^b^mamatto hoti yo rañño^eb^ti yo paṇḍito rañño mamatto māmako pakkhapāto hoti. ^b^vuddhiṃ yassa ca icchatī^eb^ti assa rañño vuddhiñca virūḷhiṃ yo icchati kāmeti, ^b^tassa^eb^ itthambhūtassa paṇḍitassa rājā ^b^adhikaraṇaṃ^eb^ vinicchayādhipaccaṃ deti ^b^mittassa^eb^ mittabhāvassa paṭipajjitunti sambandho.

[03] 531^b^.^eb^ ^b^uppātesū^eb^ti ukkāpātadisāḍāhādiuppātesu ca. ^b^nimittesū^eb^ti mūsikacchinnādīsu ``idaṃ nimittaṃ subhaṃ, idaṃ nimittaṃ asubha''nti evaṃ nimittajānanasatthesu ca. ^b^lakkhaṇesu cā^eb^ti itthipurisānaṃ hatthapādalakkhaṇajānanasatthesu ca ^b^kovidaṃ^eb^ chekaṃ ^b^ajjhāyakaṃ^eb^ anekesaṃ sissānaṃ byākaraṇavācakaṃ ^b^mantadharaṃ^eb^ vedattayasaṅkhātamantadhārakaṃ paṇḍitaṃ so rājā ^b^porohicce^eb^ purohitaṭṭhānantare ṭhapetīti sambandho.

[03] 532^b^.^eb^ ^b^etehaṅgehi sampanno^eb^ti etehi vuttappakārehi aṅgehi avayavehi sampanno samaṅgībhūto so rājā ``khattiyo''ti ^b^pavuccati^eb^ kathīyatīti sambandho. ^b^sadā rakkhanti rājāna^eb^nti ete senāpaccādayo amaccā sadā sabbakālaṃ taṃ rājānaṃ rakkhanti gopenti. kimiva? ^b^cakkavākova dukkhitaṃ^eb^ dukkhappattaṃ sakañātiṃ rakkhanto cakkavāko pakkhī ivāti attho.

[03] 533^b^.^eb^ ^b^tatheva tvaṃ mahāvīrā^eb^ti vīruttama, yathā so rājā senāpaccādiaṅgasampanno nagaradvāraṃ thaketvā paṭivasati, tatheva tuvaṃ ^b^hatāmitto^eb^ nihatapaccatthiko khattiyo iva ^b^sadevakassa lokassa^eb^ saha devehi pavattamānassa lokassa ^b^dhammarājā^eb^ dhammena samena rājā dasapāramitādhammaparipūraṇena rājabhūtattā ``dhammarājā''ti ^b^pavuccati^eb^ kathīyatīti sambandho.

[03] 534^b^.^eb^ ^b^titthiye nīharitvānā^eb^ti dhammarājabhāvena paṭipakkhabhūte sakalatitthiye nīharitvā nissesena haritvā nibbisevanaṃ katvā ^b^sasenakaṃ dhārañcāpi^eb^ senāya saha vasavattimārampi nīharitvā ^a^V1.0295^ea^. ^b^tamandhakāraṃ^eb^ ^b^vidhamitvā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0322^ea^ tamasaṅkhātaṃ mohandhakāraṃ vidhamitvā viddhaṃsetvā. ^b^dhammanagaraṃ^eb^ sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhammasaṅkhātaṃ, khandhāyatanadhātupaṭiccasamuppādabalabojjhaṅgagambhīranayasamantapaṭṭhānadhammasaṅkhātaṃ vā nagaraṃ ^b^amāpayi^eb^ nimmini patiṭṭhāpesīti attho.

[03] 535^b^.^eb^ ^b^sīlaṃ pākārakaṃ tatthā^eb^ti tasmiṃ patiṭṭhāpite dhammanagare catupārisuddhisīlaṃ pākāraṃ. ^b^ñāṇaṃ te dvārakoṭṭhaka^eb^nti te tuyhaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇāasayānusayañāṇānāgataṃsañāṇātītaṃsañāṇādikameva ñāṇaṃ dvārakoṭṭhakanti attho. ^b^saddhā te esikā vīrā^eb^ti, bhante, asithilaparakkama te tuyhaṃ dīpaṅkarapādamūlato pabhuti sabbaññutaññāṇakāraṇā saddahanasaddhā ussāpitālaṅkārālaṅkatathambhoti ^a^P0.0286^ea^ attho. ^b^dvārapālo ca saṃvaro^eb^ti te tuyhaṃ chadvārikasaṃvaro rakkhāvaraṇagutti dvārapālo dvārarakkhakoti attho.

[03] 536^b^.^eb^ ^b^satipaṭṭhānamaṭṭāla^eb^nti te tuyhaṃ catusatipaṭṭhānāṭṭālamuṇḍacchadanaṃ. ^b^paññā te caccaraṃ mune^eb^ti, bhante, mune ñāṇavanta te tuyhaṃ pāṭihāriyādianekavidhā paññā caccaraṃ maggasamodhānaṃ nagaravīthīti attho. ^b^iddhipādañca siṅghāṭa^eb^nti tuyhaṃ chandavīriyacittavīmaṃsasaṅkhātā cattāro iddhipādā siṅghāṭaṃ catumaggasanti. ^b^dhammavīthi sumāpita^eb^nti sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhammasaṅkhātāya vīthiyā suṭṭhu māpitaṃ sajjitaṃ, taṃ dhammanagaranti attho.

[03] 537^b^.^eb^ ^b^suttantaṃ abhidhammañcā^eb^ti tava tuyhaṃ ettha dhammanagare suttantaṃ abhidhammaṃ vinayañca ^b^kevalaṃ^eb^ sakalaṃ suttageyyādikaṃ navaṅgaṃ buddhavacanaṃ ^b^dhammasabhā^eb^ dhammādhikaraṇasālāti attho.

[03] 538^b^.^eb^ ^b^suññataṃ animittañcā^eb^ti anattānupassanāvasena paṭiladdhaṃ suññatavihārañca, aniccānupassanāvasena paṭiladdhaṃ animittavihārañca. ^b^vihārañcappaṇihita^eb^nti dukkhānupassanāvasena paṭiladdhaṃ appaṇihitavihārañca. ^b^āneñjañcā^eb^ti acalaṃ aphanditaṃ catusāmaññaphalasaṅkhātaṃ āneñjavihārañca. ^b^nirodho cā^eb^ti sabbadukkhanirodhaṃ nibbānañca. ^b^esā dhammakuṭī tavā^eb^ti esā sabbanavalokuttaradhammasaṅkhātā tava tuyhaṃ dhammakuṭi vasanagehanti attho.

[03] 539^b^.^eb^ ^b^paññāya^eb^ ^a^M1.0323^ea^ ^b^aggo nikkhitto^eb^ti paññāvasena paññavantānaṃ aggo. iti bhagavatā nikkhitto ṭhapito thero ^b^paṭibhāne^eb^ ca paññāya kattabbe kicce, yuttamuttapaṭibhāne vā ^b^kovido^eb^ cheko ^b^nāmena sāriputto^eb^ti pākaṭo ^b^tava^eb^ tuyhaṃ dhammasenāpati tayā desitassa piṭakattayadhammasamūhassa dhāraṇato pati padhāno hutvā senākiccaṃ karotīti attho.

[03] 540^b^.^eb^ ^b^cutūpapātakusalo^eb^ti ^a^V1.0296^ea^ bhante muni, ^b^cutūpapāte^eb^ cutiyā upapattiyā ca ^b^kusalo^eb^ cheko. ^b^iddhiyā pāramiṃ gato^eb^ti ``ekopi hutvā bahudhā hoti, bahudhāpi hutvā eko hotī''tiādinā (dī0 ni0 1.238; paṭi0 ma0 1.102) vuttāya iddhippabhedāya pāramiṃ pariyosānaṃ gato patto nāmena kolito nāma moggallānatthero ^b^porohicco^eb^ tava tuyhaṃ purohitoti sambandho.

[03] 541^b^.^eb^ ^b^porāṇakavaṃsadharo^eb^ti bhante mune, ñāṇavantaṃ porāṇassa vaṃsassa dhārako, paramparajānanako vā ^b^uggatejo^eb^ pākaṭatejo, ^b^durāsado^eb^ ^a^P0.0287^ea^ āsādetuṃ ghaṭṭetuṃ dukkho asakkuṇeyyoti attho. ^b^dhutavādiguṇenaggo^eb^ti tecīvarikaṅgādīni terasa dhutaṅgāni vadati ovadatīti dhutavādīguṇena dhutaṅgaguṇena aggo seṭṭho mahākassapatthero ^b^tava^eb^ tuyhaṃ ^b^akkhadasso^eb^ vohārakaraṇe padhānoti attho.

[03] 542^b^.^eb^ ^b^bahussuto dhammadharo^eb^ti bhante mune, bahūnaṃ caturāsītidhammakkhandhasahassānaṃ sutattā bhagavatā bhikkhusaṅghato ca uggahitattā bahussuto anekesaṃ chasatasahassasaṅkhyānaṃ āgamadhammānaṃ satipaṭṭhānādīnañca paramatthadhammānaṃ dhāraṇato dhammadharo ānando. ^b^sabbapāṭhī ca sāsane^eb^ti buddhasāsane sabbesaṃ pāṭhīnaṃ paṭhantānaṃ sajjhāyantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ aggo seṭṭhoti sabbapāṭhī nāmena ānando nāma thero. ^b^dhammārakkho tavā^eb^ti tava tuyhaṃ dhammassa piṭakattayadhammabhaṇḍassa ārakkho rakkhako pālako, dhammabhaṇḍāgārikoti attho.

[03] 543^b^.^eb^ ^b^ete^eb^ ^a^M1.0324^ea^ sabbe atikkammāb^ti ^b^bhagavā^eb^ bhagyavā sammāsambuddho ete sāriputtādayo mahānubhāvepi there atikkamma vajjetvā mamaṃyeva ^b^pamesi^eb^ pamāṇaṃ akāsi, manasi akāsīti attho. ^b^vinicchayaṃ me pādāsī^eb^ti vinayaññūhi paṇḍitehi desitaṃ pakāsitaṃ vinaye vinicchayaṃ dosavicāraṇaṃ me mayhaṃ bhagavā ^b^pādāsi^eb^ pakārena adāsi, mayhameva bhāraṃ akāsīti sambandho.

[03] 544^b^.^eb^ ^b^yo koci vinaye pañha^eb^nti yo koci bhikkhu buddhasāvako vinayanissitaṃ pañhaṃ maṃ pucchati, ^b^tattha^eb^ tasmiṃ pucchitapañhe ^b^me^eb^ mayhaṃ ^b^cintanā^eb^ vimati kaṅkhā natthi. ^b^tañhevatthaṃ^eb^ taṃ eva pucchitaṃ atthaṃ ahaṃ kathemīti sambandho.

[03] 545^b^.^eb^ ^b^yāvatā buddhakhettamhī^eb^ti yāvatā yattake ṭhāne buddhassa āṇākhette taṃ mahāmuniṃ ^a^V1.0297^ea^ sammāsambuddhaṃ ṭhapetvā ^b^vinaye^eb^ vinayapiṭake vinayavinicchayakaraṇe vā ^b^mādiso^eb^ mayā sadiso natthi, ahameva aggo, ^b^bhiyyo^eb^ mamādhiko kuto bhavissatīti sambandho.

[03] 546^b^.^eb^ ^b^bhikkhusaṅghe nisīditvā^eb^ bhikkhusaṅghamajjhe nisinno gotamo bhagavā ^b^evaṃ gajjati^eb^ sīhanādaṃ karoti. kathaṃ? ^b^vinaye^eb^ ubhatovibhaṅge, ^b^khandhakesu^eb^ mahāvaggacūḷavaggesu, ca-saddena parivāre, ^b^upālissa^eb^ upālinā ^b^samo^eb^ sadiso natthīti evaṃ gajjati.

[03] 547^b^.^eb^ ^b^yāvatā^eb^ti yattakaṃ ^b^buddhabhaṇitaṃ^eb^ buddhena desitaṃ ^b^navaṅgaṃ^eb^ suttageyyādisatthusāsanaṃ satthunā pakāsitaṃ sabbaṃ ^b^vinayogadhaṃ^eb^ taṃ vinaye antopaviṭṭhaṃ vinayamūlakaṃ iccevaṃ ^b^passino^eb^ passantassa.

[03] 548^b^.^eb^ ^b^mama kammaṃ saritvānā^eb^ti gotamo ^b^sakyapuṅgavo^eb^ sakyavaṃsappadhāno, ^b^mama kammaṃ^eb^ mayhaṃ pubbapatthanākammaṃ atītaṃsañāṇena ^b^saritvāna^eb^ paccakkhato ñatvā bhikkhusaṅghamajjhe ^a^P0.0288^ea^ gato ``etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vinayadharānaṃ yadidaṃ upālī''ti (a0 ni0 1.219, 228) maṃ etadagge ṭhāne ṭhapesīti sambandho.

[03] 549^b^.^eb^ ^b^satasahassupādāyā^eb^ti satasahassakappe ādiṃ katvā yaṃ imaṃ ṭhānaṃ ^b^apatthayiṃ^eb^ patthesiṃ, so ^b^me^eb^ attho mayā ^b^anuppatto^eb^ adhigato paṭiladdho vinaye ^b^pāramiṃ gato^eb^ koṭiṃ pattoti attho.

[03] 550^b^.^eb^ ^b^sakyānaṃ^eb^ ^a^M1.0325^ea^ sakyavaṃsarājūnaṃ ^b^nandijanano^eb^ somanassakārako ahaṃ ^b^pure^eb^ pubbe kappako ^b^āsiṃ^eb^ ahosiṃ, ^b^taṃ jātiṃ^eb^ taṃ kulaṃ taṃ yoniṃ ^b^vijahitvā^eb^ visesena jahitvā chaḍḍetvā ^b^mahesino^eb^ sammāsambuddhassa ^b^putto jāto^eb^ sakyaputtoti saṅkhyaṃ gato sāsanadhāraṇatoti attho.

[03] 551^b^.^eb^ tato paraṃ attano dāsakule nibbattanāpadānaṃ dassento ^b^ito dutiyake kappe^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^ito^eb^ bhaddakappato heṭṭhā dutiye kappe nāmena añjaso nāma khattiyo eko rājā ^b^anantatejo^eb^ saṅkhyātikkantatejo ^b^amitayaso^eb^ pamāṇātikkantaparivāro ^b^mahaddhano^eb^ anekakoṭisatasahassadhanavā ^b^bhūmipālo^eb^ pathavīpālako rakkhako ahosīti sambandho.

[03] 552^b^.^eb^ ^b^tassa rañño^eb^ti tassa tādisassa rājino putto ahaṃ candano nāma ^b^khattiyo^eb^ khattiyakumāro ahosinti sambandho. so ahaṃ jātimadena ca yasamadena ca bhogamadena ca ^b^upatthaddho^eb^ thambhito unnatoti attho.

[03] 553^b^.^eb^ ^b^nāgasatasahassānī^eb^ti ^a^V1.0298^ea^ satasahassahatthino ^b^mātaṅgā^eb^ mātaṅgakule jātā ^b^tidhā pabhinnā^eb^ akkhikaṇṇakosasaṅkhātehi tīhi ṭhānehi pabhinnā madagaḷitā ^b^sabbālaṅkārabhūsitā^eb^ sabbehi hatthālaṅkārehi alaṅkatā ^b^sadā^eb^ sabbakālaṃ maṃ parivārentīti sambandho.

[03] 554^b^.^eb^ ^b^sabalehi paretoha^eb^nti tadā tasmiṃ kāle ahaṃ sabalehi attano senābalehi ^b^pareto^eb^ parivārito uyyānaṃ ^b^gantukāmako^eb^ icchanto sirikaṃ nāma ^b^nāgaṃ^eb^ hatthiṃ ^b^āruyha^eb^ abhiruhitvā nagarato nikkhaminti sambandho.

[03] 555^b^.^eb^ ^b^caraṇena ca sampanno^eb^ti sīlasaṃvarādipannarasacaraṇadhammena samannāgato ^b^guttadvāro pihitacakkhādichadvāro susaṃvuto^eb^ suṭṭhu rakkhitakāyacitto devalo nāma^b^ sambuddho^eb^ paccekasambuddho, ^b^mama^eb^ mayhaṃ ^b^purato^eb^ sammukhe ^b^āgacchi^eb^ pāpuṇīti attho.

[03] 556^b^.^eb^ ^b^pesetvā^eb^ ^a^M1.0326^ea^ ^b^sirikaṃ nāga^eb^nti taṃ āgataṃ paccekabuddhaṃ disvā ahaṃ sirikaṃ nāma nāgaṃ abhimukhaṃ pesetvā buddhaṃ ^b^āsādayiṃ^eb^ ghaṭṭesiṃ padussesinti attho. ^b^tato sañjātakopo so^eb^ti tato tasmā mayā atīva pīḷetvā pesitattā so hatthināgo mayi sañjātakopo ^a^P0.0289^ea^ ^b^padaṃ^eb^ attano pādaṃ ^b^nuddharate^eb^ na uddharati, niccalova hotīti attho.

[03] 557^b^.^eb^ ^b^nāgaṃ duṭṭhamanaṃ disvā^eb^ti duṭṭhamanaṃ kuddhacittaṃ nādaṃ disvā ahaṃ ^b^buddhe^eb^ paccekabuddhe ^b^kopaṃ akāsiṃ^eb^ dosaṃ uppādesinti attho. ^b^vihesayitvā sambuddha^eb^nti devalaṃ paccekasambuddhaṃ vihesayitvā viheṭhetvā ahaṃ uyyānaṃ agamāsinti sambandho.

[03] 558^b^.^eb^ ^b^sātaṃ tattha na vindāmī^eb^ti tasmiṃ āsādane sātaṃ na vindāmi. āsādananimittaṃ madhuraṃ sukhaṃ na labhāmīti attho. ^b^siro pajjalito yathā^eb^ti siro mama sīsaṃ pajjalito yathā pajjalamānaṃ viya hotīti attho. ^b^pariḷāhena ḍayhāmī^eb^ti paccekabuddhe kopassa katattā pacchānutāpapariḷāhena ḍayhāmi uṇhacitto homīti attho.

[03] 559^b^.^eb^ ^b^sasāgarantā^eb^ti teneva pāpakammabalena sasāgarantā sāgarapariyosānā sakalamahāpathavī ^b^me^eb^ mayhaṃ ^b^ādittā viya^eb^ jalitā viya hoti khāyatīti attho. ^b^pitu santikupāgammā^eb^ti evaṃ bhaye uppanne ahaṃ attano pitu rañño santikaṃ ^b^upāgamma^eb^ upagantvā idaṃ vacanaṃ ^b^abraviṃ^eb^ kathesinti attho.

[03] 560^b^.^eb^ ^b^āsīvisaṃva^eb^ ^a^V1.0299^ea^ ^b^kupita^eb^nti āsīvisaṃ sabbaṃ kupitaṃ kuddhaṃ iva jalamānaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ iva ^b^mattaṃ^eb^ tidhā pabhinnaṃ ^b^dantiṃ^eb^ dantavantaṃ ^b^kuñjaraṃ^eb^ uttamaṃ hatthiṃ iva ca āgataṃ yaṃ paccekabuddhaṃ ^b^sayambhuṃ^eb^ sayameva buddhabhūtaṃ ahaṃ ^b^āsādayiṃ^eb^ ghaṭṭesinti sambandho.

[03] 561^b^.^eb^ ^b^āsādito mayā buddho^eb^ti so paccekabuddho mayā āsādito ghaṭṭito ^b^ghoro^eb^ aññehi ghaṭṭetuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā ghoro, ^b^uggatapo^eb^ pākaṭatapo ^b^jino^eb^ pañca māre jitavā evaṃguṇasampanno ^a^M1.0327^ea^ paccekabuddho mayā ghaṭṭitoti attho. ^b^purā sabbe vinassāmā^eb^ti tasmiṃ paccekabuddhe katānādarena sabbe mayaṃ vinassāma vividhenākārena nassāma, bhasmā viya bhavāmāti attho. ^b^khamāpessāma taṃ muni^eb^nti taṃ paccekabuddhaṃ muniṃ yāva na vinassāma, tāva khamāpessāmāti sambandho.

[03] 562^b^.^eb^ ^b^no ce taṃ nijjhāpessāmā^eb^ti ^b^attadantaṃ^eb^ damitacittaṃ ^b^samāhitaṃ^eb^ ekaggacittaṃ taṃ paccekabuddhaṃ no ce nijjhāpessāma khamāpessāma. ^b^orena sattadivasā^eb^ sattadivasato orabhāge sattadivase anatikkamitvā sampuṇṇaṃ raṭṭhaṃ me sabbaṃ ^b^vidhamissati^eb^ vinassissati.

[03] 563^b^.^eb^ ^b^sumekhalo kosiyo cā^eb^ti ete sumekhalādayo cattāro rājāno isayo ^b^āsādayitvā^eb^ ghaṭṭetvā anādaraṃ katvā ^b^saraṭṭhakā^eb^ saha raṭṭhajanapadavāsīhi duggatā vināsaṃ gatāti attho.

[03] 564^b^.^eb^ ^b^yadā^eb^ ^a^P0.0290^ea^ ^b^kuppanti isayo^eb^ti yadā yasmiṃ kāle ^b^saññatā^eb^ kāyasaññamādīhi saññatā santā ^b^brahmacārino^eb^ uttamacārino seṭṭhacārino isayo ^b^kuppanti^eb^ domanassā bhavanti, tadā sasāgaraṃ sapabbataṃ sadevakaṃ lokaṃ vināsentīti sambandho.

[03] 565^b^.^eb^ ^b^tiyojanasahassamhī^eb^ti tesaṃ isīnaṃ ānubhāvaṃ ñatvā te khamāpetuṃ ^b^accayaṃ^eb^ aparādhaṃ ^b^desanatthāya^eb^ pakāsanatthāya tiyojanasahassappamāṇe padese purise sannipātayinti sambandho. ^b^sayambhuṃ upasaṅkami^eb^nti sayambhuṃ paccekabuddhaṃ upasaṅkamiṃ samīpaṃ agamāsinti attho.

[03] 566^b^.^eb^ ^b^allavatthā^eb^ti mayā saddhiṃ rāsibhūtā sabbe janā allavatthā udakena tintavatthauttarāsaṅgā ^b^allasirā^eb^ tintakesā ^b^pañjalīkatā^eb^ muddhani katāñjalipuṭā ^b^buddhassa^eb^ paccekamunino ^a^V1.0300^ea^ ^b^pāde^eb^ pādasamīpe ^b^nipatitvā^eb^ nipajjitvā ^b^idaṃ vacanamabravu^eb^nti ``khamassu tvaṃ, mahāvīrā''tiādikaṃ vacanaṃ abravuṃ kathesunti attho.

[03] 567^b^.^eb^ ^b^mahāvīra^eb^ vīruttama bhante paccekabuddha, mayā tumhesu aññāṇena kataṃ aparādhaṃ khamassu tvaṃ vinodehi, mā manasi karohīti attho ^a^M1.0328^ea^. ^b^jano^eb^ janasamūho ^b^taṃ^eb^ bhagavantaṃ ^b^abhi^eb^ visesena yācati. ^b^pariḷāhaṃ^eb^ dosamohehi katacittadukkhapariḷāhaṃ amhākaṃ ^b^vinodehi^eb^ tanuṃ karohi, ^b^no^eb^ amhākaṃ ^b^raṭṭhaṃ^eb^ sakalaraṭṭhajanapadavāsino ^b^mā vināsaya^eb^ mā vināsehīti attho.

[03] 568^b^.^eb^ ^b^sadevamānusā sabbe^eb^ti sabbe mānusā sadevā ^b^sadānavā^eb^ pahārādādīhi asurehi saha ^b^sarakkhasā ayomayena kūṭena^eb^ mahāmuggarena ^b^sadā^eb^ sabbakālaṃ ^b^me siraṃ^eb^ mayhaṃ matthakaṃ ^b^bhindeyyuṃ^eb^ padāleyyuṃ.

[03] 569^b^.^eb^ tato paraṃ buddhānaṃ khamitabhāvañca kopābhāvañca pakāsento ^b^dake aggi na saṇṭhātī^eb^tiādimāha. tattha yathā udake aggi ^b^na saṇṭhāti^eb^ na patiṭṭhāti, yathā bījaṃ ^b^sele^eb^ silāmaye pabbate na viruhati, yathā ^b^agade^eb^ osadhe ^b^kimi^eb^ pāṇako na saṇṭhāti. tathā ^b^kopo^eb^ cittappakopo dummanatā ^b^buddhe^eb^ paṭividdhasacce paccekabuddhe ^b^na jāyati^eb^ na uppajjatīti attho.

[03] 570^b^.^eb^ punapi buddhānaṃ ānubhāvaṃ pakāsento ^b^yathā ca bhūmī^eb^tiādimāha. tattha yathā ca ^b^bhūmi^eb^ pathavī ^b^acalā^eb^ niccalā, tathā buddho acaloti attho. yathā ^b^sāgaro^eb^ mahāsamuddo ^b^appameyyo^eb^ pametuṃ pamāṇaṃ gahetuṃ asakkuṇeyyo, tathā buddho appameyyoti attho. yathā ^b^ākāso^eb^ aphuṭṭhākāso ^b^anantako^eb^ pariyosānarahito, ^b^evaṃ^eb^ tathā buddho ^b^akkhobhiyo^eb^ khobhetuṃ āloḷetuṃ asakkuṇeyyoti attho.

[03] 571^b^.^eb^ tato paraṃ paccekabuddhassa khamanavacanaṃ dassento ^b^sadā^eb^ ^a^P0.0291^ea^ ^b^khantā mahāvīrā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^mahāvīrā^eb^ uttamavīriyavantā buddhā ^b^tapassino^eb^ pāpānaṃ tapanato ``tapo''ti laddhanāmena vīriyena samannāgatā ^b^khantā^eb^ ca khantiyā ca sampannā ^b^khamitā^eb^ ca paresaṃ aparādhaṃ khamitā sahitā ^b^sadā^eb^ sabbakālaṃ bhavantīti sambandho. ^b^khantānaṃ khamitānañcā^eb^ti tesaṃ buddhānaṃ khantānaṃ khantiyā yuttānaṃ khamitānaṃ parāparādhakhamitānaṃ sahitānañca ^b^gamanaṃ^eb^ chandādīhi agatigamanaṃ na vijjatīti attho.

[03] 572^b^.^eb^ iti ^a^M1.0329^ea^ ^a^V1.0301^ea^ idaṃ vacanaṃ vatvā ^b^sambuddho^eb^ paccekasambuddho ^b^pariḷāhaṃ^eb^ sattānaṃ uppannadāhaṃ ^b^vinodayaṃ^eb^ vinodayanto ^b^mahājanassa purato^eb^ sannipatitassa sarājakassa mahato janakāyassa sammukhato ^b^tadā^eb^ tasmiṃ kāle ^b^nabhaṃ^eb^ ākāsaṃ ^b^abbhuggami^eb^ uggañchīti attho.

[03] 573^b^.^eb^ ^b^tena kammenahaṃ dhīrā^eb^ti dhīra dhitisampanna ahaṃ ^b^tena kammena^eb^ paccekabuddhe katena anādarakammena imasmiṃ pacchimattabhave ^b^hīnattaṃ^eb^ lāmakabhāvaṃ rājūnaṃ kappakakammakaraṇajātiṃ ^b^ajjhupāgato^eb^ sampattoti attho. ^b^samatikkamma taṃ jāti^eb^nti taṃ parāyattajātiṃ ^b^saṃ^eb^ suṭṭhu atikkamma atikkamitvā. ^b^pāvisiṃ abhayaṃ pura^eb^nti bhayarahitaṃ nibbānapuraṃ nibbānamahānagaraṃ pāvisiṃ paviṭṭho āsinti attho.

[03] 574^b^.^eb^ ^b^tadāpi maṃ mahāvīrā^eb^ti vīruttama ^b^tadāpi^eb^ tasmiṃ paccekabuddhassa āsādanasamaye api sayambhū paccekabuddho ^b^pariḷāhaṃ^eb^ āsādanahetu uppannaṃ kāyacittadarathaṃ vinodesi dūrīakāsi. ^b^ḍayhamānaṃ^eb^ tato eva pacchānutāpena kukkuccena ḍayhamānaṃ santapantaṃ maṃ ^b^susaṇṭhitaṃ^eb^ dosaṃ dosato dassane suṭṭhu saṇṭhitaṃ disvā khamāpayi taṃ aparādhaṃ adhivāsesīti sambandho.

[03] 575^b^.^eb^ ^b^ajjāpi maṃ mahāvīrā^eb^ti vīruttama, ajjāpi tuyhaṃ samāgamakāle api, ^b^tihaggībhi^eb^ rāgaggidosaggimohaggisaṅkhātehi vā nirayaggipetaggisaṃsāraggisaṅkhātehi vā tīhi aggīhi ^b^ḍayhamānaṃ^eb^ dukkhamanubhavantaṃ maṃ bhagavā ^b^sītibhāvaṃ^eb^ domanassavināsena santakāyacittasaṅkhātaṃ sītibhāvaṃ nibbānameva vā ^b^apāpayi^eb^ sampāpesi. ^b^tayo aggī^eb^ vuttappakāre te tayo aggī ^b^nibbāpesi^eb^ vūpasamesīti sambandho.

[03] 576^b^.^eb^ evaṃ attano hīnāpadānaṃ bhagavato dassetvā idāni aññepi tassa savane niyojetvā ovadanto ``yesaṃ sotāvadhānatthī''tiādimāha. tattha ^b^yesaṃ^eb^ tumhākaṃ ^b^sotāvadhānaṃ^eb^ sotassa avadhānaṃ ṭhapanaṃ ^b^atthi^eb^ vijjati, te tumhe ^b^bhāsato^eb^ sāsantassa mama vacanaṃ ^a^P0.0292^ea^ ^b^suṇātha^eb^ manasi karotha. ^b^atthaṃ tumhaṃ pavakkhāmī^eb^ti ^b^yathā^eb^ yena pakārena ^b^mama^eb^ mayā diṭṭhaṃ ^b^padaṃ^eb^ nibbānaṃ, tathā tena pakārena nibbānasaṅkhātaṃ paramatthaṃ tumhākaṃ pavakkhāmīti sambandho.

[03] 577^b^.^eb^ taṃ ^a^M1.0330^ea^ dassento ^b^sayambhuṃ taṃ vimānetvā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^sayambhuṃ^eb^ sayameva bhūtaṃ ariyāya jātiyā jātaṃ santacittaṃ samāhitaṃ paccekabuddhaṃ vimānetvā anādaraṃ katvā ^b^tena kammena^eb^ ^a^V1.0302^ea^ katenākusalena ^b^ajja^eb^ imasmiṃ vattamānakāle ahaṃ ^b^nīcayoniyaṃ^eb^ parāyattajātiyaṃ kappakajātiyaṃ ^b^jāto^eb^ nibbatto ^b^amhi^eb^ bhavāmi.

[03] 578^b^.^eb^ ^b^mā vo khaṇaṃ virādhethā^eb^ti buddhuppādakkhaṇaṃ vo tumhe mā virādhetha gaḷitaṃ mā karotha, ^b^hi^eb^ saccaṃ ^b^khaṇātītā^eb^ buddhuppādakkhaṇaṃ atītā atikkantā sattā ^b^socare^eb^ socanti, ``mayaṃ alakkhikā dummedhā bhavāmā''ti evaṃ socantīti attho. ^b^sadatthe^eb^ attano atthe vuḍḍhiyaṃ ^b^vāyameyyātha^eb^ vīriyaṃ karotha. ^b^vo^eb^ tumhehi ^b^khaṇo^eb^ buddhuppādakkhaṇo samayo ^b^paṭipādito^eb^ nipphādito pattoti attho.

[03] 579^b^.^eb^ tato paraṃ saṃsāragatānaṃ ādīnavaṃ upamāupameyyavasena dassento ^b^ekaccānañca vamana^eb^ntiādimāha. ^b^ekaccānaṃ^eb^ kesañci puggalānaṃ ^b^vamanaṃ^eb^ uddhaṃ uggiraṇaṃ ekaccānaṃ ^b^virecanaṃ^eb^ adhopaggharaṇaṃ ^b^eke^eb^ ekaccānaṃ halāhalaṃ ^b^visaṃ^eb^ mucchākaraṇavisaṃ, ekaccānaṃ puggalānaṃ ^b^osadhaṃ^eb^ rakkhanupāyaṃ bhagavā evaṃ paṭipāṭiyā akkhāsīti sambandho.

[03] 580^b^.^eb^ ^b^vamanaṃ paṭipannāna^eb^nti paṭipannānaṃ maggasamaṅgīnaṃ vamanaṃ saṃsārachaḍḍanaṃ saṃsāramocanaṃ bhagavā akkhāsīti sambandho. ^b^phalaṭṭhānaṃ^eb^ phale ṭhitānaṃ virecanaṃ saṃsārapaggharaṇaṃ akkhāsi. ^b^phalalābhīnaṃ^eb^ phalaṃ labhitvā ṭhitānaṃ nibbānaosadhaṃ akkhāsi. ^b^gavesīnaṃ^eb^ manussadevanibbānasampattiṃ gavesīnaṃ pariyesantānaṃ puññakhettabhūtaṃ saṅghaṃ akkhāsīti sambandho.

[03] 581^b^.^eb^ ^b^sāsanena viruddhāna^eb^nti sāsanassa paṭipakkhānaṃ halāhalaṃ kutūhalaṃ pāpaṃ akusalaṃ akkhāsīti sambandho. ^b^yathā āsīviso^eb^ti assaddhānaṃ katapāpānaṃ puggalānaṃ saṃsāre dukkhāvahanato āsīvisasadisaṃ yathā āsīviso diṭṭhamattena bhasmakaraṇato ^b^diṭṭhaviso^eb^ sappo attanā daṭṭhaṃ naraṃ ^b^jhāpeti^eb^ ḍayhati dukkhāpeti. ^b^taṃ naraṃ^eb^ taṃ assaddhaṃ katapāpaṃ naraṃ halāhalavisaṃ evaṃ jhāpeti catūsu apāyesu ḍayhati sosesīti sambandho.

[03] 582^b^.^eb^ ^b^sakiṃ^eb^ ^a^M1.0331^ea^ ^b^pītaṃ halāhala^eb^nti visaṃ halāhalaṃ pītaṃ sakiṃ ekavāraṃ ^a^P0.0293^ea^ jīvitaṃ ^b^uparundhati^eb^ nāseti. ^b^sāsanena^eb^ sāsanamhi ^b^virajjhitvā^eb^ aparādhaṃ katvā puggalo ^b^kappakoṭimhi^eb^ koṭisaṅkhye kappepi ^b^ḍayhati^eb^ nijjhāyatīti attho.

[03] 583^b^.^eb^ evaṃ assaddhānaṃ puggalānaṃ phalavipākaṃ dassetvā idāni buddhānaṃ ānubhāvaṃ dassento ^a^V1.0303^ea^ ^b^khantiyā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha yo buddho vamanādīni akkhāsi, ^b^so^eb^ buddho ^b^khantiyā^eb^ khamanena ca ^b^avihiṃsāya^eb^ sattānaṃ avihiṃsanena ca ^b^mettacittavatāya^eb^ ca mettacittavantabhāvena ca ^b^sadevakaṃ^eb^ saha devehi vattamānaṃ lokaṃ ^b^tāreti^eb^ atikkamāpeti nibbāpeti, ^b^tasmā^eb^ kāraṇā buddhā vo tumhehi ^b^avirādhiyā^eb^ virujjhituṃ na sakkuṇeyyā, buddhasāsane paṭipajjeyyāthāti attho.

[03] 584^b^.^eb^ lābhe ca alābhe ca ^b^na sajjanti^eb^ na bhajanti na lagganti. ^b^sammānane^eb^ ādarakaraṇe ca ^b^vimānane^eb^ anādarakaraṇe ca acalā pathavīsadisā buddhā bhavanti, ^b^tasmā^eb^ kāraṇā ^b^te^eb^ buddhā tumhehi ^b^na virodhiyā^eb^ na virodhetabbā virujjhituṃ asakkuṇeyyāti attho.
[03] 585^b^.^eb^ buddhānaṃ majjhattataṃ dassento ^b^devadatte^eb^tiādimāha. tattha vadhakāvadhakesu sabbesu sattesu ^b^samako^eb^ samamānaso ^b^muni^eb^ buddhamunīti attho.

[03] 586^b^.^eb^ ^b^etesaṃ paṭigho natthī^eb^ti etesaṃ buddhānaṃ paṭigho caṇḍikkaṃ dosacittataṃ natthi na saṃvijjati. ^b^rāgomesaṃ na vijjatī^eb^ti imesaṃ buddhānaṃ rāgopi rajjanaṃ allīyanaṃ na vijjati, na upalabbhati, tasmā kāraṇā, vadhakassa ca orasassa cāti sabbesaṃ ^b^samako^eb^ samacitto buddho hotīti sambandho.

[03] 587^b^.^eb^ punapi buddhānaṃyeva ānubhāvaṃ dassento ^b^panthe disvāna kāsāva^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha ^b^mīḷhamakkhitaṃ^eb^ gūthasammissaṃ ^b^kāsāvaṃ^eb^ kasāvena rajitaṃ cīvaraṃ ^b^isiddhajaṃ^eb^ ariyānaṃ dhajaṃ parikkhāraṃ, ^b^panthe^eb^ magge chaḍḍitaṃ ^b^disvāna^eb^ passitvā ^b^añjaliṃ katvā^eb^ dasaṅgulisamodhānaṃ añjalipuṭaṃ sirasi katvā ^a^M1.0332^ea^ ^b^sirasā^eb^ sirena ^b^vanditabbaṃ isiddhajaṃ^eb^ arahattaddhajaṃ buddhapaccekabuddhasāvakadīpakaṃ cīvaraṃ namassitabbaṃ mānetabbaṃ pūjetabbanti attho.

[03] 588^b^.^eb^ ^b^abbhatītā^eb^ti abhi atthaṅgatā nibbutā. ^b^ye ca buddhā vattamānā^eb^ idāni jātā ca ye buddhā ^b^anāgatā^eb^ ajātā abhūtā anibbattā apātubhūtā ca ye buddhā. ^b^dhajenānena sujjhantī^eb^ti anena isiddhajena cīvarena ete buddhā sujjhanti visuddhā bhavanti sobhanti. ^b^tasmā^eb^ tena kāraṇena ^b^ete^eb^ buddhā ^b^namassiyā namassitabbā^eb^ vanditabbāti attho. ``etaṃ namassiya''ntipi pāṭho, tassa etaṃ isiddhajaṃ namassitabbanti attho.

[03] 589^b^.^eb^ tato ^a^P0.0294^ea^ paraṃ attano guṇaṃ dassento ^b^satthukappa^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha ^b^satthukappaṃ^eb^ buddhasadisaṃ ^a^V1.0304^ea^ ^b^suvinayaṃ^eb^ sundaravinayaṃ sundarākārena dvārattayadamanaṃ ^b^hadayena^eb^ cittena ahaṃ ^b^dhāremi^eb^ savanadhāraṇādinā paccavekkhāmīti attho. ^b^vinayaṃ^eb^ vinayapiṭakaṃ ^b^namassamāno^eb^ vandamāno vinaye ādaraṃ kurumāno ^b^viharissāmi sabbadā^eb^ sabbasmiṃ kāle vāsaṃ kappemīti attho.

[03] 590^b^.^eb^ ^b^vinayo āsayo mayha^eb^nti vinayapiṭakaṃ mayhaṃ okāsabhūtaṃ savanadhāraṇamanasikaraṇauggahaparipucchāpavattanavasena okāsabhūtaṃ gehabhūtanti attho. ^b^vinayo ṭhānacaṅkama^eb^nti vinayo mayhaṃ savanādikiccakaraṇena ṭhitaṭṭhānañca caṅkamanaṭṭhānañca. ^b^kappemi vinaye vāsa^eb^nti vinayapiṭake vinayatantiyā savanadhāraṇapavattanavasena vāsaṃ sayanaṃ kappemi karomi. ^b^vinayo mama gocaro^eb^ti vinayapiṭakaṃ mayhaṃ gocaro āhāro bhojanaṃ niccaṃ dhāraṇamanasikaraṇavasenāti attho.

[03] 591^b^.^eb^ ^b^vinaye pāramippatto^eb^ti sakale vinayapiṭake pāramiṃ pariyosānaṃ patto. ^b^samathe cāpi kovido^eb^ti pārājikādisattāpattikkhandhānaṃ samathe vūpasame ca vuṭṭhāne ca kovido cheko, adhikaraṇasamathe vā --
[21] ``vivādaṃ anuvādañca, āpattādhikaraṇaṃ tathā.
[22] kiccādhikaraṇañceva, caturādhikaraṇā matā''ti.. --
[25] vuttādhikaraṇesu ca --
[21] ``sammukhā ^a^M1.0333^ea^ sativinayo, amūḷhapaṭiññākaraṇaṃ.
[22] yebhuyya tassapāpiyya, tiṇavatthārako tathā''ti.. --

[25] evaṃ vuttesu ca sattasu adhikaraṇasamathesu atikovido chekoti attho. ^b^upāli taṃ mahāvīrā^eb^ti bhante mahāvīra, catūsu asaṅkhyeyyesu kappasatasahassesu sabbaññutaññāṇādhigamāya vīriyavanta ^b^satthuno^eb^ devamanussānaṃ anusāsakassa ^b^taṃ^eb^ tava ^b^pāde^eb^ pādayuge upāli bhikkhu ^b^vandati^eb^ paṇāmaṃ karotīti attho.

[03] 592^b^.^eb^ so ahaṃ pabbajitvā sambuddhaṃ ^b^namassamāno^eb^ paṇāmaṃ kurumāno ^b^dhammassa ca^eb^ tena bhagavatā desitassa navalokuttaradhammassa ^b^sudhammataṃ^eb^ sundaradhammabhāvaṃ jānitvā dhammañca namassamāno gāmato gāmaṃ ^b^purato punaṃ^eb^ nagarato nagaraṃ vicarissāmīti sambandho.

[03] 593^b^.^eb^ ^b^kilesā^eb^ ^a^V1.0305^ea^ ^b^jhāpitā mayha^eb^nti mayā paṭividdhārahattamaggañāṇena mayhaṃ cittasantānagatā sabbe diyaḍḍhasahassasaṅkhā kilesā ^a^P0.0295^ea^ jhāpitā sositā visositā viddhaṃsitā. ^b^bhavā sabbe samūhatā^eb^ti kāmabhavādayo sabbe nava bhavā mayā samūhatā ^b^saṃ^eb^ suṭṭhu ūhatā khepitā viddhaṃsitā. ^b^sabbāsavā parikkhīṇā^eb^ti kāmāsavo, bhavāsavo, diṭṭhāsavo, avijjāsavoti sabbe cattāro āsavā parikkhīṇā parisamantato khayaṃ pāpitā. ^b^idāni^eb^ imasmiṃ arahattappattakāle ^b^punabbhavo^eb^ punuppattisaṅkhāto bhavo bhavanaṃ jāti natthīti attho.

[03] 594^b^.^eb^ uttari somanassavasena udānaṃ udānento ^b^svāgata^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha ^b^buddhaseṭṭhassa^eb^ uttamabuddhassa ^b^santike^eb^ samīpe ekanagare vā mama āgamanaṃ ^b^svāgataṃ^eb^ suṭṭhu āgamanaṃ sundarāgamanaṃ ^b^vata^eb^ ekantena ^b^āsi^eb^ ahosīti sambandho. ^b^tisso vijjā^eb^ti pubbenivāsadibbacakkhuāsavakkhayavijjā ^b^anuppattā^eb^ sampattā, paccakkhaṃ katāti attho. ^b^kataṃ buddhassa sāsana^eb^nti buddhena bhagavatā desitaṃ anusiṭṭhi sāsanaṃ kataṃ nipphāditaṃ vattapaṭipattiṃ pūretvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karitvā arahattamaggañāṇādhigamena sampāditanti attho.

[03] 595^b^.^eb^ ^b^paṭisambhidā catasso^eb^ti atthapaṭisambhidādayo catasso paññāyo sacchikatā paccakkhaṃ katā. ^b^vimokkhāpi ca aṭṭhime^eb^ti cattāri ^a^M1.0334^ea^ maggañāṇāni cattāri phalañāṇānīti ime aṭṭha vimokkhā saṃsārato muccanūpāyā sacchikatāti sambandho. ^b^chaḷabhiññā sacchikatā^eb^ti --
[21] ``iddhividhaṃ dibbasotaṃ, cetopariyañāṇakaṃ.
[22] pubbenivāsañāṇañca, dibbacakkhāsavakkhaya''nti.. --
[25] imā cha abhiññā sacchikatā paccakkhaṃ katā. imesaṃ ñāṇānaṃ sacchikaraṇena buddhassa sāsanaṃ katanti attho.

[03] ^b^ittha^eb^nti iminā heṭṭhā vuttappakārena. ^b^suda^eb^nti padapūraṇamatte nipāto. āyasmā upāli ^b^thero^eb^ti thirasīlādiguṇayutto sāvako imā pubbacaritāpadānadīpikā gāthāyo ^b^abhāsittha^eb^ kathayitthāti attho.
[06] upālittherāpadānavaṇṇanā samattā.

[03] ^b^padumuttarasambuddha^eb^ntiādikaṃ ^a^V1.0306^ea^ āyasmato aññāsikoṇḍaññattherassa apadānaṃ. ayaṃ kira purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare gahapatimahāsālakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patvā ekadivasaṃ satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ attano sāsane paṭhamaṃ ^a^P0.0296^ea^ paṭividdhadhammarattaññūnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā sayampi taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthento satasahassabhikkhuparivārassa bhagavato sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ pavattetvā paṇidhānaṃ akāsi. satthāpissa anantarāyataṃ disvā bhāviniṃ sampattiṃ byākāsi. so yāvajīvaṃ puññāni karonto satthari parinibbute cetiye patiṭṭhāpiyamāne antocetiye ratanagharaṃ kārāpesi, cetiyaṃ parivāretvā sahassaratanagghikāni ca kāresi.

[03] so evaṃ puññāni katvā tato cavitvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto vipassissa bhagavato kāle mahākālo nāma kuṭumbiko hutvā aṭṭhakarīsamatte khette sāligabbhaṃ phāletvā gahitasālitaṇḍulehi asambhinnakhīrapāyāsaṃ sampādetvā tattha madhusappisakkarādayo pakkhipitvā buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa adāsi. sāligabbhaṃ phāletvā gahitagahitaṭṭhānaṃ ^a^M1.0335^ea^ puna pūrati. puthukakāle puthukaggaṃ nāma adāsi. lāyane lāyanaggaṃ, veṇikaraṇe veṇaggaṃ, kalāpādikaraṇe kalāpaggaṃ, khalaggaṃ, bhaṇḍaggaṃ, minaggaṃ koṭṭhagganti evaṃ ekasasse nava vāre aggadānaṃ adāsi, tampi sassaṃ atirekataraṃ sampannaṃ ahosi.

[03] evaṃ yāvajīvaṃ puññāni katvā tato cuto devaloke nibbattitvā devesu ca manussesu ca saṃsaranto amhākaṃ bhagavato uppattito puretarameva kapilavatthunagarassa avidūre doṇavatthunāmake brāhmaṇagāme brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbatti. tassa ^b^koṇḍañño^eb^ti gottato āgataṃ nāmaṃ ahosi. so vayappatto tayo vede uggahetvā lakkhaṇamantesu ca pāraṃ agamāsi. tena samayena amhākaṃ bodhisatto tusitapurato cavitvā kapilavatthupure suddhodanamahārājassa gehe nibbatti. tassa nāmaggahaṇadivase aṭṭhuttarasatesu brāhmaṇesu upanītesu ye aṭṭha brāhmaṇā lakkhaṇapariggahaṇatthaṃ mahātalaṃ upanītā. so tesu sabbanavako hutvā mahāpurisassa lakkhaṇanipphattiṃ disvā ``ekaṃsena ayaṃ buddho bhavissatī''ti niṭṭhaṃ gantvā mahāsattassa abhinikkhamanaṃ udikkhanto vicarati.

[03] bodhisattopi ^a^V1.0307^ea^ kho mahatā parivārena vaḍḍhamāno anukkamena vuddhippatto ñāṇaparipākaṃ gantvā ekūnatiṃsatime vasse mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamanto anomānadītīre pabbajitvā anukkamena uruvelaṃ gantvā padhānaṃ padahi. tadā koṇḍañño māṇavo mahāsattassa pabbajitabhāvaṃ sutvā lakkhaṇapariggāhakabrāhmaṇānaṃ puttehi vappamāṇavādīhi saddhiṃ attapañcamo ^a^P0.0297^ea^ pabbajitvā anukkamena bodhisattassa santikaṃ upasaṅkamitvā chabbassāni taṃ upaṭṭhahanto tassa oḷārikāhāraparibhogena nibbinno apakkamitvā isipatanaṃ agamāsi. atha kho bodhisatto oḷārikāhāraparibhogena laddhakāyabalo vesākhapuṇṇamāyaṃ bodhirukkhamūle aparājitapallaṅke nisinno tiṇṇaṃ mārānaṃ matthakaṃ madditvā abhisambuddho hutvā sattasattāhaṃ bodhimaṇḍeyeva vītināmetvā pañcavaggiyānaṃ ñāṇaparipākaṃ ñatvā āsāḷhīpuṇṇamāyaṃ isipatanaṃ gantvā tesaṃ dhammacakkapavattanasuttantaṃ (mahāva0 13 ādayo; saṃ0 ni0 5.1081) kathesi. desanāpariyosāne koṇḍaññatthero ^a^M1.0336^ea^ aṭṭhārasahi brahmakoṭīhi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi. atha pañcamiyaṃ pakkhassa anattalakkhaṇasuttantadesanāya (mahāva0 20 ādayo; saṃ0 ni0 3.59) arahattaṃ sacchākāsi.

[03] 596^b^.^eb^ evaṃ so arahattaṃ patvā ``kiṃ kammaṃ katvā ahaṃ lokuttarasukhaṃ adhigatomhī''ti upadhārento attano pubbakammaṃ paccakkhato ñatvā somanassavasena pubbacaritāpadānaṃ udānavasena dassento ^b^padumuttarasambuddha^eb^ntiādimāha. tassattho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. ^b^lokajeṭṭhaṃ vināyaka^eb^nti sakalassa sattalokassa jeṭṭhaṃ padhānanti attho. visesena veneyyasatte saṃsārasāgarassa paratīraṃ amatamahānibbānaṃ neti sampāpetīti ^b^vināyako,^eb^ taṃ vināyakaṃ. ^b^buddhabhūmimanuppatta^eb^nti buddhassa bhūmi patiṭṭhānaṭṭhānanti buddhabhūmi, sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ, taṃ anuppatto paṭividdhoti buddhabhūmimanuppatto, taṃ buddhabhūmimanuppattaṃ, sabbaññutappattaṃ buddhabhūtanti attho. ^b^paṭhamaṃ addasaṃ aha^eb^nti paṭhamaṃ vesākhapuṇṇamiyā rattiyā paccūsasamaye buddhabhūtaṃ padumuttarasambuddhaṃ ahaṃ addakkhinti attho.

[03] 597^b^.^eb^ ^b^yāvatā bodhiyā mūle^eb^ti yattakā bodhirukkhasamīpe yakkhā ^b^samāgatā^eb^ rāsibhūtā ^b^sambuddhaṃ^eb^ buddhabhūtaṃ taṃ buddhaṃ ^b^pañjalīkatā^eb^ dasaṅgulisamodhānaṃ añjalipuṭaṃ sirasi ṭhapetvā ^b^vandanti^eb^ namassantīti sambandho.

[03] 598^b^.^eb^ ^b^sabbe devā tuṭṭhamanā^eb^ti buddhabhūtaṭṭhānaṃ āgatā te sabbe devā tuṭṭhacittā ākāse sañcarantīti ^a^V1.0308^ea^ sambandho. ^b^andhakāratamonudo^eb^ti ativiya andhakāraṃ mohaṃ nudo khepano ayaṃ buddho anuppattoti attho.

[03] 599^b^.^eb^ ^b^tesaṃ hāsaparetāna^eb^nti hāsehi pītisomanassehi samannāgatānaṃ tesaṃ devānaṃ^b^ mahānādo^eb^ mahāghoso ^b^avattatha^eb^ pavattati, sammāsambuddhasāsane ^a^P0.0298^ea^ ^b^kilese^eb^ saṃkilese dhamme jhāpayissāmāti sambandho.

[03] 600^b^.^eb^ ^b^devānaṃ giramaññāyā^eb^ti vācāya thutivacanena saha udīritaṃ devānaṃ saddaṃ jānitvā haṭṭho ^b^haṭṭhena cittena^eb^ somanassasahagatena cittena ^b^ādibhikkhaṃ^eb^ paṭhamaṃ āhāraṃ buddhabhūtassa ahaṃ adāsinti sambandho.

[03] 602^b^.^eb^ ^b^sattāhaṃ^eb^ ^a^M1.0337^ea^ abhinikkhammāb^ti mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā sattāhaṃ padhānaṃ katvā sabbaññutaññāṇapadaṭṭhānaṃ arahattamaggañāṇasaṅkhātaṃ ^b^bodhiṃ ajjhagamaṃ^eb^ adhigañchiṃ ahanti attho. ^b^idaṃ me paṭhamaṃ bhatta^eb^nti idaṃ bhattaṃ sarīrayāpanaṃ ^b^brahmacārissa^eb^ uttamacārissa ^b^me^eb^ mayhaṃ iminā devaputtena paṭhamaṃ dinnaṃ ahosīti attho.

[03] 603^b^.^eb^ ^b^tusitā hi idhāgantvā^eb^ti tusitabhavanato idha manussaloke āgantvā ^b^yo^eb^ devaputto ^b^me^eb^ mama bhikkhaṃ ^b^upānayi^eb^ adāsi, ^b^taṃ^eb^ devaputtaṃ ^b^kittayissāmi^eb^ kathessāmi pākaṭaṃ karissāmi. ^b^bhāsato^eb^ bhāsantassa mama vacanaṃ suṇāthāti sambandho. ito paraṃ anuttānapadameva vaṇṇayissāma.

[03] 607^b^.^eb^ ^b^tidasā^eb^ti tāvatiṃsabhavanā. ^b^agārā^eb^ti attano uppannabrāhmaṇagehato nikkhamitvā pabbajitvā cha saṃvaccharāni dukkarakārikaṃ karontena bodhisattena saha vasissatīti sambandho.

[03] 608^b^.^eb^ ^b^tato sattamake vasse^eb^ti tato pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya sattame saṃvacchare. ^b^buddho saccaṃ kathessatī^eb^ti chabbassāni dukkarakārikaṃ katvā sattamasaṃvacchare buddho hutvā bārāṇasiyaṃ isipatane migadāye dhammacakkapavattanasuttantadesanāya dukkhasamudayanirodhamaggasaccasaṅkhātaṃ catusaccaṃ kathessatīti attho. ^b^koṇḍañño nāma nāmenā^eb^ti nāmena gottanāmavasena koṇḍañño nāma. ^b^paṭhamaṃ sacchikāhitī^eb^ti pañcavaggiyānamantare paṭhamaṃ ādito eva sotāpattimaggañāṇaṃ sacchikāhiti paccakkhaṃ karissatīti attho.

[03] 609^b^.^eb^ ^b^nikkhantenānupabbaji^eb^nti ^a^V1.0309^ea^ nikkhantena bodhisattena saha nikkhamitvā anupabbajinti attho. tathā anupabbajitvā mayā ^b^padhānaṃ^eb^ vīriyaṃ ^b^sukataṃ^eb^ suṭṭhu kataṃ daḷhaṃ katvā katanti attho. ^b^kilese jhāpanatthāyā^eb^ti kilese sosanatthāya viddhaṃsanatthāya ^b^anagāriyaṃ^eb^ agārassa ahitaṃ kasivaṇijjādikammavirahitaṃ sāsanaṃ ^b^pabbajiṃ^eb^ paṭipajjinti attho.

[03] 610^b^.^eb^ ^b^abhigantvāna^eb^ ^a^M1.0338^ea^ ^a^P0.0299^ea^ ^b^sabbaññū^eb^ti sabbaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ vā saṅkhāravikāralakkhaṇanibbānapaññattisaṅkhātaṃ ñeyyaṃ vā jānanto devehi saha vattamāne satta loke buddho ^b^migāraññaṃ^eb^ migadāya vihāraṃ abhigantvā upasaṅkamitvā ^b^me^eb^ mayā sacchikatena ^b^iminā^eb^ sotāpattimaggañāṇena ^b^amatabheriṃ^eb^ amatamahānibbānabheriṃ ahari pahari dassesīti attho.

[03] 611^b^.^eb^ ^b^so dānī^eb^ti so ahaṃ paṭhamaṃ sotāpanno idāni arahattamaggañāṇena amataṃ ^b^santaṃ^eb^ vūpasantasabhāvaṃ ^b^padaṃ^eb^ pajjitabbaṃ pāpuṇitabbaṃ, ^b^anuttaraṃ^eb^ uttaravirahitaṃ nibbānaṃ patto adhigatoti attho. ^b^sabbāsave pariññāyā^eb^ti kāmāsavādayo sabbe āsave pariññāya pahānapariññāya pajahitvā ^b^anāsavo^eb^ nikkileso ^b^viharāmi^eb^ iriyāpathavihārena vāsaṃ kappemi. ^b^paṭisambhidā catasso^eb^tyādayo gāthāyo vuttatthāyeva.

[03] atha naṃ satthā aparabhāge jetavanamahāvihāre bhikkhusaṅghamajjhe paññattavarabuddhāsane nisinno paṭhamaṃ paṭividdhadhammabhāvaṃ dīpento ``etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ rattaññūnaṃ yadidaṃ aññāsikoṇḍañño''ti (a0 ni0 1.188) etadagge ṭhapesi. so dvīhi aggasāvakehi attani kariyamānaṃ paramanipaccakāraṃ, gāmantasenāsane ākiṇṇavihārañca pariharitukāmo, vivekābhiratiyā viharitukāmo ca attano santikaṃ upagatānaṃ gahaṭṭhapabbajitānaṃ paṭisanthārakaraṇampi papañcaṃ maññamāno satthāraṃ āpucchitvā himavantaṃ pavisitvā chaddantehi nāgehi upaṭṭhiyamāno chaddantadahatīre dvādasa vassāni vasi. evaṃ tattha vasantaṃ theraṃ ekadivasaṃ sakko devarājā upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ṭhito evamāha ``sādhu me, bhante, ayyo dhammaṃ desetū''ti. thero tassa catusaccagabbhaṃ tilakkhaṇāhataṃ suññatāpaṭisaṃyuttaṃ nānānayavicittaṃ amatogadhaṃ buddhalīlāya dhammaṃ desesi. taṃ sutvā sakko attano pasādaṃ pavedento --
[21] ``esa ^a^V1.0310^ea^ bhiyyo pasīdāmi, sutvā dhammaṃ mahārasaṃ.
[22] virāgo desito dhammo, anupādāya sabbaso''ti.. (theragā0 673) --
[25] thutiṃ ^a^M1.0339^ea^ akāsi. thero chaddantadahatīre dvādasa vassāni vasitvā upakaṭṭhe parinibbāne satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā parinibbānaṃ anujānāpetvā tattheva gantvā parinibbāyīti.
[06] aññāsikoṇḍaññattherāpadānavaṇṇanā samattā.

[03] ^b^padumuttaro^eb^ ^a^P0.0300^ea^ ^b^nāma jino^eb^tiādikaṃ āyasmato piṇḍolabhāradvājassa apadānaṃ. ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle sīhayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā pabbatapāde guhāyaṃ vihāsi. bhagavā tassa anuggahaṃ kātuṃ gocarāya pakkantakāle tassa sayanaguhaṃ pavisitvā nirodhaṃ samāpajjitvā nisīdi. sīho gocaraṃ gahetvā nivatto guhadvāre ṭhatvā bhagavantaṃ disvā haṭṭhatuṭṭho jalajathalajapupphehi pūjaṃ katvā cittaṃ pasādento bhagavato ārakkhaṇatthāya aññe vāḷamige apanetuṃ tīsu velāsu sīhanādaṃ nadanto buddhagatāya satiyā aṭṭhāsi. yathā paṭhamadivase, evaṃ sattāhaṃ pūjesi. bhagavā ``sattāhaccayena nirodhā vuṭṭhahitvā vaṭṭissati imassa ettako upanissayo''ti tassa passantasseva ākāsaṃ pakkhanditvā vihārameva gato.

[03] sīho buddhaviyogadukkhaṃ adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto kālaṃ katvā haṃsavatīnagare mahābhogakule nibbattitvā vayappatto nagaravāsīhi saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pasanno sattāhaṃ buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ pavattetvā yāvajīvaṃ puññāni katvā aparāparaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaranto amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle kosambiyaṃ rañño udenassa purohitassa putto hutvā nibbatti. ^b^bhāradvājo^eb^tissa nāmaṃ ahosi. so vayappato tayo vede uggahetvā pañca māṇavakasatāni mante vācento mahagghasabhāvena ananurūpācārattā ^a^M1.0340^ea^ tehi pariccatto rājagahaṃ gantvā bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca lābhasakkāraṃ disvā sāsane pabbajitvā bhojane amattaññū hutvā viharati. satthārā upāyena mattaññutāya patiṭṭhāpento vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi. chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā bhagavato sammukhā ^a^V1.0311^ea^ ``yaṃ sāvakehi pattabbaṃ, taṃ mayā anuppatta''nti, bhikkhusaṅghe ca ``yassa magge vā phale vā kaṅkhā atthi, so maṃ pucchatū''ti sīhanādaṃ nadi. tena taṃ bhagavā -- ``etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sīhanādikānaṃ yadidaṃ piṇḍolabhāradvājo''ti (a0 ni0 1.188, 195) etadagge ṭhapesi.

[03] 613^b^.^eb^ evaṃ etadaggaṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā pubbe katapuññasambhāraṃ saritvā somanassavasena attano puññakammāpadānaṃ vibhāvento ^b^padumuttaro^eb^tiādimāha. tassattho heṭṭhā vuttova. ^b^purato himavantassā^eb^ti himālayapabbatato pubbadisābhāgeti attho. ^b^cittakūṭe^eb^ ^a^P0.0301^ea^ ^b^vasī tadā^eb^ti yadā ahaṃ sīho migarājā hutvā himavantapabbatasamīpe vasāmi, tadā padumuttaro nāma satthā anekehi ca osadhehi, anekehi ca ratanehi cittavicittatāya cittakūṭe cittapabbatasikhare vasīti sambandho.

[03] 614^b^.^eb^ ^b^abhītarūpo tatthāsi^eb^nti abhītasabhāvo nibbhayasabhāvo migarājā tattha āsiṃ ahosinti attho. ^b^catukkamo^eb^ti catūhi disāhi kamo gantuṃ samattho. ^b^yassa saddaṃ suṇitvānā^eb^ti yassa migarañño sīhanādaṃ sutvā ^b^bahujjanā^eb^ bahusattā ^b^vikkhambhanti^eb^ visesena khambhanti bhāyanti.

[03] 615^b^.^eb^ ^b^suphullaṃ padumaṃ gayhā^eb^ti bhagavati pasādena supupphitapadumapupphaṃ ḍaṃsitvā. ^b^narāsabhaṃ^eb^ narānaṃ āsabhaṃ uttamaṃ seṭṭhaṃ sambuddhaṃ upagacchiṃ, samīpaṃ agaminti attho. ^b^vuṭṭhitassa samādhimhā^eb^ti nirodhasamāpattito vuṭṭhitassa buddhassa taṃ pupphaṃ abhiropayiṃ pūjesinti attho.

[03] 616^b^.^eb^ ^b^catuddisaṃ namassitvā^eb^ti catūsu disāsu namassitvā ^b^sakaṃ cittaṃ^eb^ attano cittaṃ ^b^pasādetvā^eb^ ādarena patiṭṭhapetvā ^b^sīhanādaṃ^eb^ abhītanādaṃ ^b^anadiṃ^eb^ ghosesinti attho.
[03] 617^b^.^eb^ tato ^a^M1.0341^ea^ buddhena dinnabyākaraṇaṃ pakāsento ^b^padumuttaro^eb^tiādimāha. taṃ uttānatthameva.

[03] 618^b^.^eb^ ^b^vadataṃ seṭṭho^eb^ti ``mayaṃ buddhā, mayaṃ buddhā''ti vadantānaṃ aññatitthiyānaṃ seṭṭho uttamo buddho āgatoti sambandho. tassa āgatassa bhagavato taṃ dhammaṃ ^b^sossāma^eb^ suṇissāmāti attho.

[03] 619^b^.^eb^ ^b^tesaṃ^eb^ ^a^V1.0312^ea^ ^b^hāsaparetāna^eb^nti hāsehi somanassehi paretānaṃ abhibhūtānaṃ samannāgatānaṃ tesaṃ devamanussānaṃ. ^b^lokanāyako^eb^ti lokassa nāyako saggamokkhasampāpako ^b^mama saddaṃ^eb^ mayhaṃ sīhanādaṃ ^b^pakittesi^eb^ pakāsesi kathesi, ^b^dīghadassī^eb^ anāgatakāladassī ^b^mahāmuni^eb^ munīnamantare mahanto muni. sesagāthā suviññeyyameva.
[03] 622^b^.^eb^ nāmena padumo nāma cakkavattī hutvā catusaṭṭhiyā jātiyā ^b^issariyaṃ^eb^ issarabhāvaṃ rajjaṃ kārayissatīti attho.
[03] 623^b^.^eb^ ^b^kappasatasahassamhī^eb^ti sāmyatthe bhummavacanaṃ, kappasatasahassānaṃ pariyosāneti attho.

[03] 624^b^.^eb^ ^b^pakāsite pāvacane^eb^ti tena gotamena bhagavatā piṭakattaye pakāsite desiteti attho. ^b^brahmabandhu bhavissatī^eb^ti tadā gotamassa bhagavato kāle ayaṃ sīho migarājā brāhmaṇakule nibbattissatīti attho. ^b^brahmaññā abhinikkhammā^eb^ti brāhmaṇakulato nikkhamitvā tassa bhagavato sāsane pabbajissatīti sambandho.

[03] 625^b^.^eb^ ^b^padhānapahitatto^eb^ti vīriyakaraṇatthaṃ pesitacitto. upadhisaṅkhātānaṃ ^a^P0.0302^ea^ kilesānaṃ abhāvena ^b^nirupadhi^eb^. kilesadarathānaṃ abhāvena ^b^upasanto. sabbāsave^eb^ sakalāsave ^b^pariññāya^eb^ pahāya ^b^anāsavo^eb^ nikkileso ^b^nibbāyissati^eb^ khandhaparinibbānena nibbuto bhavissatīti attho.
[03] 626^b^.^eb^ ^b^vijane pantaseyyamhī^eb^ti janasambādharahite dūrāraññasenāsaneti attho. ^b^vāḷamigasamākule^eb^ti kāḷasīhādīhi caṇḍamigasaṅgehi ākule saṃkiṇṇeti attho. sesaṃ vuttatthamevāti.
[06] piṇḍolabhāradvājattherāpadānavaṇṇanā samattā.

[03] ^b^gaṅgā^eb^ ^a^M1.0342^ea^ ^a^V1.0313^ea^ ^b^bhāgīrathī nāmā^eb^tiādikaṃ āyasmato khadiravaniyattherassa apadānaṃ. ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare titthanāvikakule nibbattitvā mahāgaṅgāya payāgatitthe titthanāvāya kammaṃ karonto ekadivasaṃ sasāvakasaṅghaṃ bhagavantaṃ gaṅgātīraṃ upagataṃ disvā pasannamānaso nāvāsaṅghāṭaṃ yojetvā mahantena pūjāsakkārena paratīraṃ pāpetvā aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ satthārā āraññakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapiyamānaṃ disvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthetvā bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca mahādānaṃ pavattetvā paṇidhānaṃ akāsi. bhagavā tassa patthanāya avañjhabhāvaṃ byākāsi.

[03] so tato paṭṭhāya puññāni upacinanto devamanussesu saṃsaranto ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde magadharaṭṭhe nālakagāme rūpasāriyā nāma brāhmaṇiyā kucchimhi nibbatti. taṃ vayappattaṃ mātāpitaro gharabandhanena bandhitukāmā hutvā tassa ārocesuṃ. so sāriputtattherassa pabbajitabhāvaṃ sutvā ``mayhaṃ jeṭṭhabhātā ayyo upatisso imaṃ vibhavaṃ chaḍḍetvā pabbajito, tena vantaṃ kheḷapiṇḍaṃ kathāhaṃ anubhavissāmī''ti jātasaṃvego pāsaṃ anupagacchamānamigo viya ñātake vañcetvā hetusampattiyā codiyamāno bhikkhūnaṃ santikaṃ gantvā dhammasenāpatino kaniṭṭhabhāvaṃ nivedetvā attano pabbajjāya chandaṃ ārocesi. bhikkhū taṃ pabbājetvā paripuṇṇavīsativassaṃ upasampādetvā kammaṭṭhāne niyojesuṃ. so kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā khadiravanaṃ pavisitvā vissamanto ghaṭento vāyamanto ñāṇassa paripākaṃ gatattā nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño arahā ahosi. so arahā hutvā satthāraṃ dhammasenāpatiñca vandituṃ senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya nikkhamitvā anupubbena sāvatthiṃ patvā jetavanaṃ pavisitvā satthāraṃ dhammasenāpatiñca vanditvā katipāhaṃ jetavane vihāsi. atha naṃ satthā ariyagaṇamajjhe ^a^P0.0303^ea^ nisinno āraññakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi -- ``etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ āraññakānaṃ yadidaṃ revato''ti (a0 ni0 1.198, 203).

[03] 628^b^.^eb^ evaṃ ^a^M1.0343^ea^ etadaggaṭṭhānaṃ patvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā pītisomanassavasena pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento ^b^gaṅgā bhāgīrathī^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^gaṅgā^eb^ti gāyamānā ghosaṃ kurumānā gacchatīti gaṅgā. atha vā go vuccati pathavī, tasmiṃ gatā pavattāti gaṅgā. anotattadahaṃ ^a^V1.0314^ea^ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā gataṭṭhāne ^b^āvaṭṭagaṅgā^eb^ti ca pabbatamatthakena gataṭṭhāne ^b^bahalagaṅgā^eb^ti ca tiracchānapabbataṃ vijjhitvā gataṭṭhāne ^b^umaṅgagaṅgā^eb^ti ca tato bahalapabbataṃ paharitvā pañcayojanaṃ ākāsena gataṭṭhāne ^b^ākāsagaṅgā^eb^ti ca tassā patitaṭṭhānaṃ bhinditvā jātaṃ pañca yojanaṃ pokkharaṇīkūlaṃ bhinditvā tattha pana pañcaṅguli viya pañca dhārā hutvā gaṅgā yamunā sarabhū mahī aciravatīti pañca nāmā hutvā jambudīpaṃ pañca bhāgaṃ pañca koṭṭhāsaṃ katvā pañca bhāge pañca koṭṭhāse itā gatā pavattāti bhāgīrathī. gaṅgā ca sā bhāgīrathī ceti gaṅgābhāgīrathī. ``bhāgīrathī gaṅgā''ti vattabbe gāthābandhasukhatthaṃ pubbacariyavasena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^himavantā pabhāvitāti^eb^ satte hiṃsati sītena hanati matheti āloḷetīti himo, himo assa atthīti himavā, tato himavantato paṭṭhāya pabhāvitā pavattā sandamānāti himavantapabhāvitā. ^b^kutitthe nāviko āsi^eb^nti tassā gaṅgāya caṇḍasotasamāpanne visamatitthe kevaṭṭakule uppanno nāviko āsiṃ ahosinti attho. ^b^orime ca tariṃ aha^eb^nti sampattasampattamanusse pārimā tīrā orimaṃ tīraṃ ahaṃ tariṃ tāresinti attho.
