[03] 18^b^.^eb^ so aparabhāge attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento ^b^vipassino bhagavato^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^udapāno kato mayā^eb^ti udakaṃ pivanti etthāti udapāno, kūpapokkharaṇītaḷākānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. so udapāno kūpo vipassissa bhagavato atthāya kato khanitoti attho. sesaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
[06] udapānadāyakattherāpadānavaṇṇanā samattā.

[03] ^b^nibbute^eb^ ^a^V2.0170^ea^ ^b^lokanāthamhī^eb^tiādikaṃ āyasmato sīhāsanadāyakattherassa apadānaṃ. ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave nibbānādhigamatthāya katapuññūpacayo padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle gahapatikule nibbatto viññutaṃ patto satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā ratanattaye pasanno tasmiṃ bhagavati parinibbute sattahi ratanehi khacitaṃ sīhāsanaṃ kārāpetvā bodhirukkhaṃ pūjesi, bahūhi mālāgandhadhūpehi ca pūjesi.

[03] 21^b^.^eb^ so tena puññena devamanussesu saṃsaranto ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā sabbattha pūjito imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ kulagehe nibbatto vuddhippatto gharāvāsaṃ vasanto satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pasannamānaso ñātivaggaṃ pahāya pabbajito nacirasseva arahā hutvā ^a^M2.0181^ea^ pubbūpacitakusalasambhāraṃ saritvā sañjātasomanasso pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento ^b^nibbute lokanāthamhī^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^sīhāsanamadāsaha^eb^nti sīharūpahiraññasuvaṇṇaratanehi khacitaṃ āsanaṃ sīhāsanaṃ, sīhassa vā abhītassa bhagavato nisinnārahaṃ, sīhaṃ vā seṭṭhaṃ uttamaṃ āsananti sīhāsanaṃ, taṃ ahaṃ adāsiṃ, bodhirukkhaṃ pūjesinti attho. sesaṃ suviññeyyamevāti.
[06] sīhāsanadāyakattherāpadānavaṇṇanā samattā.

[03] ^b^anomadassī bhagavā^eb^tiādikaṃ āyasmato maggadattikattherassa apadānaṃ. ayampāyasmā purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto anomadassissa ^a^P0.0462^ea^ bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto vuddhimanvāya gharāvāsaṃ saṇṭhapetvā vasanto anomadassiṃ bhagavantaṃ ākāse caṅkamantaṃ pāduddhāre pāduddhāracaṅkamanaṭṭhāne pupphānaṃ vikiraṇaṃ acchariyañca disvā pasannamānaso pupphāni ākāse ukkhipi, tāni vitānaṃ hutvā aṭṭhaṃsu.

[03] 26^b^.^eb^ so tena puññena sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto sabbattha pūjito sukhaṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kule nibbatto kamena yobbaññaṃ pāpuṇitvā saddhājāto pabbajitvā vattasampanno ^a^V2.0171^ea^ nacirasseva arahattaṃ patto caṅkamanassa pūjitattā ^b^maggadattikatthero^eb^ti pākaṭo. so pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento ^b^anomadassī bhagavā^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^diṭṭhadhammasukhatthāyā^eb^ti imasmiṃ attabhāve caṅkamanena sarīrasallahukādisukhaṃ paṭiccāti attho. ^b^abbhokāsamhi caṅkamī^eb^ti abbhokāse aṅgaṇaṭṭhāne caṅkami, padavikkhepaṃ padasañcāraṃ akāsīti attho.

[03] ^b^uddhate pāde pupphānī^eb^ti caṅkamantena pāde uddhate padumuppalādīni pupphāni pathavito uggantvā caṅkame vikiriṃsūti attho. ^b^sobhaṃ muddhani tiṭṭhare^eb^ti buddhassa ^a^M2.0182^ea^ muddhani sīse sobhayamānā tāni tiṭṭhantīti attho. sesaṃ suviññeyyamevāti.
[06] maggadattikattherāpadānavaṇṇanā samattā.

[03] ^b^padumuttarassa munino^eb^tiādikaṃ āyasmato ekadīpiyattherassa apadānaṃ. ayampāyasmā purimajinaseṭṭhesu katakusalasambhāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle gahapatikule nibbatto vuddhippatto saddho pasanno bhagavato salalamahābodhimhi ekapadīpaṃ pūjesi, thāvaraṃ katvā niccamekapadīpapūjanatthāya telavaṭṭaṃ paṭṭhapesi. so tena puññena devamanussesu saṃsaranto sabbattha jalamāno pasannacakkhuko ubhayasukhamanubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ vibhavasampanne ekasmiṃ kule nibbatto viññutaṃ patto ratanattaye pasanno pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ patto dīpapūjāya laddhavisesādhigamattā ^b^ekadīpiyatthero^eb^ti pākaṭo.
[03] 30^b^.^eb^ so aparabhāge attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento ^b^padumuttarassa munino^eb^tiādimāha. taṃ sabbaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
[06] ekadīpiyattherāpadānavaṇṇanā samattā.

[03] ^b^orena^eb^ ^a^P0.0463^ea^ ^a^V2.0172^ea^ ^b^himavantassā^eb^tiādikaṃ āyasmato maṇipūjakattherassa apadānaṃ. ayampi thero purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ kule nibbatto gharāvāsaṃ saṇṭhapetvā tatthādīnavaṃ disvā gharāvāsaṃ pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā himavantaorabhāge ekissā nadiyā samīpe paṇṇasālaṃ kāretvā vasanto vivekakāmatāya tassānukampāya ca tattha upagataṃ padumuttaraṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso maṇipallaṅkaṃ ^a^M2.0183^ea^ bhagavato pūjesi. bhagavā tassa pasādavaḍḍhanatthāya tattha nisīdi. so bhiyyosomattāya pasanno nibbānādhigamatthāya patthanaṃ akāsi. bhagavā anumodanaṃ vatvā pakkāmi. so tena puññena devamanussesu saṃsaranto sabbattha pūjito sukhaṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ vibhavasampanne kule nibbatto gharāvāsaṃ vasanto ekadivasaṃ satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi.

[03] 34^b^.^eb^ so ekadivasaṃ attanā katakusalaṃ saritvā sañjātasomanasso pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento ^b^orena himavantassā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^orenā^eb^ti himavantassa aparaṃ bhāgaṃ vihāya orena, bhummatthe karaṇavacanaṃ, orasmiṃ disābhāgeti attho. ^b^nadikā sampavattathā^eb^ti apākaṭanāmadheyyā ekā nadī saṃsuṭṭhu pavattānī vahānī sandamānā ahosīti attho. ^b^tassā cānupakhettamhī^eb^ti tassā nadiyā anupakhettamhi tīrasamīpeti attho. ^b^sayambhū vasate tadā^eb^ti yadā ahaṃ maṇipallaṅkaṃ pūjesiṃ, tadā anācariyako hutvā sayameva buddhabhūto bhagavā vasate viharatīti attho.

[03] 35^b^.^eb^ ^b^maṇiṃ paggayha pallaṅka^eb^nti ^b^maṇi^eb^nti cittaṃ ārādheti somanassaṃ karotīti maṇi, atha vā māti pamāṇaṃ karoti ābharaṇanti maṇi, atha vā marantāpi rājayuvarājādayo taṃ na pariccajanti tadatthāya saṅgāmaṃ karontīti maṇi, taṃ maṇiṃ maṇimayaṃ pallaṅkaṃ manoramaṃ ^b^sādhu cittaṃ^eb^ suṭṭhu vicittaṃ paggayha gahetvā buddhaseṭṭhassa ^b^abhiropayiṃ^eb^ pūjesinti attho. sesaṃ sabbaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
[06] maṇipūjakattherāpadānavaṇṇanā samattā.

[03] ^b^nagare^eb^ ^a^V2.0173^ea^ ^b^bandhumatiyā^eb^tiādikaṃ āyasmato tikicchakattherassa apadānaṃ. ayampāyasmā purimajinavaresu katādhikāro ^a^P0.0464^ea^ tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato kāle bandhumatīnagare vejjakule nibbatto bahussuto susikkhito vejjakamme cheko ^a^M2.0184^ea^ bahū rogino tikicchanto vipassissa bhagavato upaṭṭhākassa asokanāmattherassa rogaṃ tikicchi. so tena puññena devamanussesu aparāparaṃ sukhaṃ anubhavanto nibbattanibbattabhave arogo dīghāyuko suvaṇṇavaṇṇasarīro ahosi.

[03] 39^b^.^eb^ so imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ gahapatikule nibbatto vuddhimanvāya sabbasippesu nipphattiṃ patto arogo sukhito vibhavasampanno ratanattaye pasanno satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho gharāvāsaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā hutvā pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento ^b^nagare bandhumatiyā^eb^tiādimāha. taṃ sabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayattā uttānatthamevāti.
[06] tikicchakattherāpadānavaṇṇanā samattā.

[01] ^b^vessabhumhi bhagavatī^eb^tiādikaṃ āyasmato saṅghupaṭṭhākattherassa apadānaṃ. ayampi thero purimabuddhesu katakusalasambhāro anekesu bhavesu vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto vessabhussa bhagavato kāle tassārāmikassa putto hutvā nibbatto viññutaṃ patvā saddho pasanno vihāresu ārāmikakammaṃ karonto sakkaccaṃ saṅghaṃ upaṭṭhāsi. so teneva kusalakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ gahapatikule nibbatto vuddhippatto vibhavasampanno sukhappatto pākaṭo satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā sāsane pasanno pabbajitvā vattasampanno sāsanaṃ sobhayamāno vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhento nacirasseva saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patto chaḷabhiñño pubbe katakusalakammavasena ^b^saṅghupaṭṭhākatthero^eb^ti pākaṭo ahosi.

[03] 45^b^.^eb^ so ^a^V2.0174^ea^ ekadivasaṃ ``pubbe mayā kiṃ nāma kammaṃ katvā ayaṃ lokuttarasampatti laddhā''ti attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā paccakkhato jānitvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pākaṭaṃ karonto ^b^vessabhumhi bhagavatī^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^ahosārāmiko aha^eb^nti ahaṃ ^a^M2.0185^ea^ vessabhussa bhagavato sāsane ārāmiko ahosinti attho. sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayattā uttānatthattā ca suviññeyyamevāti.
[06] saṅghupaṭṭhākattherāpadānavaṇṇanā samattā.
[06] aṭṭhārasamavaggavaṇṇanā samattā.

[03] ito ^a^P0.0465^ea^ ^a^V2.0175^ea^ parampi ekūnavīsatimavagge āgatānaṃ imesaṃ kuṭajapupphiyattherādīnaṃ dasannaṃ therānaṃ apubbaṃ natthi. tesañhi therānaṃ purimabuddhānaṃ santike katapuññasambhārānaṃ vasena pākaṭanāmāni ceva nivāsanagarādīni ca heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbānīti taṃ sabbaṃ apadānaṃ suviññeyyamevāti.
[06] ekūnavīsatimavaggavaṇṇanā samattā.
[03] vīsatime ^a^V2.0176^ea^ vagge paṭhamattherāpadānaṃ uttānameva.

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ dutiyattherāpadāne ^b^yaṃ dāyavāsiko isī^eb^ti isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā vane vasanabhāvena ^b^dāyavāsiko isī^eb^ti saṅkhaṃ gato, attano anukampāya taṃ vanaṃ upagatassa siddhatthassa satthuno vasanamaṇḍapacchādanatthāya yaṃ tiṇaṃ, taṃ ^b^lāyati^eb^ chindatīti attho. dabbachadanaṃ katvā anekehi khuddakadaṇḍakehi maṇḍapaṃ katvā taṃ tiṇena chādetvā ^b^siddhatthassa^eb^ bhagavato ahaṃ ^b^adāsiṃ^eb^ pūjesinti attho.

[03] 8^b^.^eb^ ^b^sattāhaṃ dhārayuṃ tatthā^eb^ti taṃ maṇḍapaṃ tattha ṭhitā devamanussā sattāhaṃ nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā nisinnassa ^b^satthuno dhārayuṃ^eb^ dhāresunti attho. sesaṃ uttānatthamevāti.

[03] tatiyattherassa ^a^M2.0186^ea^ apadāne ^b^khaṇḍaphulliyatthero^eb^ti ettha ^b^khaṇḍa^eb^nti kaṭṭhānaṃ jiṇṇattā chinnabhinnaṭṭhānaṃ, ^b^phulla^eb^nti kaṭṭhānaṃ jiṇṇaṭṭhāne kaṇṇakitamahicchattakādipupphanaṃ, khaṇḍañca phullañca khaṇḍaphullāni, khaṇḍaphullānaṃ paṭisaṅkharaṇaṃ punappunaṃ thirakaraṇanti khaṇḍaphullapaṭisaṅkharaṇaṃ. imassa pana therassa sambhārapūraṇakāle phussassa bhagavato cetiye chinnabhinnaṭṭhāne sudhāpiṇḍaṃ makkhetvā thirakaraṇaṃ khaṇḍaphullapaṭisaṅkharaṇaṃ nāma. tasmā so khaṇḍaphulliyo theroti pākaṭo ahosi. tatiyaṃ.
[03] 17^b^.^eb^ catutthattherassāpadāne ^b^rañño baddhacaro aha^eb^nti rañño paricārako kammakārako ahosinti attho.

[03] 19^b^.^eb^ ^b^jalajuttamanāmino^eb^ti ^a^P0.0466^ea^ jale udake jātaṃ jalajaṃ, kiṃ taṃ padumaṃ, padumena samānanāmattā ^a^V2.0177^ea^ padumuttarassa bhagavatoti attho. uttamapadumanāmassa bhagavatoti vā attho. catutthaṃ.
[03] pañcamaṃ uttānatthameva.

[03] 28^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^nagare dvāravatiyā^eb^ti mahādvāravātapānakavāṭaphalakāhi vatipākāraṭṭālagopurakaddamodakaparikhāhi ca sampannaṃ nagaranti dvāravatīnagaraṃ, dvāraṃ vatiñca padhānaṃ katvā nagarassa upalakkhitattā ``dvāravatī nagara''nti voharantīti ^b^nagare dvāravatiyā^eb^ti vuttaṃ. mālāvaccho pupphārāmo mama ahosīti attho.
[03] 31^b^.^eb^ ^b^te kisalayā^eb^ti te asokapallavā. chaṭṭhaṃ.
[03] sattamaṭṭhamanavamāni uttānatthāneva. dasamepi apubbaṃ natthīti.
[06] vīsatimavaṇṇanā samattā.

[03] ito ^a^V2.0178^ea^ paraṃ sabbattha anuttānapadavaṇṇanaṃ karissāma. ekavīsatime bāvīsatime tevīsatime ca vagge sabbesaṃ therānaṃ sayaṃkatena puññena laddhanāmāni, katapuññānañca nānattaṃ tesaṃ byākaraṇadāyakānaṃ buddhānaṃ nāmāni ^a^M2.0187^ea^ vasitanagarāni ca heṭṭhā vuttanayattā sabbānipi uttānāneva. apadānagāthānamattho ca nayānuyogena suviññeyyoyevāti.
[03] catuvīsatime ^a^V2.0179^ea^ vagge paṭhamadutiyāpadānāni uttānāneva.

[03] 9^b^.^eb^ tatiyāpadāne ^b^aruṇavatiyā nagare^eb^ti ā samantato ālokaṃ karonto uṇati uggacchatīti aruṇo, so tasmiṃ vijjatīti aruṇavatī, tasmiṃ nagare ālokaṃ karonto sūriyo uggacchatīti attho. sesanagaresupi sūriyuggamane vijjamānepi visesavacanaṃ sabbacatuppadānaṃ ^a^P0.0467^ea^ mahiyaṃ sayanepi sati mahiyaṃ sayatīti mahiṃsoti vacanaṃ viya rūḷhivasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ. atha vā pākārapāsādahammiyādīsu suvaṇṇarajatamaṇimuttādisattaratanapabhāhi aruṇuggamanaṃ viya pabhāvatī aruṇavatī nāma, tasmiṃ aruṇavatiyā nagare, ^b^pūpiko^eb^ pūpavikkayena jīvikaṃ kappento ahosinti attho.

[03] 14^b^.^eb^ catutthāpadāne ^b^tivarāyaṃ pure ramme^eb^ti tīhi pākārehi parivāritā parikkhittāti tivarā, khajjabhojjādiupabhogavatthābharaṇādinaccagītādīhi ramaṇīyanti rammaṃ, tasmiṃ tivarāyaṃ pure nagare ^b^ramme^eb^ naḷakāro ahaṃ ahosinti sambandho.
[03] pañcamāpadānaṃ uttānatthameva.

[03] 23^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhāpadāne ^b^vaṇṇakāro ahaṃ tadā^eb^ti nīlapītarattādivaṇṇavasena vatthāni karoti rañjetīti vaṇṇakāro. vattharajako hutvā cetiye vatthehi acchādanasamaye nānāvaṇṇehi dussāni rañjesinti attho.

[03] 27^b^.^eb^ sattamāpadāne ^b^piyālaṃ pupphitaṃ disvā^eb^ti supupphitaṃ piyālarukkhaṃ disvā. ^b^gatamagge khipiṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0180^ea^ ^b^aha^eb^nti ahaṃ ^b^migaluddo^eb^ nesādo hutvā piyālapupphaṃ ocinitvā buddhassa gatamagge khipiṃ pūjesinti attho.

[03] 30^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhamāpadāne ^a^M2.0188^ea^ ^b^sake sippe apatthaddho^eb^ti attano takkabyākaraṇādisippasmiṃ apatthaddho patiṭṭhito cheko ahaṃ kānanaṃ ^b^agamaṃ^eb^ gato ^b^sambuddhaṃ yantaṃ disvānā^eb^ti vanantare gacchantaṃ vipassiṃ sambuddhaṃ passitvā. ^b^ambayāgaṃ adāsaha^eb^nti ahaṃ ambadānaṃ adāsinti attho.
[03] 33^b^.^eb^ navamāpadāne ^b^jagatī kāritā mayha^eb^nti atthadassissa bhagavato sarīradhātunidhāpitacetiye jagati chinnabhinnāalindapupphādhānasaṅkhātā jagati mayā kāritā kārāpitāti attho.
[03] dasamāpadānaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
[06] catuvīsatimavaggavaṇṇanā samattā.

[03] 1^b^.^eb^ pañcavīsatime ^a^P0.0468^ea^ ^a^V2.0181^ea^ vagge paṭhamāpadāne ^b^bharitvā tuvaramādāyā^eb^ti tuvarāṭṭhiṃ muggakalayasadisaṃ tuvaraṭṭhiṃ bhajjitvā pupphetvā bhājanena ādāya ^b^saṅghassa^eb^ vanamajjhogāhakassa ^b^adadiṃ^eb^ adāsinti attho.

[03] 4-5^b^.^eb^ dutiyāpadāne ^b^dhanuṃ advejjhaṃ katvānā^eb^ti migādīnaṃ māraṇatthāya dhanuṃ sannayhitvā caramāno ^b^kesaraṃ ogataṃ disvā^eb^ti supupphitaṃ khuddakasaraṃ disvā ^b^buddhassa abhiropesi^eb^nti ahaṃ cittaṃ pasādetvā vanaṃ sampattassa tissassa bhagavato abhiropayiṃ pūjesinti attho.

[03] 9-10^b^.^eb^ tatiyāpadāne ^b^jalakukkuṭo^eb^ti jātassare caramānakukkuṭo. ^b^tuṇḍena kesariṃ gayhā^eb^ti padumapupphaṃ mukhatuṇḍena ḍaṃsitvā ākāsena gacchantassa ^b^tissassa^eb^ bhagavato ^b^abhiropesiṃ^eb^ pūjesinti attho.

[03] 14^b^.^eb^ catutthāpadāne ^b^viravapupphamādāyā^eb^ti vividhaṃ ravati saddaṃ karotīti viravaṃ, saddakaraṇavelāyaṃ vikasanato ``virava''nti laddhanāmaṃ pupphasamūhaṃ ādāya gahetvā siddhatthassa ^b^buddhassa abhiropayiṃ^eb^ pūjesinti attho.

[03] 17^b^.^eb^ pañcamāpadāne ^b^kuṭigopako^eb^ti senāsanapālako. ^b^kālena kālaṃ dhūpesi^eb^nti sampattasampattakālānukāle dhūpesiṃ, dhūpena sugandhaṃ akāsinti ^a^M2.0189^ea^ attho. siddhatthassa bhagavato gandhakuṭikālānusāridhūpena dhūpesiṃ vāsesinti attho.
[03] chaṭṭhasattamāpadānāni uttānatthāneva.
[03] 27^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhamāpadāne ^a^V2.0182^ea^ ^b^satta sattalipupphānī^eb^ti sattalisaṅkhātāni, satta pupphāni sīsenādāya vessabhussa bhagavato ^b^abhiropesiṃ^eb^ pūjesinti attho.
[03] 31^b^.^eb^ navamāpadāne ^b^bimbijālakapupphānī^eb^ti rattaṅkuravakapupphāni siddhatthassa bhagavato pūjesinti attho.
[03] 35^b^.^eb^ dasamāpadāne ^b^uddālakaṃ gahetvānā^eb^ti jātassare vihaṅgasobbhe jātaṃ uddālakapupphaṃ ocinitvā kakusandhassa bhagavato pūjesinti attho. sesaṃ suviññeyyamevāti.
[06] pañcavīsatimavaggavaṇṇanā samattā.
[03] chabbīsatime ^a^P0.0469^ea^ ^a^V2.0183^ea^ vagge paṭhamāpadānaṃ uttānameva.

[03] 5-6^b^.^eb^ dutiyāpadāne ^b^vijahitvā devavaṇṇa^eb^nti devatā sarīraṃ vijahitvā chaḍḍetvā, manussasarīraṃ nimminitvāti attho. ^b^adhikāraṃ kattukāmo^eb^ti adhikakiriyaṃ puññasambhāraṃ kattukāmo devaro nāma ahaṃ devarājā bhariyāya saha buddhaseṭṭhassa sāsane sādaratāya ^b^idha^eb^ imasmiṃ manussaloke ^b^āgamiṃ^eb^ āgatoti attho. ^b^tassa bhikkhā mayā dinnā^eb^ti padumuttarassa bhagavato yo nāmena ^b^devalo^eb^ nāma sāvako ahosi, tassa sāvakassa mayā vippasannena cetasā ^b^bhikkhā dinnā^eb^ piṇḍapāto dinnoti attho.

[03] 9-10^b^.^eb^ tatiyāpadāne ^b^ānando nāma sambuddho^eb^ti ānandaṃ tuṭṭhiṃ jananato ānando nāma paccekabuddhoti attho. ^b^amanussamhi kānane^eb^ti amanussapariggahe kānane mahāaraññe ^b^parinibbāyi^eb^ anupādisesanibbānadhātuyā ^a^M2.0190^ea^ antaradhāyi, adassanaṃ agamāsīti attho. ^b^sarīraṃ tattha jhāpesi^eb^nti ahaṃ devalokā idhāgantvā tassa bhagavato sarīraṃ tattha araññe jhāpesiṃ dahanaṃ akāsinti attho.
[03] catutthapañcamāpadānāni uttānāneva.

[03] 20^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhāpadāne ^b^ahosiṃ candano nāmā^eb^ti nāmena paṇṇattivasena candano nāma. ^b^sambuddhassatrajo^eb^ti paccekasambuddhabhūtato pubbe tassa atrajo putto ahaṃ. ^b^ekopāhano mayā dinno^eb^ti ekaṃ upāhanayugaṃ mayā dinnaṃ. ^b^bodhiṃ sampajja me tuva^eb^nti tena upāhanayugena me mayhaṃ sāvakabodhiṃ tuvaṃ sampajja nipphādehīti attho.

[03] 23-24^b^.^eb^ sattamāpadāne ^a^V2.0184^ea^ ^b^mañjarikaṃ karitvānā^eb^ti mañjeṭṭhipupphaṃ haritacaṅkoṭakaṃ gahetvā ^b^rathiyaṃ^eb^ vīthiyā paṭipajjiṃ ahaṃ tathā paṭipannova ^b^bhikkhusaṅghapurakkhataṃ^eb^ bhikkhusaṅghena parivutaṃ ^b^samaṇānaggaṃ^eb^ samaṇānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ aggaṃ seṭṭhaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ addasanti sambandho. ^b^buddhassa abhiropayi^eb^nti disvā ca pana taṃ pupphaṃ ubhohi hatthehi ^b^paggayha^eb^ ukkhipitvā buddhassa phussassa bhagavato abhiropayiṃ pūjesinti attho.

[03] 28-29^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhamāpadāne ^b^aloṇapaṇṇabhakkhomhī^eb^ti khīrapaṇṇādīni uñchācariyāya āharitvā loṇavirahitāni paṇṇāni pacitvā bhakkhāmi, aloṇapaṇṇabhakkho ^a^P0.0470^ea^ amhi bhavāmīti attho. ^b^niyamesu ca saṃvuto^eb^ti niyamasaññitesu pāṇātipātāveramaṇiādīsu niccapañcasīlesu saṃvuto pihitoti attho. ^b^pātarāse anuppatte^eb^ti purebhattakāle anuppatte. ^b^siddhattho upagacchi ma^eb^nti mama samīpaṃ siddhattho bhagavā upagañchi sampāpuṇi. ^b^tāhaṃ buddhassa pādāsi^eb^nti ahaṃ taṃ aloṇapaṇṇaṃ tassa buddhassa adāsinti attho.
[03] navamāpadānaṃ uttānameva.

[03] 37-38^b^.^eb^ dasamāpadāne ^b^sikhinaṃ sikhinaṃ yathā^eb^ti sarīrato nikkhantachabbaṇṇaraṃsīhi ^b^obhāsayantaṃ^eb^ jalantaṃ sikhīnaṃ sikhībhagavantaṃ sikhīnaṃ yathā jalamānāggikkhandhaṃ viya. ^b^aggajaṃ pupphamādāyā^eb^ti aggajanāmakaṃ pupphaṃ gahetvā ^b^buddhassa^eb^ sikhissa bhagavato ^b^abhiropayiṃ^eb^ pūjesinti attho.
[06] chabbīsatimavaggavaṇṇanā samattā.

[03] 1-2^b^.^eb^ sattavīsatime ^a^M2.0191^ea^ ^a^V2.0185^ea^ vagge paṭhamāpadāne ^b^jalajagge duve gayhā^eb^ti jale udake jāte agge uppalādayo dve pupphe gahetvā buddhassa samīpaṃ gantvā ekaṃ pupphaṃ pādesu ^b^nikkhipiṃ^eb^ pūjesiṃ, ekaṃ pupphaṃ ākāse khipinti attho.
[03] dutiyāpadānaṃ pākaṭameva.

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ tatiyāpadāne ^b^bodhiyā pādaputtame^eb^ti uttame bodhipādape. ^b^aḍḍhacandaṃ mayā dinna^eb^nti tasmiṃ bodhimūle aḍḍhacandākārena mayā anekapupphāni pūjitānīti attho. ^b^dharaṇīruhapādape^eb^ti rukkhapabbataratanādayo dhāretīti dharaṇī, pathavī, dharaṇiyā ruhati patiṭṭhahatīti dharaṇīruho, pādasaṅkhātena mūlena udakaṃ pivati khandhaviṭapādīsu patthariyatīti pādapo, dharaṇīruho ca so pādapo ceti dharaṇīruhapādapo, tasmiṃ dharaṇīruhapādape pupphaṃ mayā pūjitanti attho.
[03] catutthāpadānaṃ uttānatthameva.

[03] 18-19^b^.^eb^ pañcamāpadāne ^b^himavantassāvidūre^eb^ti himavantassa āsanne. ^b^romaso nāma pabbato^eb^ti rukkhalatāgumbābhāvā kevalaṃ dabbatiṇādisañchannattā romaso nāma pabbato ahosi. ^b^tamhi pabbatapādamhī^eb^ti ^a^P0.0471^ea^ tasmiṃ pabbatapariyante. ^b^samaṇo bhāvitindriyo^eb^ti samitapāpo vūpasantakileso samaṇo vaḍḍhitaindriyo, rakkhitacakkhundriyādīndriyoti attho. atha vā vaḍḍhitaindriyo vaḍḍhitasaddhindriyādīndriyoti attho. tassa samaṇassa ahaṃ biḷāliāluve gahetvā adāsinti attho.
[03] chaṭṭhasattamaṭṭhamanavamadasamāpadānāni uttānatthānevāti.
[06] sattavīsatimavaggavaṇṇanā samattā.
[03] aṭṭhavīsatime ^a^V2.0186^ea^ vagge paṭhamāpadānaṃ uttānameva.
[03] 5^b^.^eb^ dutiyāpadāne ^b^manomayena kāyenā^eb^ti yathā cittavasena pavattakāyenāti attho.

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ tatiyāpadāne ^a^M2.0192^ea^ ^b^mahāsamuddaṃ nissāyā^eb^ti mahāsāgarāsanne ṭhitassa pabbatassa antare pabbataleṇeti attho. siddhattho bhagavā vivekakāmatāya ^b^vasati^eb^ paṭivasatīti attho. ^b^paccuggantvānakāsaha^eb^nti ahaṃ tassa bhagavato paṭiuggantvā samīpaṃ gantvā vandanādipuññaṃ akāsinti attho. ^b^caṅkoṭakamadāsaha^eb^nti siddhatthassa bhagavato ahaṃ pupphabharitaṃ caṅkoṭakaṃ kadambaṃ adāsiṃ pūjesinti attho.
[03] 14^b^.^eb^ catutthāpadāne ^b^akakkasacittassāthā^eb^ti apharusacittassa, ^b^atha^eb^-saddo padapūraṇe.

[03] 19^b^.^eb^ pañcamāpadāne ^b^udumbare vasantassā^eb^ti udumbararukkhamūle rukkhacchāyāya vasantassa tissassa bhagavato. ^b^niyate paṇṇasanthare^eb^ti niyāmite paṭibaddhe paṇṇasanthare sākhābhaṅgāsane nisinnassa. ^b^vutthokāso mayā dinno^eb^ti vivittokāse maṇḍapadvārādīhi pihitokāso mayā dinno sampāditoti attho.

[03] 24^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhāpadāne ^b^potthadānaṃ mayā dinna^eb^nti potthavaṭṭiṃ potthachalliṃ tāḷetvā kataṃ sāṭakaṃ visamaṃ gophāsukena ghaṃsitvā nimmitaṃ suttaṃ gahetvā kantitvā tena suttena nisīdanatthāya vā bhūmattharaṇatthāya vā sāṭakaṃ vāyāpetvā taṃ sāṭakaṃ mayā ratanattayassa dinnanti attho.

[03] 27^b^.^eb^ sattamāpadāne ^b^candabhāgānadītīre^eb^ti candabhāgāya nāma nadiyā tīrato, nissakke bhummavacanaṃ ^a^V2.0187^ea^. ^b^anusota^eb^nti sotassa anu heṭṭhāgaṅgaṃ ^a^P0.0472^ea^ ^b^vajāmi^eb^ gacchāmi ahanti attho. ^b^satta māluvapupphāni, citamāropayiṃ aha^eb^nti ahaṃ māluvapupphāni satta pattāni gahetvā citake vālukarāsimhi vālukāhi thūpaṃ katvā pūjesinti attho.

[03] 31-32^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhamāpadāne ^b^mahāsindhu sudassanā^eb^ti sundaradassanasundarodakadhavalapulinopasobhitattā suṭṭhu manoharā mahāsindhu nāma vārinadī ahosi. ^b^tattha^eb^ tissaṃ sindhuvārinadiyaṃ ^b^sappabhāsaṃ^eb^ pabhāya sahitaṃ ^b^sudassanaṃ^eb^ sundararūpaṃ ^b^paramopasame yuttaṃ^eb^ uttame upasame yuttaṃ samaṅgībhūtaṃ vītarāgaṃ ahaṃ addasanti attho. ^b^disvāhaṃ vimhitāsayo^eb^ti ^a^M2.0193^ea^ ``evarūpaṃ bhayānakaṃ himavantaṃ kathaṃ sampatto''ti vimhitājjhāsayo acchariyabbhutacittoti attho. ^b^āluvaṃ tassa pādāsi^eb^nti tassa arahato ahaṃ pasannamānaso āluvakandaṃ pādāsiṃ ādarena adāsinti attho.
[03] navamadasamāpadānāni uttānānevāti.
[06] aṭṭhavīsatimavaggavaṇṇanā samattā.

[03] 1-2^b^.^eb^ ekūnatiṃsatime ^a^V2.0188^ea^ vagge paṭhamāpadāne ^b^paṇṇabhojanabhojano^eb^ti khīrapaṇṇādibhojanassa bhuñjanatthāya paṇṇasālāya nisinno ^b^amhi^eb^ bhavāmīti attho. ^b^upaviṭṭhañca maṃ santa^eb^nti paṇṇasālāyaṃ upaviṭṭhaṃ santaṃ vijjamānaṃ maṃ. ^b^upāgacchi mahāisī^eb^ti mahante sīlādikhandhe esanato mahāisi. ^b^lokapajjoto^eb^ lokapadīpo ^b^siddhattho^eb^ bhagavā upagacchi, mama samīpaṃ agamāsīti attho. ^b^nisinnassa paṇṇasanthare^eb^ti upagantvā paṇṇasanthare nisinnassa khādanatthāya seditaṃ ^b^paṇṇaṃ^eb^ mayā dinnanti sambandho.

[03] 5-7^b^.^eb^ dutiyāpadāne sinerusamasantoso dharaṇīsamasādiso siddhattho bhagavāti sambandho. ^b^vuṭṭhahitvā samādhimhā^eb^ti nirodhasamāpattito vuṭṭhahitvā visuṃ hutvāti attho. ^b^bhikkhāya mamupaṭṭhito^eb^ti bhikkhācāravelāya ``ajja mama yo koci kiñci dānaṃ dadāti, tassa mahapphala''nti cintetvā nisinnassa mama santikaṃ samīpaṃ upaṭṭhito samīpamāgatoti attho. ^b^harītakaṃ...pe0... phārusakaphalāni cā^eb^ti evaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ phalaṃ sabbalokānukampino tassa ^b^siddhatthassa mahesissa^eb^ mayā vippasannena cetasā dinnanti attho.

[03] 11-12^b^.^eb^ tatiyāpadāne ^a^P0.0473^ea^ ^b^sīhaṃ yathā vanacara^eb^nti vane caramānaṃ sīharājaṃ iva caramānaṃ siddhatthaṃ bhagavantanti sambandho. ^b^nisabhājāniyaṃ yathā^eb^ti vasabho, nisabho, visabho, āsabhoti cattāro gavajeṭṭhakā. tesu gavasatassa jeṭṭhako vasabho, gavasahassassa jeṭṭhako nisabho, gavasatasahassassa jeṭṭhako visabho, gavakoṭisatasahassassa ^a^M2.0194^ea^ jeṭṭhako āsabho. idha pana āsabho ``nisabho''ti vutto, ājānīyaṃ abhītaṃ niccalaṃ usabharājaṃ ivāti attho. ^b^kakudhaṃ vilasantaṃvā^eb^ti pupphapallavehi sobhamānaṃ kakudharukkhaṃ iva narāsabhaṃ narānaṃ āsabhaṃ uttamaṃ āgacchantaṃ siddhatthaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā saddhāya sampayuttattā vippasannena cetasā paccuggamanaṃ akāsinti attho.
[03] catutthāpadānādīni dasamāvasānāni suviññeyyānevāti.
[06] ekūnatiṃsatimavaggavaṇṇanā samattā.

[03] 1-2^b^.^eb^ tiṃsatime ^a^V2.0189^ea^ vagge paṭhamāpadāne ^b^āhutiṃ yiṭṭhukāmoha^eb^nti pūjāsakkāraṃ kāretukāmo ahaṃ. ^b^nānāpupphaṃ samānayi^eb^nti nānā anekavidhaṃ campakasalalādipupphaṃ saṃ suṭṭhu ānayiṃ, rāsiṃ akāsinti attho. ^b^sikhino lokabandhuno^eb^ti sakalalokattayabandhussa ñātakassa sikhissa bhagavato parinibbutassa citakaṃ āḷāhanacitakaṃ dārurāsiṃ jalantaṃ ādittaṃ disvā tañca mayā rāsīkataṃ pupphaṃ ^b^okiriṃ^eb^ pūjesinti attho.

[03] 6-7^b^.^eb^ dutiyāpadāne ^b^ajinuttaravāsano^eb^ti ajinamigacammaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ katvā nivāsino acchādanoti attho. ^b^abhiññā pañca nibbattā^eb^ti iddhividhādayo pañca abhiññāyo pañca ñāṇāni nibbattā uppāditā nipphāditā. ^b^candassa parimajjako^eb^ti candamaṇḍalassa samantato majjako, phuṭṭho ahosinti attho. ^b^vipassiṃ lokapajjota^eb^nti sakalalokattaye padīpasadisaṃ vipassiṃ bhagavantaṃ mama santikaṃ ^b^abhigataṃ^eb^ visesena sampattaṃ āgataṃ. ^b^disvā pāricchattakapupphānī^eb^ti devalokato pāricchattakapupphāni āharitvā vipassissa satthuno matthake chattākārena ahaṃ dhāresinti attho.

[03] 11-13^b^.^eb^ tatiyāpadāne ^b^putto mama pabbajito^eb^ti mayhaṃ putto saddhāya pabbajito. ^b^kāsāyavasano tadā^eb^ti tasmiṃ pabbajitakāle kāsāyanivattho ^a^P0.0474^ea^, na bāhirakapabbajjāya pabbajitoti attho. ^b^so^eb^ ^a^M2.0195^ea^ ca buddhattaṃ sampattob^ti so mayhaṃ putto catūsu buddhesu sāvakabuddhabhāvaṃ saṃ suṭṭhu patto, arahattaṃ pattoti attho. ^b^nibbuto lokapūjito^eb^ti sakalalokehi katasakkāro khandhaparinibbānena parinibbutoti attho. ^b^vicinanto sakaṃ putta^eb^nti ahaṃ tassa gatadesaṃ pucchitvā sakaṃ puttaṃ vicinanto pacchato agamaṃ, anugato asmīti attho. ^b^nibbutassa mahantassā^eb^ti mahantehi sīlakkhandhādīhi yuttattā mahantassa tassa mama puttassa arahato ādahanaṭṭhāne ^b^citakaṃ^eb^ citakaṭṭhānaṃ ahaṃ agamāsinti attho. ^b^paggayha añjaliṃ tatthā^eb^ti tasmiṃ ādahanaṭṭhāne ^a^V2.0190^ea^ añjaliṃ dasaṅgulisamodhānaṃ paggahetvā sirasi katvā ahaṃ ^b^citakaṃ^eb^ dahanadārurāsiṃ ^b^vanditvā^eb^ paṇāmaṃ katvā ^b^setacchattañca paggayhā^eb^ti na kevalameva vanditvā dhavalacchattañca paggayha ukkhipitvā ahaṃ ^b^āropesiṃ^eb^ patiṭṭhapesinti attho.

[03] 17-18^b^.^eb^ catutthāpadāne ^b^anuggatamhi ādicce^eb^ti sūriye anuggate anuṭṭhite paccūsakāleti attho. ^b^pasādo vipulo ahū^eb^ti rogapīḷitassa mayhaṃ cittappasādo vipulo atireko buddhānussaraṇena ahu ahosi. mahesino ^b^buddhaseṭṭhassa^eb^ lokamhi ^b^pātubhāvo^eb^ pākaṭabhāvo ahosīti sambandho. ^b^ghosamassosahaṃ tatthā^eb^ti tasmiṃ pātubhāve sati ``ahaṃ gilāno buddho uppanno''ti ghosaṃ assosiṃ. ^b^na ca passāmi taṃ jina^eb^nti taṃ jitapañcamāraṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ na passāmi, bāḷhagilānattā gantvā passituṃ na sakkomīti attho. ^b^maraṇañca anuppatto^eb^ti maraṇāsannakālaṃ anuppatto, āsannamaraṇo hutvāti attho. ^b^buddhasaññamanussari^eb^nti buddhotināmaṃ anussariṃ, buddhārammaṇaṃ manasi akāsinti attho.

[03] 21-23^b^.^eb^ pañcamāpadāne ^b^ārāmadvārā nikkhammā^eb^ti ārāmadvārato saṅghassa nikkhamanadvāramaggehi attho. ^b^gosīsaṃ santhataṃ mayā^eb^ti tasmiṃ nikkhamanadvāramagge ``bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca pādā mā kaddamaṃ akkamantū''ti akkamanatthāya gosīsaṭṭhiṃ mayā santharitanti attho. ^b^anubhomi sakaṃ kamma^eb^nti attano gosīsāttharaṇakammassa balena ājānīyā vātajavā sindhavā sīghavāhanādīni vipākaphalāni anubhomīti attho. ^b^aho^eb^ ^a^M2.0196^ea^ ^a^P0.0475^ea^ ^b^kāraṃ paramakāra^eb^nti ^b^sukhette^eb^ saṅghe mayā suṭṭhu kataṃ kāraṃ appakampi kiccaṃ mahapphaladānato paramakāraṃ uttamakiccaṃ aho vimhayanti attho. yathā tiṇadosādivirahitesu khettesu vappitaṃ sālibījaṃ mahapphalaṃ deti, evameva rāgadosādidosarahite parisuddhakāyavacīsamācāre saṅghakhette gosīsāttharaṇakammaṃ mayā kataṃ, idaṃ mahapphalaṃ detīti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^na aññaṃ kalamagghatī^eb^ti aññaṃ bāhirasāsane kataṃ kammaṃ saṅghe ^b^katassa kārassa^eb^ pūjāsakkārassa kalaṃ soḷasiṃ kalaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ na agghatīti sambandho.
[03] chaṭṭhasattamaṭṭhamanavamadasamāpadānāni uttānānevāti.
[06] tiṃsatimavaggavaṇṇanā samattā.

[03] 1-2^b^.^eb^ ekatiṃsatime ^a^V2.0191^ea^ vagge paṭhamāpadāne ^b^isisaṅghe ahaṃ pubbe^eb^ti ahaṃ pubbe bodhisambhārapūraṇakāle isisaṅghe paccekabuddhaisisamūhe tesaṃ samīpe himavantapabbate mātaṅgahatthikule vāraṇo caṇḍahatthī ahosinti sambandho. manussādayo vāretīti ^b^vāraṇo,^eb^ atha vā vācāya ravati koñcanādaṃ nadatīti ^b^vāraṇo. mahesīnaṃ pasādenā^eb^ti paccekabuddhamahesīnaṃ pasādena. ^b^paccekajinaseṭṭhesu, dhutarāgesu tādisū^eb^ti lokadhammehi niccalesu paccekabuddhesu ^b^padmakesaraṃ^eb^ padumareṇuṃ ^b^okiriṃ^eb^ avasiñcinti sambandho.
[03] dutiyatatiyāpadānāni uttānāni.

[03] 13-16^b^.^eb^ catutthāpadāne ^b^mahābodhimaho ahū^eb^ti vipassissa bhagavato catumaggañāṇādhārabhāvato ``bodhī''ti laddhanāmassa rukkhassa pūjā ahosīti attho. ^b^rukkhaṭṭhasseva sambuddho^eb^ti assa bodhipūjāsamaye sannipatitassa mahājanassa sambuddho lokajeṭṭho narāsabho rukkhaṭṭho iva rukkhe ṭhito viya paññāyatīti attho. ^b^bhagavā tamhi samaye^eb^ti tasmiṃ bodhipūjākaraṇakāle bhagavā ^b^bhikkhusaṅghapurakkhato^eb^ bhikkhusaṅghena parivuto. ^b^vācāsabhimudīraya^eb^nti mudusiliṭṭhamadhurauttamaghosaṃ udīrayaṃ kathayanto nicchārento catusaccaṃ pakāsesi, desesīti attho. ^b^saṃkhittena^eb^ ^a^M2.0197^ea^ ^b^ca desento^eb^ti veneyyapuggalajjhāsayānurūpena desento saṃkhittena ca vitthārena ca desayīti attho. ^b^vivaṭṭacchado^eb^ti rāgo ^a^P0.0476^ea^ chadanaṃ, doso chadanaṃ, moho chadanaṃ, sabbakilesā chadanā''ti evaṃ vuttā chadanā vivaṭā ugghāṭitā viddhaṃsitā anenāti vivaṭṭacchado, sambuddho. taṃ mahājanaṃ desanāvasena ^b^nibbāpesi^eb^ pariḷāhaṃ vūpasamesīti attho. ^b^tassāhaṃ dhammaṃ sutvānā^eb^ti tassa bhagavato desentassa dhammaṃ sutvā.
[03] 20^b^.^eb^ pañcamāpadāne ^a^V2.0192^ea^ ^b^phalahattho apekkhavā^eb^ti vipassiṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā madhurāni phalāni gahetvā apekkhavā aturito saṇikaṃ assamaṃ gañchinti attho.
[03] chaṭṭhasattamāpadānāni uttānāneva.
[03] 40^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhamāpadāne ^b^niṭṭhite navakamme cā^eb^ti sīmāya navakamme niṭṭhaṃ gate sati. ^b^anulepamadāsaha^eb^nti anupacchā sudhālepaṃ adāsiṃ, sudhāya lepāpesinti attho.
[03] navamadasamāpadānāni uttānāniyevāti.
[06] ekatiṃsamavaggavaṇṇanā samattā.
[03] bāttiṃsatimavagge ^a^V2.0193^ea^ paṭhamadutiyatatiyāpadānāni suviññeyyāneva.
[03] 16^b^.^eb^ catutthāpadāne ^b^jalajaggehi okiri^eb^nti jalajehi uttamehi uppalapadumādīhi pupphehi okiriṃ pūjesinti attho.
[03] pañcamāpadānaṃ uttānameva.

[03] 26-27^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhāpadāne ^b^cetiyaṃ uttamaṃ nāma, sikhino lokabandhuno^eb^ti sakalalokattayassa bandhuno ñātakassa sikhissa bhagavato uttamaṃ cetiyaṃ. ^b^irīṇe^eb^ janasañcaravirahite ^b^vane^eb^ manussānaṃ kolāhalavirahite mahāaraññe ahosīti sambandho. ^b^andhāhiṇḍāmahaṃ tadā^eb^ti tasmiṃ kāle vane maggamūḷhabhāvena andho, na cakkhunā ^a^M2.0198^ea^ andho, ahaṃ āhiṇḍāmi maggaṃ pariyesāmīti attho. ^b^pavanā nikkhamantenā^eb^ti mahāvanato nikkhamantena mayā ^b^sīhāsanaṃ^eb^ uttamāsanaṃ, sīhassa vā bhagavato āsanaṃ diṭṭhanti attho. ^b^ekaṃsaṃ añjaliṃ katvā^eb^ti ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ katvā sirasi añjaliṃ ṭhapetvāti attho. ^b^santhaviṃ lokanāyaka^eb^nti sakalalokattayanayaṃ taṃ nibbānaṃ pāpentaṃ thomitaṃ thutiṃ akāsinti attho.

[03] 34^b^.^eb^ sattamāpadāne ^a^P0.0477^ea^ ^b^sudassano mahāvīro^eb^ti sundaradassano dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇasampannasarīrattā manoharadassano mahāvīriyo siddhattho bhagavāti sambandho. ^b^vasatigharamuttame^eb^ti uttame vihāre vasatīti attho.
[03] aṭṭhamanavamadasamāpadānāni uttānānevāti.
[06] bāttiṃsatimavaggavaṇṇanā samattā.
[03] tettiṃsatime ^a^V2.0194^ea^ vagge paṭhamadutiyatatiyacatutthapañcamachaṭṭhāpadānāni uttānāniyeva.
[03] 55^b^.^eb^ sattamāpadāne ^b^samayaṃ agamāsaha^eb^nti samūhaṃ samāgamaṭṭhānaṃ ahaṃ agamāsinti attho.

[03] 62^b^.^eb^ ^b^abbudanirabbudānī^eb^ti ``pakoṭisatasahassānaṃ sataṃ abbudaṃ, abbudasatasahassānaṃ sataṃ nirabbuda''nti vuttattā āyunā abbudanirabbudāni gatamahāāyuvantā ^b^manujādhipā^eb^ cakkavattino khattiyā aṭṭha aṭṭha hutvā kappānaṃ pañcavīsasahassamhi ^b^āsiṃsu^eb^ ahesunti attho. aṭṭhamanavamadasamāpadānāni pākaṭānevāti.
[06] tettiṃsatimavaggavaṇṇanā samattā.
[03] catutiṃsatimavaggapañcatiṃsatimavaggachattiṃsatimavaggasattatiṃsatimavaggāṭṭhatiṃsatimavaggā ^a^M2.0199^ea^ ^a^V2.0195^ea^ uttānatthāyeva.
[03] ekūnacattālīsamavaggepi paṭhamāpadānādīni aṭṭhamāpadānantāni uttānānevāti.

[03] navamāpadāne ^a^V2.0196^ea^ pana ^b^vipassino pāvacane^eb^tiādikaṃ āyasmato soṇassa koṭivīsattherassa apadānaṃ. ayampi thero purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato kāle mahāvibhave seṭṭhikule nibbatto vuddhippatto seṭṭhi hutvā upāsakehi saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pasannamānaso ^a^P0.0478^ea^ bhagavato caṅkamanaṭṭhāne sudhāya parikammaṃ kāretvā ekañca leṇaṃ kāretvā nānāvirāgavatthehi leṇabhūmiyā santharitvā upari vitānañca katvā cātuddisassa saṅghassa niyyādetvā sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā paṇidhānaṃ akāsi. satthā anumodanaṃ akāsi. so tena kusalakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ kappe parinibbute kassapadasabale anuppanne amhākaṃ bhagavati bārāṇasiyaṃ kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto gaṅgātīre paṇṇasālaṃ karitvā vasantaṃ ekaṃ paccekabuddhaṃ temāsaṃ catūhi paccayehi sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhahi. paccekabuddho vuṭṭhavasso paripuṇṇaparikkhāro gandhamādanameva agamāsi. sopi kulaputto yāvajīvaṃ tattha puññāni katvā tato cavitvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle campānagare aggaseṭṭhissa gehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. tassa paṭisandhiggahaṇakālato paṭṭhāya seṭṭhissa mahābhogakkhandho abhivaḍḍhi. tassa mātukucchito nikkhamanadivase sakalanagare mahālābhasakkārasammāno ahosi, tassa pubbe paccekabuddhassa satasahassagghanikarattakambalapariccāgena suvaṇṇavaṇṇo sukhumālataro ca attabhāvo ahosi, tenassa ^b^soṇo^eb^ti nāmaṃ akaṃsu. so ^a^M2.0200^ea^ mahatā parivārena abhivaḍḍhi. tassa hatthapādatalāni bandhujīvakapupphavaṇṇāni ahesuṃ, tesaṃ satavāraṃ vihatakappāsaṃ viya mudusamphasso ahosi. pādatalesu maṇikuṇḍalāvaṭṭavaṇṇalomāni jāyiṃsu. vayappattassa tassa tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ anucchavike tayo pāsāde kārāpetvā nāṭakitthiyo upaṭṭhāpesuṃ. so tattha mahatiṃ sampattiṃ anubhavanto devakumāro viya paṭivasati.

[03] atha amhākaṃ bhagavati sabbaññutaṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakke rājagahaṃ upanissāya viharante bimbisāraraññā pakkosāpito tehi asītiyā gāmikasahassehi saddhiṃ rājagahaṃ āgato satthu ^a^V2.0197^ea^ santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho mātāpitaro anujānāpetvā bhagavato santike pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā janasaṃsaggapariharaṇatthaṃ ^a^P0.0479^ea^ sītavane vihāsi. so tattha vasanto ``mama sarīraṃ sukhumālaṃ, na ca sakkā sukheneva sukhaṃ adhigantuṃ, kāyaṃ kilametvāpi samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī''ti cintetvā ṭhānacaṅkamameva adhiṭṭhāya padhānamanuyuñjanto pādatalesu phoṭesu uṭṭhitesupi vedanaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā daḷhaṃ vīriyaṃ karonto accāraddhavīriyatāya visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ asakkonto ``evaṃ ahaṃ vāyamantopi maggaphalāni nibbattetuṃ na sakkomi, kiṃ me pabbajjāya, hīnāyāvattitvā bhoge ca bhuñjāmi, puññāni ca karissāmī''ti cintesi. atha satthā tassa cittācāraṃ ñatvā tattha gantvā vīṇopamovādena (mahāva0 243) ovaditvā vīriyasamatāyojanavidhiṃ dassento kammaṭṭhānaṃ sodhetvā gijjhakūṭaṃ gato. soṇopi kho satthu santikā ovādaṃ labhitvā vīriyasamataṃ yojetvā vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahatte patiṭṭhāsi.

[03] 49^b^.^eb^ so arahā hutvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento ^b^vipassino pāvacane^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^vipassī^eb^ti visesena, vividhaṃ vā passatīti vipassī. ^b^pāvacane^eb^ti pakārena vuccatīti pāvacanaṃ, piṭakattayaṃ. tassa vipassino tasmiṃ pāvacaneti attho. ^b^leṇa^eb^nti linante nilīyante etthāti leṇaṃ vihāraṃ. ^b^bandhumārājadhāniyā^eb^ti bandhanti kulaparamparāya vasena aññamaññaṃ sambajjhantīti bandhū, ñātakā. te ettha paṭivasantīti bandhumā, bandhu assa atthīti ^a^M2.0201^ea^ vā bandhumā. rājūnaṃ vasanaṭṭhānanti rājadhānī, bandhumā ca sā rājadhānī ceti bandhumārājadhānī, tassā bandhumārājadhāniyā, leṇaṃ mayā katanti sambandho. sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.
[06] soṇakoṭivīsattherāpadānavaṇṇanā samattā.

[03] 64^b^.^eb^ dasamāpadāne ^b^anotattasarāsanne^eb^ti pabbatakūṭehi paṭicchannattā candimasūriyānaṃ santāpehi otattaṃ uṇhaṃ udakaṃ ettha natthīti anotatto. saranti gacchanti pabhavanti sandanti etasmā mahānadiyoti saro. sīhamukhādīhi nikkhantā mahānadiyo tikkhattuṃ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā nikkhantanikkhantadisābhāgena saranti gacchantīti attho. anotatto ca so saro ^a^V2.0198^ea^ cāti anotattasaro ^a^P0.0480^ea^. tassa āsannaṃ samīpaṭṭhānanti anotattasarāsannaṃ, tasmiṃ anotattasarāsanne, samīpeti attho. ^b^ramaṇīye^eb^ti devadānavagandhabbakinnaroragabuddhapaccekabuddhādīhi ramitabbaṃ allīyitabbanti ramaṇīyaṃ, tasmiṃ ramaṇīye. ^b^silātale^eb^ti ekagghanapabbatasilātaleti attho. ^b^nānāratanapajjote^eb^ti padumarāgaveḷuriyādinānāanekehi ratanehi pajjote pakārena jotamāne. ^b^nānāgandhavanantare^eb^ti nānappakārehi candanāgarukappūratamālatilakāsokanāgapunnāgaketakādīhi anekehi sugandhapupphehi gahanībhūtavanantare silātaleti sambandho.

[03] 65^b^.^eb^ guṇamahantatāya saṅkhyāmahantatāya ca ^b^mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena, pareto^eb^ parivuto ^b^lokanāyako^eb^ lokattayasāmisammāsambuddho tattha silāsane nisinno attano pubbāni kammāni ^b^byākarī^eb^ visesena pākaṭamakāsīti attho. sesamettha heṭṭhā buddhāpadāne (apa0 thera 1.1.1 ādayo) vuttattā uttānatthattā ca suviññeyyameva. buddhāpadāne antogadhampi idhāpadāne kusalākusalaṃ kammasaṃsūcakattā vaggasaṅgahavasena dhammasaṅgāhakattherā saṅgāyiṃsūti.
[06] pubbakammapilotikabuddhāpadānavaṇṇanā samattā.
[06] ekūnacattālīsamavaggavaṇṇanā samattā.

[03] cattālīsamavagge ^a^M2.0202^ea^ ^a^V2.0199^ea^ apadāne ^b^nagare haṃsavatiyā^eb^tiādikaṃ āyasmato pilindavacchattherassa apadānaṃ. ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare dovārikakule nibbatto mahaddhano mahābhogo ahosi. so koṭisannicitadhanarāsiṃ oloketvā raho nisinno ``imaṃ sabbadhanaṃ mayā sammā gahetvā gantuṃ vaṭṭatī''ti cintetvā ``buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa sabbaparikkhāradānaṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭatī''ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā chattasatasahassaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbaparibhogaparikkhārānipi satasahassavasena kāretvā padumuttaraṃ bhagavantaṃ nimantetvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ adāsi. evaṃ sattāhaṃ dānaṃ datvā pariyosānadivase nibbānādhigamaṃ patthetvā yāvajīvaṃ puññāni katvā ^a^P0.0481^ea^ jīvitapariyosāne devaloke nibbatto cha kāmāvacare dibbasampattiyo anubhavitvā manussesu ca cakkavattiādisampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde brāhmaṇakule nibbatto sabbasippesu nipphattiṃ patto gottavasena ^b^pilindavaccho^eb^ti pākaṭo ahosi.

[03] 1^b^.^eb^ so ekadivasaṃ satthu santike dhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā hutvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto udānavasena taṃ pakāsento ^b^nagare haṃsavatiyā^eb^tiādimāha. tassattho heṭṭhā vuttova. ^b^āsiṃ dovāriko aha^eb^nti ahaṃ haṃsavatīnagare rañño gehadvāre dvārapālako āsiṃ ahosinti attho. ^b^akkhobhaṃ amitaṃ bhoga^eb^nti rañño vallabhattā aññehi khobhetuṃ cāletuṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ amitaṃ aparimāṇabhogaṃ dhanaṃ mama ghare ^b^sannicitaṃ^eb^ rāsīkataṃ ahosīti attho.

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ ^b^bahū medhigatā bhogā^eb^ti anekā bhogā me mayā adhigatā pattā paṭiladdhāti attho ^a^V2.0200^ea^. satthavāsiādīnaṃ parikkhārānaṃ nāmāni nayānuyogena suviññeyyāni. parikkhāradānānisaṃsāni ca suviññeyyānevāti.
[06] pilindavacchattherāpadānavaṇṇanā samattā.
[03] dutiyatatiyacatutthapañcamāpadānāni uttānānevāti.

[03] chaṭṭhāpadāne ^a^M2.0203^ea^ ^b^himavantassāvidūre^eb^tiādikaṃ bākulattherassa apadānaṃ. ayaṃ kira thero atīte ito kappasatasahassādhikassa asaṅkhyeyyassa matthake anomadassissa bhagavato uppattito puretarameva brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā vayappatto tayo vede uggaṇhitvā tattha sāraṃ apassanto ``samparāyikatthaṃ gavesissāmī''ti isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā pabbatapāde viharanto pañcābhiññāaṭṭhasamāpattīnaṃ lābhī hutvā viharanto buddhuppādaṃ sutvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā saraṇesu patiṭṭhito satthu vātābādhe uppanne araññato bhesajjāni ānetvā taṃ vūpasametvā taṃ puññaṃ ārogyatthāya pariṇāmetvā tato cuto brahmaloke nibbatto ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaranto padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatīnagare ekasmiṃ kule nibbatto viññutaṃ patvā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā ^a^P0.0482^ea^ satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ appābādhānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā sayaṃ taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ ākaṅkhanto paṇidhānaṃ katvā yāvajīvaṃ kusalakammaṃ upacinitvā sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto vipassissa bhagavato uppattito puretarameva bandhumatīnagare brāhmaṇakule nibbatto sabbasippesu nipphattiṃ patto tattha sāraṃ apassanto isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā jhānābhiññālābhī hutvā pabbatapāde vasanto buddhuppādaṃ sutvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya bhikkhūnaṃ tiṇapupphakaroge uppanne taṃ vūpasametvā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cuto brahmaloke nibbattitvā tato ekanavutikappe devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassapassa bhagavato kāle bārāṇasiyaṃ kulagehe nibbattitvā gharāvāsaṃ vasanto ekaṃ jiṇṇaṃ vinassamānaṃ mahāvihāraṃ disvā tattha uposathāgārādikaṃ sabbaṃ āvasathaṃ kārāpetvā tattha bhikkhusaṅghassa sabbaṃ bhesajjaṃ paṭiyādetvā yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devamanussesu saṃsaranto amhākaṃ bhagavato uppattito puretarameva kosambiyaṃ seṭṭhikule nibbatti.

[03] so ^a^V2.0201^ea^ mātukucchito nikkhamitvā dhātīhi arogabhāvāya yamunāyaṃ nhāpiyamāno tāsaṃ hatthato muccitvā macchena gilito ahosi. kevaṭṭā taṃ macchaṃ jālāya gahetvā bārāṇasiyaṃ seṭṭhibhariyāya vikkiṇiṃsu. sā taṃ gahetvā phālayamānā pubbe katapuññaphalena arogaṃ ^a^M2.0204^ea^ dārakaṃ disvā ``putto me laddho''ti gahetvā posesi. so janakehi mātāpitūhi taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā āgantvā ``ayaṃ amhākaṃ putto, detha no putta''nti anuyoge kate raññā ``ubhayesampi sādhāraṇo hotū''ti dvinnaṃ kulānaṃ dāyādabhāvena vinicchayaṃ katvā ṭhapitattā ^b^bākulo^eb^ti laddhanāmo vayappatto mahāsampattiṃ anubhavanto dvīsu seṭṭhikulesu ekekasmiṃ chamāsaṃ chamāsaṃ vasati. te attano vāre sampatte nāvāsaṅghāṭaṃ bandhitvā tatrūpari ratanamaṇḍapaṃ kāretvā pañcaṅgikatūriye nipphādetvā kumāraṃ tattha nisīdāpetvā ubhayanagaramajjhaṭṭhānaṃ gaṅgāya āgacchanti, aparaseṭṭhimanussāpi evameva sajjetvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ gantvā kumāraṃ tattha āropetvā gacchanti. so evaṃ vaḍḍhamāno āsītiko hutvā ^b^ubhayaseṭṭhiputto^eb^ti pākaṭo. satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā sattāhaṃ vāyamanto aṭṭhame divase saha paṭisambhidāya arahattaṃ ^a^P0.0483^ea^ pāpuṇi.

[03] 386^b^.^eb^ so arahā hutvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento ^b^himavantassāvidūre^eb^tiādimāha. tassattho heṭṭhā vuttova. apadānapāḷiatthopi suviññeyyova. so arahattaṃ patvā vimuttisukhena viharanto saṭṭhivassasatāyuko hutvā parinibbāyīti.
[06] bākulattherāpadānavaṇṇanā samattā.

[03] sattamāpadāne ^b^bhariyā me kālaṅkatā^eb^tiādikaṃ āyasmato girimānandattherassa apadānaṃ. ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto sumedhassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto vayappatto gharāvāsaṃ saṇṭhapetvā vasanto attano bhariyāya ca putte ca kālaṅkate sokasallasamappito araññaṃ pavisitvā pavattaphalabhojano rukkhamūle vihāsi. tadā sumedho bhagavā tassānukampāya tattha gantvā dhammaṃ desetvā sokasallaṃ abbūḷhesi ^a^V2.0202^ea^. so dhammaṃ sutvā pasannamānaso sugandhapupphehi bhagavantaṃ pūjetvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā sirasi añjaliṃ katvā abhitthavi.

[03] so ^a^M2.0205^ea^ tena puññena devamanussesu saṃsaranto ubhayattha sukhaṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe bimbisārarañño purohitassa putto hutvā nibbatti, ^b^girimānando^eb^tissa nāmaṃ ahosi. so viññutaṃ patvā satthu rājagahāgamane buddhānubhāvaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karonto katipayaṃ divasaṃ gāmakāvāse vasitvā satthāraṃ vandituṃ rājagahaṃ agamāsi. bimbisāramahārājā tassa āgamanaṃ sutvā taṃ upasaṅkamitvā ``idheva, bhante, vasatha, ahaṃ catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahāmī''ti sampavāretvā gatopi bahukiccattā taṃ na sari. ``thero abbhokāseyeva vasatī''ti. devatā therassa temanabhayena vassadhāraṃ vāresuṃ. rājā avassanakāraṇaṃ upadhāretvā ñatvā therassa kuṭikaṃ kārāpesi. thero kuṭikāyaṃ vasanto senāsanasappāyalābhena cittasamādhānaṃ labhitvā vīriyasamataṃ yojetvā vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.

[03] 419^b^.^eb^ so arahattaṃ patvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā sañjātasomanasso pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento ^b^bhariyā me kālaṅkatā^eb^tiādimāha. taṃ bhagavato nivedanañca bhagavatā katānusāsanañca maggaṃ phalādhigamāpadānañca pāṭhānusārena suviññeyyamevāti.
[06] girimānandattherāpadānavaṇṇanā samattā.
[03] aṭṭhamanavamadasamāpadānāni ^a^P0.0484^ea^ uttānatthānevāti.
[06] cattālīsamavaggavaṇṇanā samattā.

[03] 1^b^.^eb^ ekacattālīsame ^a^V2.0203^ea^ vagge paṭhamāpadāne ^b^pabbhārakūṭaṃ nissāyā^eb^tiādikaṃ tissametteyyattherassa apadānaṃ. tattha tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā padumuttarassa bhagavato ajinacammaṃ nisīdanatthāya dinnameva nānaṃ. sesaṃ apadānapāḷiyā suviññeyyamevāti.

[03] 29^b^.^eb^ dutiyāpadāne ^a^M2.0206^ea^ ^b^pabbhārakūṭaṃ nissāyā^eb^tiādikaṃ āyasmato puṇṇakattherassa apadānaṃ. tattha himavante yakkhasenāpati hutvā parinibbutassa paccekabuddhassa āḷahanakaraṇameva nānattaṃ. sesaṃ pāṭhānusārena suviññeyyameva.

[03] 45^b^.^eb^ tatiyāpadāne ^b^himavantassāvidūre^eb^tiādikaṃ āyasmato mettaguttherassa apadānaṃ. tattha himavantasamīpe asokapabbate so tāpaso hutvā paṇṇasālāyaṃ vasanto sumedhasambuddhaṃ disvā pattaṃ gahetvā sappipūraṇaṃ viseso. sesaṃ puññaphalāni ca suviññeyyāneva. apadānagāthānaṃ attho ca pākaṭoyeva.

[03] 72^b^.^eb^ catutthāpadāne ^b^gaṅgā bhāgīrathī nāmā^eb^tiādikaṃ āyasmato dhotakattherassa apadānaṃ. tatrāpi brāhmaṇo hutvā bhāgīrathīgaṅgāya taramāne bhikkhū disvā pasannamānaso setuṃ kārāpetvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa niyyāditabhāvoyeva viseso. puññaphalaparidīpanagāthānaṃ attho nayānusārena suviññeyyova.

[03] 100^b^.^eb^ pañcamāpadāne ^b^himavantassāvidūre^eb^tiādikaṃ āyasmato upasivattherassa apadānaṃ. ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto gharāvāsaṃ pahāya isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā ^a^V2.0204^ea^ himavante padumuttaraṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā tiṇasantharaṃ santharitvā tattha nisinnassa bhagavato sālapupphapūjaṃ akāsīti ayaṃ viseso, sesamuttānameva.

[03] 161^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhāpadāne ^b^migaluddo pure āsi^eb^ntiādikaṃ āyasmato nandakattherassa apadānaṃ. ayaṃ kira padumuttarassa bhagavato ^a^P0.0485^ea^ kāle karavikasakuṇo hutvā madhurakūjitaṃ karonto satthāraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ akāsi. aparabhāge mayūro hutvā aññatarassa paccekabuddhassa vasanaguhādvāre pasannamānaso divasassa tikkhattuṃ madhurena vassitaṃ vassi. evaṃ tattha tattha bhave puññāni katvā amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle sāvatthiyaṃ kulagehe nibbatto ^b^nandako^eb^ti laddhanāmo satthu santike dhammaṃ ^a^M2.0207^ea^ sutvā pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. so aparabhāge attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento ^b^migaluddo pure āsi^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha paccekabuddhassa maṇḍapaṃ katvā padumapupphehi chadanameva viseso.

[03] 183^b^.^eb^ sattamāpadāne ^b^pabbhārakūṭaṃ nissāyā^eb^tiādikaṃ āyasmato hemakattherassa apadānaṃ. tatthāpi isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā himavante vasanto piyadassiṃ bhagavantaṃ upagataṃ disvā ratanamayaṃ pīṭhaṃ attharitvā aṭṭhāsi. tattha nisinnassa kumbhamattaṃ jambuphalaṃ āharitvā adāsi. bhagavā tassa cittappasādatthāya taṃ phalaṃ paribhuñji. ettakameva viseso.

[03] 224^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhamāpadāne ^b^rājāsi vijayo nāmā^eb^tiādikaṃ āyasmato todeyyattherassa apadānaṃ. tattha ^b^rājāsi vijayo nāmā^eb^ti daharakālato paṭṭhāya sabbasaṅgāmesu jinato, catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi janaṃ rañjanato allīyanato vijayo nāma rājā ahosīti attho. ^b^ketumatīpuruttame^eb^ti ketu vuccanti dhajapaṭākā. atha vā nagarasobhanatthāya nagaramajjhe ussāpitaratanatoraṇāni, te ketū niccaṃ ussāpitā sobhayamānā assā atthīti ketumatī. pūreti dhanadhaññehi sabbajanānaṃ mananti puraṃ. ketumatī ca sā purañca seṭṭhaṭṭhena uttamañceti ketumatīpuruttamaṃ, tasmiṃ ketumatīpuruttame. ^b^sūro vikkamasampanno^eb^ti abhīto vīriyasampanno vijayo nāma rājā ajjhāvasīti sambandho. itthaṃ ^a^P0.0486^ea^ bhūtaṃ purañca sabbavatthuvāhanañca chaḍḍetvā himavantaṃ pavisitvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā vasanto sumedhabhagavantaṃ disvā somanassaṃ uppādetvā candanena pūjākaraṇameva viseso.

[03] 276^b^.^eb^ navamāpadāne ^b^nagare haṃsavatiyā^eb^tiādikaṃ āyasmato jatukaṇṇittherassa apadānaṃ ^a^V2.0205^ea^. tattha seṭṭhiputto hutvā suvaṇṇapāsāde vasanabhāvo ca pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samaṅgī hutvā vasanabhāvo ca sabbadesavāsīnaṃ sabbasippaviññūnañca āgantvā sevanabhāvo ca viseso.

[03] 330^b^.^eb^ dasamāpadāne ^b^himavantassāvidūre^eb^tiādikaṃ āyasmato udenattherassa apadānaṃ. tattha himavantasamīpe padumapabbataṃ nissāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ ^a^M2.0208^ea^ pabbajitvā vasantena padumuttarassa bhagavato padumapupphaṃ gahetvā pūjitabhāvova viseso. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
[06] ekacattālīsamavaggavaṇṇanā samattā.
[03] bācattālīsamavagge ^a^V2.0206^ea^ paṭhamāpadānañca dutiyāpadānañca tatiyāpadānañca nayānusārena suviññeyyameva.

[03] 106^b^.^eb^ catutthāpadāne ^b^nagare bandhumatiyā^eb^tiādikaṃ āyasmato madhumaṃsadāyakattherassa apadānaṃ. tattha ^b^sūkariko^eb^ti sūkaramaṃsaṃ vikkiṇitvā jīvikaṃ kappento. ^b^ukkoṭakaṃ randhayitvā^eb^ti pihakapapphāsamaṃsaṃ pacitvā madhumaṃsamhi ^b^okiriṃ^eb^ pakkhipiṃ. tena maṃsena pattaṃ pūretvā bhikkhusaṅghassa datvā tena puññakammena imasmiṃ buddhuppāde arahattaṃ pāpuṇinti attho.

[03] nāgapallavattherassa pañcamāpadānampi ekadīpiyattherassa chaṭṭhāpadānampi ucchaṅgapupphiyattherassa sattamāpadānampi yāgudāyakattherassa aṭṭhamāpadānampi patthodanadāyakattherassa navamāpadānampi mañcadāyakattherassa dasamāpadānampi sabbaṃ suviññeyyamevāti.
[06] bācattālīsamavaggavaṇṇanā samattā.
[03] tecattālīsamavagge ^a^P0.0487^ea^ ^a^V2.0207^ea^ sabbatherāpadānāni uttānāneva. kevalaṃ therānaṃ nāmanānattaṃ puññanānattañca viseso.
[03] catucattālīsame vaggepi sabbāni apadānāni pākaṭāneva. kevalaṃ puññanānattaṃ phalanānattañca viseso.
[03] 1^b^.^eb^ pañcacattālīsamavagge paṭhamāpadāne ^b^kakusandho mahāvīro^eb^tiādikaṃ āyasmato vibhīṭakamiñjiyattherassa apadānaṃ.

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^M2.0209^ea^ ^b^bījamiñjamadāsaha^eb^nti vibhīṭakaphalāni phāletvā bījāni miñjāni gahetvā madhusakkarāhi yojetvā kakusandhassa bhagavato adāsinti attho. dutiyāpadānādīni sabbāni suviññeyyāneva, therānaṃ nāmanānattādīnipi pāṭhānusārena veditabbāni.
[03] 1^b^.^eb^ chacattālīsame vagge paṭhamāpadāne ^b^jagatiṃ kārayiṃ aha^eb^nti uttamabodhirukkhassa samantato āḷindaṃ ahaṃ kārayinti attho. sesāni dutiyāpadānādīni sabbānipi uttānāneva.
[03] sattacattālīsame vagge paṭhamāpadānādīni pāḷianusārena suviññeyyāneva.
[03] aṭṭhacattālīsame vagge paṭhamadutiyāpadānāni uttānāneva.

[03] 30^b^.^eb^ tatiyāpadāne ^b^kosiyo nāma bhagavā^eb^ti kosiyagotte jātattā kosiyo nāma paccekabuddhoti ^a^V2.0208^ea^ attho. ^b^cittakūṭe^eb^ti cittakūṭakelāsakūṭasānukūṭādīsu anotattadahaṃ paṭicchādetvā ṭhitapabbatakūṭesu nānāratanaosadhādīhi vicitte cittakūṭapabbate so paccekabuddho vasīti attho.
[03] catutthapañcamāpadānāni uttānāneva.
[03] 56^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhāpadāne ^b^kusaṭṭhakamadāsaha^eb^nti pakkhikabhattauposathikabhattadhurabhattasalākabhattādīsu kusapaṇṇavasena dātabbaṃ aṭṭhasalākabhattaṃ ahaṃ adāsinti attho.
[03] 61^b^.^eb^ sattamāpadāne ^b^sobhito nāma sambuddho^eb^ti ārohapariṇāhadvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇabyāmappabhādīhi sobhamānasarīrattā sobhito nāma sammāsambuddhoti attho.
[03] 66^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhamāpadāne ^a^P0.0488^ea^ ^b^takkarāyaṃ vasī tadā^eb^ti taṃ dasapuññakiriyavatthuṃ karontā janā paṭivasanti etthāti takkarā, rājadhānī. tissaṃ takkarāyaṃ, tadā vasīti attho.
[03] 72^b^.^eb^ navamāpadāne ^a^M2.0210^ea^ ^b^pānadhiṃ sukataṃ gayhā^eb^ti upāhanayugaṃ sundarākārena nipphāditaṃ gahetvāti attho. dasamāpadānaṃ suviññeyyamevāti.
[06] aṭṭhacattālīsamavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03] ekūnapaññāsamavagge ^a^V2.0209^ea^ paṭhamāpadānaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[03] 14^b^.^eb^ dutiyāpadāne ^b^adhiccuppattikā buddhā^eb^ti adhiccena akāraṇena uppattikā sayambhūtā, aññehi devabrahmamārādīhi upadesadāyakehi rahitā sayambhūñāṇena uppannā jātā pātubhūtāti attho.

[03] 16^b^.^eb^ ^b^odumbarikapupphaṃ vā^eb^ti udumbararukkhe pupphaṃ dullabhaṃ dullabhuppattikaṃ iva. ^b^candamhi sasakaṃ yathā^eb^ti candamaṇḍale sasalekhāya rūpaṃ dullabhaṃ yathā. ^b^vāyasānaṃ yathā khīra^eb^nti kākānaṃ niccaṃ rattindivaṃ khuddāpīḷitabhāvena khīraṃ dullabhaṃ yathā, evaṃ dullabhaṃ lokanāyakaṃ caturāsaṅkhyeyyaṃ vā aṭṭhāsaṅkhyeyyaṃ vā soḷasāsaṅkhyeyyaṃ vā kappasatasahassaṃ pāramiyo pūretvā buddhabhāvato dullabho lokanāyakoti attho.

[03] 30^b^.^eb^ tatiyāpadāne ^b^madhuṃ bhisehi savatī^eb^ti pokkharamadhupadumakesarehi savati paggharati. ^b^khīraṃ sappiṃ muḷālibhī^eb^ti khīrañca sappirasañca padumamuḷālehi ^b^savati^eb^ paggharati. tasmā tadubhayaṃ mama santakaṃ buddho paṭiggaṇhatūti attho.
[03] catutthapañcamachaṭṭhāpadānāni uttānāneva.

[03] 119^b^.^eb^ sattamāpadāne ^b^cattālīsadijāpi cā^eb^ti dvikkhattuṃ jātāti dijā. kumāravaye uṭṭhitadantānaṃ patitattā puna uṭṭhitadantā dijā, te ca dantā. byākaraṇañca heṭṭhā nidānakathāyaṃ vuttameva.
[03] aṭṭhamāpadānaṃ uttānamevāti.

[03] 171^b^.^eb^ navamāpadāne ^a^P0.0489^ea^ ^b^tadāhaṃ māṇavo āsi^eb^nti yadā sumedhapaṇḍito dīpaṅkarabhagavato santikā byākaraṇaṃ labhi, tadā ahaṃ megho nāma brāhmaṇamāṇavo ^a^M2.0211^ea^ hutvā sumedhatāpasena saha isipabbajjaṃ ^a^V2.0210^ea^ pabbajitvā sikkhāpadesu sikkhito kenaci pāpasahāyena saṃsaṭṭho saṃsaggadosena pāpavitakkādivasaṃ gato mātughātakammavasena narake aggijālādidukkhamanubhavitvā tato cuto samudde timiṅgalamahāmaccho hutvā nibbatto, samuddamajjhe gacchantaṃ mahānāvaṃ gilitukāmo gato. disvā maṃ vāṇijā bhītā ``aho gotamo bhagavā''ti saddamakaṃsu. atha mahāmaccho pubbavāsanāvasena buddhagāravaṃ uppādetvā tato cuto sāvatthiyaṃ vibhavasampanne brāhmaṇakule nibbatto saddho pasanno satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pabbajitvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇitvā divasassa tikkhattuṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā saramāno vandati. tadā bhagavā ``ciraṃ dhammarucī''ti maṃ āha.

[03] 184^b^.^eb^ atha so thero ``suciraṃ satapuññalakkhaṇa''ntiādīhi gāthāhi thomesi. bhante, satapuññalakkhaṇadhara gotama. ^b^patipubbena visuddhapaccaya^eb^nti pubbe dīpaṅkarapādamūle paripuṇṇapāramīpaccayasambhāro suṭṭhu ciraṃ kālaṃ mayā na diṭṭho asīti attho. ^b^ahamajjasupekkhana^eb^nti ajja imasmiṃ divase ahaṃ supekkhanaṃ sundaradassanaṃ, sundaradiṭṭhaṃ vā ^b^nirupamaṃ viggahaṃ^eb^ upamārahitasarīraṃ gotamaṃ ^b^vata^eb^ ekantena ^b^passāmi^eb^ dakkhāmīti attho.

[03] 185-186^b^.^eb^ ^b^suciraṃ vihatatamo mayā^eb^ti visesena hatatamo viddhaṃsitamoho tvaṃ mayāpi suṭṭhu ciraṃ thomitoti attho. ^b^sucirakkhena nadī visositā^eb^ti esā taṇhānadī sundararakkhena gopanena visesena sositā, abhabbuppattikatā tayāti attho. ^b^suciraṃ amalaṃ visodhita^eb^nti suṭṭhu ciraṃ dīghena addhunā amalaṃ nibbānaṃ visesena sodhitaṃ, suṭṭhu kataṃ adhigataṃ tayāti attho. ^b^nayanaṃ ñāṇamayaṃ mahāmune. cirakālasamaṅgito^eb^ti mahāmune mahāsamaṇa ñāṇamayaṃ nayanaṃ dibbacakkhuṃ cirakālaṃ samadhigato sampatto tvanti attho. ^b^avinaṭṭho punarantara^eb^nti ahaṃ puna antaraṃ antarābhave majjhe parinaṭṭho ^a^P0.0490^ea^ parihīno ahosinti attho. ^b^punarajjasamāgato tayā^eb^ti ajja imasmiṃ kāle tayā saddhiṃ punapi samāgato ekībhūto saha vasāmīti attho. ^b^na hi nassanti katāni gotamā^eb^ti gotama sabbaññubuddha, tayā saddhiṃ katāni samāgamādīni ^a^M2.0212^ea^ na hi nassanti yāva khandhaparinibbānā na vinā bhavissantīti attho. sesaṃ uttānamevāti.
[06] dhammaruciyattherāpadānavaṇṇanā samattā.
[03] dasamāpadānaṃ suviññeyyamevāti.
[06] ekūnapaññāsamavaggavaṇṇanā samattā.
[03] paññāsamavagge ^a^V2.0211^ea^ ca ekapaññāsamavagge ca dvepaññāsamavagge ca tepaññāsamavagge ca sabbāni apadānāni uttānānevāti.

[03] catupaññāsamavagge ^a^V2.0212^ea^ paṭhamāpadāne ^b^padumuttaro nāma jino^eb^tiādikaṃ āyasmato mahākaccāyanattherassa apadānaṃ. ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle gahapatimahāsālakule nibbattitvā vuddhippatto ekadivasaṃ satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇanto satthārā saṃkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajantānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapiyamānaṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā sayampi taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthento paṇidhānaṃ katvā dānādīni puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto sumedhassa bhagavato kāle vijjādharo hutvā ākāsena gacchanto ekasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe nisinnaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso kaṇikārapupphehi pūjaṃ akāsi.

[03] so tena puññena aparāparaṃ sugatīsuyeva parivattento kassapadasabalassa kāle bārāṇasiyaṃ kulagehe nibbattitvā parinibbute bhagavati suvaṇṇacetiyakammaṭṭhāne satasahassagghanikāya suvaṇṇiṭṭhakāya pūjaṃ katvā ``imassa nissandena nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne sarīraṃ me suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ hotū''ti ^a^M2.0213^ea^ patthanaṃ akāsi. tato yāvajīvaṃ kusalakammaṃ katvā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devamanussesu saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ujjeniyaṃ rañño caṇḍapajjotassa purohitagehe nibbatti, tassa nāmaggahaṇadivase mātā ``mayhaṃ ^a^P0.0491^ea^ putto suvaṇṇavaṇṇo, attano nāmaṃ gahetvā āgato''ti ^b^kañcanamāṇavo^eb^tveva nāmaṃ akāsi. so vuddhimanvāya tayo vede uggaṇhitvā pitu accayena purohitaṭṭhānaṃ labhi. so gottavasena ^b^kaccāyano^eb^ti paññāyittha. atha rājā caṇḍapajjoto buddhuppādaṃ sutvā, ``ācariya, tumhe tattha gantvā satthāraṃ idhānethā''ti pesesi. so attaṭṭhamo satthu santikaṃ upagato tassa satthā dhammaṃ desesi, desanāpariyosāne sattahi janehi saddhiṃ saha paṭisambhidāhi arahatte patiṭṭhāsi.

[03] 1^b^.^eb^ so evaṃ pattārahattaphalo attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ ^a^V2.0213^ea^ pakāsento ^b^padumuttaro nāma jino^eb^tiādimāha. taṃ heṭṭhā vuttatthameva. atha satthā ``etha, bhikkhavo''ti hatthaṃ pasāresi. te tāvadeva dvaṅgulamattakesamassuiddhimayapattacīvaradharā vassasaṭṭhikattherā viya ahesuṃ. evaṃ thero sadatthaṃ nipphādetvā, ``bhante, rājā pajjoto tumhākaṃ pāde vandituṃ dhammañca sotuṃ icchatī''ti ārocesi. satthā ``tvaṃyeva, kaccāna, tattha gaccha, tayi gate rājā pasīdissatī''ti āha. thero satthu āṇāya attaṭṭhamo tattha gantvā rājānaṃ pasādetvā avantīsu sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā puna satthu santikameva āgato. attano pubbapatthanāvasena kaccāyanappakaraṇaṃ mahāniruttippakaraṇaṃ nettippakaraṇanti pakaraṇattayaṃ saṅghamajjhe byākāsi. atha santuṭṭhena bhagavatā ``etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ saṃkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajantānaṃ yadidaṃ mahākaccāno''ti (a0 ni0 1.188, 197) etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito aggaphalasukhena vihāsīti.
[06] mahākaccāyanattherāpadānavaṇṇanā samattā.

[03] dutiyāpadāne ^a^M2.0214^ea^ ^b^ito satasahassamhī^eb^tiādikaṃ āyasmato vakkalittherassa apadānaṃ. ayampi thero purimajinavaresu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto satthu santikaṃ gacchantehi upāsakehi saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā parisapariyante ṭhito dhammaṃ suṇanto satthārā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ ^a^P0.0492^ea^ saddhādhimuttānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitaṃ disvā sayampi taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthento sattāhaṃ buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā paṇidhānaṃ akāsi. satthā tassa anantarāyaṃ disvā byākari.

[03] so yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbatti, tassa ^b^vakkalī^eb^ti nāmaṃ kariṃsu. tattha ^b^kalī^eb^ti aparādhatilakāḷakādidosassa adhivacanaṃ. niddhantasuvaṇṇapiṇḍasadisatāya apagato byapagato kali doso assāti va-kārāgamaṃ katvā vakkalīti vuccati. so vuddhippatto tayo vede uggaṇhitvā brāhmaṇasippesu nipphattiṃ gato, satthāraṃ disvā rūpakāyasampattidassanena atitto satthārā saddhiṃyeva vicarati. ``agāramajjhe vasanto niccakālaṃ satthu dassanaṃ na labhissāmī''ti ^a^V2.0214^ea^ satthu santike pabbajitvā ṭhapetvā bhojanakālaṃ sarīrakiccakālañca sesakāle yattha ṭhitena sakkā dasabalaṃ passituṃ, tattha ṭhito aññaṃ kiccaṃ pahāya bhagavantaṃ olokentoyeva viharati. satthā tassa ñāṇaparipākaṃ āgamento bahukālaṃ tasmiṃ rūpadassaneneva vicarante kiñci avatvā punekadivasaṃ -- ``kiṃ te, vakkali, iminā pūtikāyena diṭṭhena? yo kho, vakkali, dhammaṃ passati, so maṃ passati; yo maṃ passati, so dhammaṃ passati. dhammañhi, vakkali, passanto maṃ passatī''ti (saṃ0 ni0 3.87) āha. satthari evaṃ vadantepi thero satthu dassanaṃ pahāya aññattha gantuṃ na sakkoti. tato satthā, ``nāyaṃ bhikkhu saṃvegaṃ alabhitvā bujjhissatī''ti vassūpanāyikadivase -- ``apehi, vakkalī''ti theraṃ paṇāmesi. so satthārā paṇāmito satthu sammukhe ṭhātuṃ asakkonto -- ``kiṃ mayhaṃ jīvitena, yohaṃ satthāraṃ daṭṭhuṃ na labhāmī''ti gijjhakūṭe pabbate papātaṭṭhānaṃ ^a^M2.0215^ea^ abhiruhi? satthā tassa taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā -- ``ayaṃ bhikkhu mama santikā assāsaṃ alabhanto maggaphalānaṃ upanissayaṃ nāseyyā''ti attānaṃ dassetvā obhāsaṃ vissajjento --
[21] ``pāmojjabahulo bhikkhu, pasanno buddhasāsane.
[22] adhigacche padaṃ santaṃ, saṅkhārūpasamaṃ sukha''nti.. (dha0 pa0 381) --

[25] gāthaṃ vatvā ``ehi, vakkalī''ti (dha0 pa0 aṭṭha0 2.381) hatthaṃ pasāresi. thero ``dasabalo me diṭṭho, `ehī'ti avhāyanampi laddha''nti balavapītisomanassaṃ uppādetvā ``kuto gacchāmī''ti attano gamanabhāvaṃ ajānitvāva satthu sammukhe ^a^P0.0493^ea^ ākāse pakkhanditvā paṭhamena pādena pabbate ṭhitoyeva satthārā vuttagāthāyo āvajjento ākāseyeva pītiṃ vikkhambhetvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇīti aṅguttaraṭṭhakathāyaṃ (a0 ni0 aṭṭha0 1.1.208) dhammapadavaṇṇanāyañca (dha0 pa0 aṭṭha0 2.381 vakkalittheravatthu) āgataṃ.

[03] idha pana evaṃ veditabbaṃ -- ``kiṃ te, vakkalī''tiādinā satthārā ovadito gijjhakūṭe viharanto vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapesi, tassa saddhāya balavabhāvato eva vipassanā vīthiṃ na otarati? bhagavā taṃ ñatvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ sodhetvā adāsi. so puna vipassanaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetuṃ nāsakkhiyeva. athassa āhāravekallena vātābādho uppajji, taṃ vātābādhena pīḷiyamānaṃ ñatvā bhagavā tattha gantvā pucchanto --
[21] ``vātarogābhinīto ^a^V2.0215^ea^ tvaṃ, viharaṃ kānane vane.
[22] paviddhagocare lūkhe, kathaṃ bhikkhu karissasī''ti.. (theragā0 350) --
[25] āha. taṃ sutvā thero --
[21] ``pītisukhena vipulena, pharamāno samussayaṃ.
[22] lūkhampi abhisambhonto, viharissāmi kānane..
[21] ``bhāvento satipaṭṭhāne, indriyāni balāni ca.
[22] bojjhaṅgāni ca bhāvento, viharissāmi kānane..
[21] ``āraddhavīriye pahitatte, niccaṃ daḷhaparakkame.
[22] samagge sahite disvā, viharissāmi kānane..
[21] ``anussaranto ^a^M2.0216^ea^ sambuddhaṃ, aggaṃ dantaṃ samāhitaṃ.
[22] atandito rattindivaṃ, viharissāmi kānane''ti.. (theragā0 351-354) --
[25] catasso gāthāyo abhāsi. tāsaṃ attho theragāthāvaṇṇanāyaṃ (theragā0 aṭṭha0 2.351-354) vuttoyeva. evaṃ thero vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.

[03] 28^b^.^eb^ so arahattaṃ patvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento ^b^ito satasahassamhī^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^ito^eb^ti kakusandhādīnaṃ uppannabhaddakappato heṭṭhā kappasatasahassamatthaketi attho.
[03] 29^b^.^eb^ ^b^padumākāravadano^eb^ti supupphitapadumasassirīkamukho. ^b^padumapattakkho^eb^ti setapadumapupphapaṇṇasadisākkhīti attho.
[03] 30^b^.^eb^ ^b^padumuttaragandhovā^eb^ti padumagandhamukhoti attho.

[03] 31^b^.^eb^ ^b^andhānaṃ^eb^ ^a^P0.0494^ea^ ^b^nayanūpamo^eb^ti cakkhuvirahitānaṃ sattānaṃ nayanasadiso, dhammadesanāya sabbasattānaṃ ^a^V2.0216^ea^ paññācakkhādicakkhudāyakoti attho. ^b^santaveso^eb^ti santasabhāvo santairiyāpatho. ^b^guṇanidhī^eb^ti guṇānaṃ nidhi, sabbaguṇagaṇānaṃ nidhānaṭṭhānabhūtoti attho. ^b^karuṇāmatiākaro^eb^ti sādhūnaṃ cittakampanasaṅkhātāya karuṇāya ca atthānatthaminanaparicchinnamatiyā ca ākaro ādhārabhūto.
[03] 32^b^.^eb^ ^b^brahmāsurasuraccito^eb^ti brahmehi ca asurehi ca devehi ca accito pūjitoti attho.

[03] 33^b^.^eb^ ^b^madhurena rutena cā^eb^ti karavīkarutamadhurena saddena sakalaṃ janaṃ rañjayantīti sambandho. ^b^santhavī sāvakaṃ saka^eb^nti attano sāvakaṃ madhuradhammadesanāya santhavī, thutiṃ akāsīti attho.
[03] 34^b^.^eb^ ^b^saddhādhimutto^eb^ti saddahanasaddhāya sāsane adhimutto patiṭṭhitoti attho. ^b^mama dassanalālaso^eb^ti mayhaṃ dassane byāvaṭo tapparo.
[03] 35^b^.^eb^ ^b^taṃ^eb^ ^a^M2.0217^ea^ ^b^ṭhānamabhirocayi^eb^nti taṃ saddhādhimuttaṭṭhānantaraṃ abhirocayiṃ, icchiṃ patthesinti attho.
[03] 40^b^.^eb^ ^b^pītamaṭṭhanivāsana^eb^nti siliṭṭhasuvaṇṇavaṇṇavatthe nivatthanti attho. ^b^hemayaññopacitaṅga^eb^nti suvaṇṇapāmaṅgalaggitagattanti attho.

[03] 47-48^b^.^eb^ ^b^nonītasukhumālaṃ ma^eb^nti navanītamiva mudutaluṇahatthapādaṃ. ^b^jātapallavakomala^eb^nti asokapallavapattakomalamiva mudukanti attho. ^b^pisācībhayatajjitā^eb^ti tadā evaṃbhūtaṃ kumāraṃ maṃ aññā pisācī ekā rakkhasī bhayena tajjesi bhiṃsāpesīti attho. tadā ^b^mahesissa^eb^ sammāsambuddhassa pādamūle maṃ ^b^sāyesuṃ^eb^ nipajjāpesuṃ. ^b^dīnamānasā^eb^ bhītacittā mama mātāpitaro ^b^imaṃ^eb^ dārakaṃ te dadāma, imassa ^b^saraṇaṃ^eb^ patiṭṭhā hotu nātha nāyakāti sambandho.

[03] 49^b^.^eb^ ^b^tadā paṭiggahi so ma^eb^nti so bhagavā tadā tasmiṃ mama mātuyā dinnakāle ^b^jālinā^eb^ jālayuttena saṅkhālakena cakkalakkhaṇādīhi ^a^P0.0495^ea^ lakkhitena ^b^mudukomalapāṇinā^eb^ mudukena visuddhena hatthatalena maṃ aggahesīti attho.

[03] 52^b^.^eb^ ^b^sabbapāramisambhūta^eb^nti ^a^V2.0217^ea^ sabbehi dānapāramitādīhi sambhūtaṃ jātaṃ. ^b^nīlakkhinayanaṃ varaṃ^eb^ puññasambhārajaṃ uttamanīlākkhivantaṃ. ^b^sabbasubhākiṇṇaṃ^eb^ sabbena subhena vaṇṇena saṇṭhānena ākiṇṇaṃ gahanībhūtaṃ ^b^rūpaṃ^eb^ bhagavato hatthapādasīsādirūpaṃ disvāti attho, tittiṃ apatto viharāmi ahanti sambandho.

[03] 61^b^.^eb^ ^b^tadā maṃ caraṇantago^eb^ti tasmiṃ mayhaṃ arahattaṃ pattakāle sīlādipannarasannaṃ caraṇadhammānaṃ antago, pariyosānappatto paripūrakārīti attho. ``maraṇantago''tipi pāṭho. tassa maraṇassa antaṃ nibbānaṃ pattoti attho. saddhādhimuttānaṃ aggaṃ paññapesīti sambandho. atha satthā bhikkhusaṅghamajjhe nisinno ``etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ saddhādhimuttānaṃ yadidaṃ, vakkalī''ti (a0 ni0 1.198, 208) maṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti vuttaṃ hoti. sesaṃ suviññeyyamevāti.
[06] vakkalittherāpadānavaṇṇanā samattā.

[03] ^b^padumuttaro^eb^ ^a^M2.0218^ea^ ^b^nāma jino^eb^tiādikaṃ āyasmato kappinattherassa apadānaṃ. ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patvā satthu santike dhammadesanaṃ suṇanto satthārā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ ovādakānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi.

[03] so tattha yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto bārāṇasito avidūre ekasmiṃ pesakāragāme jeṭṭhapesakāragehe nibbatto tadā sahassamattā paccekabuddhā himavante aṭṭha māse vasitvā vassike cattāro māse janapade vasanti. te ekavāraṃ bārāṇasiyā avidūre otaritvā ``senāsanaṃ karaṇatthāya hatthakammaṃ yācathā''ti rañño santikaṃ aṭṭha paccekabuddhe pahiṇiṃsu. tadā pana rañño vappamaṅgalaṃ ahosi. so ``paccekabuddhā ^a^P0.0496^ea^ kira āgatā''ti sutvā nikkhamitvā āgatakāraṇaṃ pucchitvā ``ajja, bhante, okāso natthi sve amhākaṃ vappamaṅgalaṃ ^a^V2.0218^ea^, tatiyadivase karissāmā''ti vatvā paccekabuddhe animantetvāva pāvisi. paccekabuddhā ``aññaṃ gāmaṃ pavisissāmā''ti pakkamiṃsu.

[03] tasmiṃ samaye jeṭṭhapesakārassa bhariyā kenacideva karaṇīyena bārāṇasiṃ gacchantī te paccekabuddhe disvā vanditvā, ``kiṃ, bhante, avelāya ayyā āgatā''ti pucchi. te ādito paṭṭhāya kathesuṃ. taṃ sutvā saddhāsampannā buddhisampannā itthī ``sve, bhante, amhākaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā''ti nimantesi. ``bahukā mayaṃ, bhaginī''ti. ``kittakā, bhante''ti? ``sahassamattā, bhaginī''ti. ``bhante, imasmiṃ no gāme sahassamattā vasimhā, ekeko ekekassa bhikkhaṃ dassati, bhikkhaṃ adhivāsetha, ahameva vo vasanaṭṭhānaṃ kārāpessāmī''ti āha. paccekabuddhā adhivāsesuṃ.

[03] sā gāmaṃ pavisitvā ugghosesi -- ``ammatātā, ahaṃ sahassamatte paccekabuddhe disvā nimantesiṃ, ayyānaṃ nisīdanaṭṭhānaṃ saṃvidahatha, yāgubhattādīni sampādethā''ti gāmamajjhe maṇḍapaṃ kārāpetvā āsanāni paññāpetvā punadivase paccekabuddhe nisīdāpetvā paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena parivisitvā bhattakiccapariyosāne tasmiṃ gāme sabbā itthiyo ^a^M2.0219^ea^ ādāya tāhi saddhiṃ paccekabuddhe vanditvā temāsaṃ vasanatthāya paṭiññaṃ gaṇhitvā puna gāme ugghosesi -- ``ammatātā, ekekakulato ekekapuriso vāsipharasuādīni gahetvā araññaṃ pavisitvā dabbasambhāre āharitvā ayyānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ karotū''ti. gāmavāsino tassāyeva vacanaṃ sutvā ekeko ekekaṃ katvā saddhiṃ rattidivāṭṭhānehi paṇṇasālasahassaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā attano attano paṇṇasālāyaṃ upagataṃ paccekabuddhaṃ ``ahaṃ sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhahissāmi, ahaṃ sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhahissāmī''ti vatvā upaṭṭhahiṃsu. sā vassaṃvuṭṭhakāle ``attano attano paṇṇasālāya vassaṃvuṭṭhānaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ cīvarasāṭake sajjethā''ti samādapetvā ekekassa sahassa sahassamūlaṃ cīvaraṃ dāpesi. paccekabuddhā vuṭṭhavassā anumodanaṃ katvā pakkamiṃsu. gāmavāsinopi idaṃ puññakammaṃ katvā tato cuto tāvatiṃsadevaloke nibbattitvā gaṇadevatā nāma ahesuṃ.

[03] te tattha dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā kassapasammāsambuddhakāle kuṭumbikagehesu nibbattiṃsu. pubbe jeṭṭhakapesakāro jeṭṭhakakuṭumbikassa putto ahosi. bhariyāpissa ekassa jeṭṭhakakuṭumbikassa dhītā ahosi. sesānaṃ bhariyāyo sesakuṭumbikānaṃ dhītaro ^a^P0.0497^ea^ ahesuṃ, tā sabbāpi vayappattā parakulaṃ gacchantiyo tesaṃ tesaṃyeva gehāni agamaṃsu. athekadivasaṃ vihāre dhammassavane saṅghuṭṭhe ``satthā dhammaṃ desessatī''ti sutvā te sabbepi kuṭumbikā ``dhammaṃ sossāmā''ti ^a^V2.0219^ea^ bhariyāhi saddhiṃ vihāraṃ agamaṃsu. tesaṃ vihāramajjhaṃ paviṭṭhakkhaṇe vassaṃ vassi. yesaṃ kulūpakā vā ñātisāmaṇerādayo vā atthi, te tesaṃ pariveṇādīni pavisiṃsu. te pana tathārūpānaṃ natthitāya katthaci pavisituṃ avisahantā vihāramajjheyeva aṭṭhaṃsu. atha ne jeṭṭhakakuṭumbiko āha -- ``passatha, bho, amhākaṃ vippakāraṃ, kulaputtehi nāma ettakena lajjituṃ yutta''nti. ``ayya, kiṃ karomā''ti? ``mayaṃ vissāsikaṭṭhānassa abhāvena imaṃ vippakāraṃ pattā, sabbe dhanaṃ saṃharitvā pariveṇaṃ karissāmā''ti. ``sādhu, ayyā''ti jeṭṭhako sahassaṃ adāsi. sesā pañca pañca satāni. itthiyo aḍḍhateyyāni aḍḍhateyyāni satāni. te taṃ dhanaṃ āharitvā sahassakūṭāgāraparivāraṃ satthu vasanatthāya mahāpariveṇaṃ nāma ^a^M2.0220^ea^ kārāpesuṃ. navakammassa mahantatāya dhane appahonte pubbe dinnadhanato puna upaḍḍhūpaḍḍhaṃ adaṃsu. niṭṭhite pariveṇe vihāramahaṃ karontā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā vīsatiyā bhikkhusahassānaṃ cīvarāni sajjayiṃsu.

[03] jeṭṭhakakuṭumbikassa pana bhariyā attano paññāya ṭhitā ahaṃ tehi samakaṃ akatvā atirekataraṃ katvā ``satthāraṃ pūjessāmī''ti anojapupphavaṇṇena sahassamūlena sāṭakena saddhiṃ anojapupphacaṅkoṭakaṃ gahetvā satthāraṃ anojapupphehi pūjetvā taṃ sāṭakaṃ satthu pādamūle ṭhapetvā, ``bhante, nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne anojapupphavaṇṇaṃyeva me sarīraṃ hotu, anojātveva ca nāmaṃ hotū''ti patthanaṃ akāsi. satthā ``evaṃ hotū''ti anumodanaṃ akāsi. te sabbepi yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cutā devaloke nibbattiṃsu. te imasmiṃ buddhuppāde devalokā cavitvā jeṭṭhako kukkuṭavatīnagare rājakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto mahākappinarājā nāma ahosi. sesā amaccakulesu nibbattiṃsu. jeṭṭhakassa bhariyā maddaraṭṭhe sākalanagare rājakule nibbatti anojapupphavaṇṇamevassā sarīraṃ ahosi, tena ^b^anojā^eb^tvevassā nāmaṃ akaṃsu, sā vayappattā mahākappinarañño gehaṃ gantvā ^b^anojādevī^eb^ti pākaṭā ahosi.

[03] sesitthiyopi amaccakulesu nibbattitvā vayappattā tesaṃyeva amaccaputtānaṃ ^a^P0.0498^ea^ gehāni agamaṃsu. te sabbepi rañño sampattisadisaṃ sampattiṃ anubhaviṃsu. yadā hi rājā alaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍito hatthiṃ abhiruhitvā vicarati, tadāpi te tatheva vicaranti. tasmiṃ assena vā rathena vā vicarante tepi tatheva vicaranti. evaṃ te ekato hutvā katānaṃ puññānaṃ balena ekatova sampattiṃ anubhaviṃsu. rañño pana vālo, vālavāhano, puppho, pupphavāhano, supattoti pañceva assā honti. tesu rājā supattaṃ assaṃ sayaṃ ārohati, itare cattāro asse assārohānaṃ sāsanāharaṇatthāya adāsi. rājā te pātova bhojetvā ``gacchatha ^a^V2.0220^ea^, bhaṇe, dve vā tīṇi vā yojanāni āhiṇḍitvā buddhassa vā dhammassa vā saṅghassa vā uppannabhāvaṃ sutvā mayhaṃ sukhasāsanaṃ ^a^M2.0221^ea^ ārocethā''ti pesesi. te catūhi dvārehi nikkhamitvā dve tīṇi yojanāni āhiṇḍitvā kiñci sāsanaṃ alabhitvāva paccāgamiṃsu.

[03] athekadivasaṃ rājā supattaṃ āruhitvā amaccasahassaparivuto uyyānaṃ gacchanto kilantarūpe pañcasatamatte vāṇijake nagaraṃ pavisante disvā ``ime addhānakilantā, addho imesaṃ santikā ekaṃ bhaddakaṃ sāsanaṃ sossāmī''ti te pakkosāpetvā ``kuto āgatatthā''ti pucchi. ``atthi, deva, ito vīsatiyojanasatamatthake sāvatthi nāma nagaraṃ, tato āgatamhā''ti. ``atthi pana vo dese kiñci sāsanaṃ uppanna''nti. ``deva, aññaṃ kiñci natthi, sammāsambuddho uppanno''ti. rājā tāvadeva balavapītiyā phuṭṭhasarīro kiñci sallakkhetuṃ asakkonto muhuttaṃ vītināmetvā pana, ``tātā, kiṃ vadethā''ti pucchi. ``buddho, deva, uppanno''ti. rājā dutiyampi tatiyampi tatheva vītināmetvā catutthavāre ``kiṃ vadetha, tātā''ti pucchitvā ``buddho uppanno''ti vutte, ``tātā, sukhasāsanasavanāya satasahassaṃ vo dammī''ti vatvā ``aparampi kiñci sāsanaṃ atthi, tātā''ti pucchi. ``atthi, deva, dhammo uppanno''ti. rājā tampi sutvā purimanayeneva tayo vāre vītināmetvā catutthavāre ``dhammo uppanno''ti vutte -- ``idhāpi vo satasahassaṃ dammī''ti vatvā ``aparampi kiñci sāsanaṃ atthi, tātā''ti pucchi. ``atthi, deva, saṅgho uppanno''ti. rājā tampi sutvā tatheva tayo vāre vītināmetvā catutthavāre ``saṅgho uppanno''ti vutte -- ``idhāpi vo satasahassaṃ dammī''ti vatvā amaccasahassaṃ oloketvā, ``tātā, kiṃ karissāmā''ti pucchi. ``deva, tumhe kiṃ karissathā''ti? ``ahaṃ, tātā, `buddho uppanno dhammo uppanno saṅgho uppanno'ti sutvā na puna nivattissāmi, bhagavantaṃ uddissa gantvā tassa santike pabbajissāmī''ti. ``mayampi, deva, tumhehi saddhiṃ pabbajissāmā''ti. rājā suvaṇṇapaṭṭe ^a^P0.0499^ea^ akkharāni likhāpetvā vāṇijakānaṃ datvā ``imaṃ anojāya nāma deviyā detha, sā tumhākaṃ tīṇi satasahassāni dassati, evañca pana naṃ vadeyyātha `raññā kira te issariyaṃ vissaṭṭhaṃ, yathāsukhaṃ sampattiṃ paribhuñjāhī'ti, sace pana `vo rājā kaha'nti pucchati, `satthāraṃ uddissa pabbajissāmī'ti vatvā gatoti āroceyyāthā''ti āha. amaccāpi attano attano bhariyānaṃ tatheva ^a^M2.0222^ea^ sāsanaṃ pahiṇiṃsu. rājā vāṇijake uyyojetvā assaṃ abhiruyha amaccasahassaparivuto taṃkhaṇaññeva nikkhami.

[03] satthāpi taṃdivasaṃ paccūsakāle lokaṃ volokento mahākappinarājānaṃ saparivāraṃ disvā ``ayaṃ ^a^V2.0221^ea^ mahākappino vāṇijakānaṃ santikā tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ uppannabhāvaṃ sutvā tesaṃ vacanaṃ tīhi satasahassehi pūjetvā rajjaṃ pahāya amaccasahassaparivuto maṃ uddissa pabbajitukāmo sve nikkhamissati, so saparivāro saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇissati, paccuggamanaṃ karissāmī''ti punadivase cakkavattī viya khuddakagāmabhojakaṃ rājānaṃ paccuggacchanto sayameva pattacīvaramādāya vīsayojanasataṃ maggaṃ paccuggantvā candabhāgāya nadiyā tīre nigrodharukkhamūle chabbaṇṇabuddharasmiyo vissajjetvā nisīdi. rājāpi āgacchanto ekaṃ nadiṃ patvā ``kā nāmāya''nti pucchi. ``aparacchā nāma, devā''ti. ``kimassā parimāṇaṃ, tātā''ti? ``gambhīrato gāvutaṃ, puthulato dve gāvutāni, devā''ti. ``atthi panettha nāvā vā uḷumpo vā''ti? ``natthi, devā''ti. ``nāvādīni olokente amhe jāti jaraṃ upaneti, jarā maraṇaṃ. ahaṃ nibbematiko hutvā tīṇi ratanāni uddissa nikkhanto, tesaṃ me ānubhāvena `idaṃ udakaṃ udakaṃ viya mā hotū'ti ratanattayassa guṇaṃ āvajjetvā `itipi so bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho'''ti buddhaguṇaṃ anussaranto saparivāro assasahassena udakapiṭṭhe pakkhandi. sindhavā piṭṭhipāsāṇe viya pakkhandiṃsu. khurānaṃ aggaṭṭhāneva temiṃsu.

[03] so taṃ uttaritvā purato gacchanto aparampi nadiṃ disvā ``ayaṃ kā nāmā''ti pucchi. ``nīlavāhā nāma, devā''ti. ``kimassā parimāṇa''nti? ``gambhīratopi puthulatopi aḍḍhayojanaṃ, devā''ti. sesaṃ purimasadisameva. taṃ pana nadiṃ disvā ``svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo''ti dhammānussatiṃ anussaranto pakkhandi. tampi atikkamitvā gacchanto aparampi nadiṃ disvā ``ayaṃ kā nāmā''ti pucchi. ``candabhāgā ^a^P0.0500^ea^ nāma, devā''ti. ``kimassā parimāṇa''nti? ``gambhīratopi puthulatopi yojanaṃ, devā''ti. sesaṃ purimasadisameva. taṃ pana nadiṃ disvā ``suppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho''ti saṅghānussatiṃ anussaranto ^a^M2.0223^ea^ pakkhandi. tampi nadiṃ atikkamitvā gacchanto satthu sarīrato nikkhantā chabbaṇṇabuddharasmiyo nigrodharukkhassa sākhāviṭapapalāsāni obhāsayamānā disvā cintesi -- ``ayaṃ obhāso neva candassa, na sūriyassa, na devamārabrāhmaṇasupaṇṇanāgānaṃ aññatarassa, addhā ahaṃ satthāraṃ uddissa āgacchanto sammāsambuddhena diṭṭho bhavissāmī''ti. so tāvadeva assapiṭṭhito otaritvā onatasarīro rasmiyānusārena satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā manosilārase nimujjanto viya buddharasmīnaṃ anto pāvisi. so satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi saddhiṃ amaccasahassena. satthā tesaṃ anupubbiṃ kathaṃ kathesi. desanāpariyosāne saparivāro rājā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi.

[03] atha ^a^V2.0222^ea^ sabbe uṭṭhahitvā pabbajjaṃ yāciṃsu. satthā ``āgamissati nu kho imesaṃ kulaputtānaṃ iddhimayapattacīvara''nti upadhārento ``ime kulaputtā paccekabuddhasahassānaṃ cīvarasahassaṃ adaṃsu, kassapabuddhakāle vīsatiyā bhikkhusahassānaṃ vīsaticīvarasahassānipi adaṃsu, anacchariyaṃ imesaṃ kulaputtānaṃ iddhimayapattacīvarāgamana''nti ñatvā dakkhiṇahatthaṃ pasāretvā ``etha, bhikkhavo, caratha brahmacariyaṃ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā''ti āha. te tāvadeva aṭṭhaparikkhāradharā vassasaṭṭhikattherā viya hutvā vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā paccorohitvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.

[03] te pana vāṇijakā rājagehaṃ gantvā deviyā raññā pahitasāsanaṃ ārocetvā deviyā ``āgacchantū''ti vutte pavisitvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu. atha ne devī pucchi -- ``tātā, kiṃkāraṇā āgatatthā''ti? ``mayaṃ raññā tumhākaṃ santikaṃ pesitā, tīṇi kira no satasahassāni dethā''ti. ``bahuṃ, bhaṇe, bhaṇatha, kiṃ tumhehi rañño santike kataṃ, kismiṃ vo rājā pasanno ettakaṃ dhanaṃ dāpetī''ti? ``devi, na aññaṃ kiñci kataṃ, ekaṃ pana sāsanaṃ ārocayimhā''ti. ``sakkā pana, tātā, mayhampi taṃ ārocetu''nti. ``sakkā, devī''ti suvaṇṇabhiṅgārena mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā ``devi, buddho loke uppanno''ti. sāpi taṃ sutvā pītiyā phuṭṭhasarīrā tikkhattuṃ kiñci asallakkhetvā catutthavāre ``buddho uppanno''ti sutvā ``kiṃ, tātā, imasmiṃ pade raññā dinna''nti ^a^P0.0501^ea^? ``satasahassaṃ, devī''ti. ``tātā, ananucchavikaṃ raññā kataṃ evarūpaṃ sāsanaṃ ^a^M2.0224^ea^ sutvā tumhākaṃ satasahassadadamānena, ahaṃ vo mama duggatapaṇṇākāre tīṇi satasahassāni dammi. aparaṃ kiñci tumhehi ārocita''nti? te idañca idañcāti itarānipi dve sāsanāni ārocesuṃ. devī purimanayeneva tayo tayo vāre asallakkhetvā catutthacatutthavāre tīṇi tīṇi satasahassāni adāsi. evaṃ te sabbāni dvādasasatasahassāni labhiṃsu.

[03] atha ne devī pucchi -- ``rājā kahaṃ, tātā''ti? ``devi, rājā `satthāraṃ uddissa pabbajissāmī'ti vatvā gato''ti. ``mayhaṃ tena kiṃ sāsanaṃ dinna''nti? ``sabbaṃ kira issariyaṃ tumhākaṃ vissaṭṭhaṃ, `tumhe kira yathāsukhaṃ sampattiṃ anubhavathā'''ti. ``amaccā pana kuhiṃ, tātā''ti? ``tepi raññā saddhiṃ `pabbajissāmā'ti gatā, devī''ti. sā tesaṃ bhariyāyo pakkosāpetvā, ``ammā, tumhākaṃ sāmikā raññā saddhiṃ `pabbajissāmā'ti gatā, tumhe kiṃ karissathā''ti? ``kiṃ pana tehi amhākaṃ sāsanaṃ pahitaṃ, devī''ti? ``tehi kira attano sampatti tumhākaṃ vissaṭṭhā `tumhe kira sampattiṃ yathāsukhaṃ paribhuñjathā'''ti. ``tumhe pana, devi, kiṃ ^a^V2.0223^ea^ karissathā''ti? ``amhākaṃ so tāva rājā magge ṭhito tīhi satasahassehi tīṇi ratanāni pūjetvā kheḷapiṇḍaṃ viya sampattiṃ pahāya `pabbajissāmī'ti nikkhanto, mayāpi tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ sāsanaṃ sutvā tāni navahi satasahassehi pūjitāni, na kho panesā sampatti nāma raññoyeva dukkhā, mayhampi dukkhā eva. ko raññā chaḍḍitakheḷapiṇḍaṃ jaṇṇukehi bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhahitvā mukhena gaṇhissati, na mayhaṃ sampattiyā attho, satthāraṃ uddissa pabbajissāmī''ti. ``devi, mayampi tumhehi saddhiṃ pabbajissāmā''ti. ``sace sakkotha, sādhū''ti. ``sakkoma, devī''ti. tena hi ``ethā''ti rathasahassaṃ yojāpetvā rathaṃ āruyha tāhi saddhiṃ nikkhamitvā antarāmagge paṭhamaṃ nadiṃ disvā yathā raññā paṭhamaṃ pucchitā, tatheva pucchitvā sabbaṃ pavattiṃ sutvā ``raññā gatamaggaṃ olokethā''ti vatvā ``sindhavānaṃ padavalañjaṃ na passāmā''ti vutte rājā ``tīṇi ratanāni uddissa nikkhantosmī''ti saccakiriyaṃ karitvā tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ guṇe anussaritvā gato bhavissati ^a^P0.0502^ea^, ahampi tīṇi ratanāni uddissa nikkhantā, tesaṃ me ānubhāvena ``idaṃ udakaṃ udakaṃ viya mā hotū''ti tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ guṇe anussarantī rathasahassaṃ ^a^M2.0225^ea^ pesesi. udakaṃ piṭṭhipāsāṇasadisaṃ ahosi, cakkānaṃ aggaṭṭhāneva temiṃsu. eteneva upāyena itarā dvepi nadiyo uttariṃsu.
